Transcript: MICHAELIS THE TICKET OF LEAVE APOSTLE WAS SPEAKING IN AN EVEN VOICE A VOICE THAT WHEEZED AS IF DEADENED AND OPPRESSED BY THE LAYER OF FAT ON HIS CHEST

Name: 02-777-126732-0004.wav
Transcript: AND EVER SINCE HE HAD NEVER MANAGED TO GET HIS WEIGHT DOWN AS MUCH AS AN OUNCE

Name: 02-777-126732-0005.wav
Transcript: WITH HIS ELBOW PRESENTING NO APPEARANCE OF A JOINT BUT MORE LIKE A BEND IN A DUMMY'S LIMB THROWN OVER THE BACK OF A CHAIR HE LEANED FORWARD SLIGHTLY OVER HIS SHORT AND ENORMOUS THIGHS TO SPIT INTO THE GRATE

Name: 02-777-126732-0006.wav
Transcript: YES I HAD THE TIME TO THINK THINGS OUT A LITTLE HE ADDED WITHOUT EMPHASIS

Name: 02-777-126732-0007.wav
Transcript: WHEN HE ROSE PAINFULLY THE THRUSTING FORWARD OF A SKINNY GROPING HAND DEFORMED BY GOUTY SWELLINGS SUGGESTED THE EFFORT OF A MORIBUND MURDERER SUMMONING ALL HIS REMAINING STRENGTH FOR A LAST STAB

Name: 02-777-126732-0008.wav
Transcript: HIS ENUNCIATION WOULD HAVE BEEN ALMOST TOTALLY UNINTELLIGIBLE TO A STRANGER

Name: 02-777-126732-0009.wav
Transcript: THE OLD TERRORIST TURNED SLOWLY HIS HEAD ON HIS SKINNY NECK FROM SIDE TO SIDE

Name: 02-777-126732-0010.wav
Transcript: AND I COULD NEVER GET AS MANY AS THREE SUCH MEN TOGETHER

Name: 02-777-126732-0011.wav
Transcript: THE POSSESSORS OF PROPERTY HAD NOT ONLY TO FACE THE AWAKENED PROLETARIAT BUT THEY HAD ALSO TO FIGHT AMONGST THEMSELVES YES

Name: 02-777-126732-0012.wav
Transcript: STRUGGLE WARFARE WAS THE CONDITION OF PRIVATE OWNERSHIP IT WAS FATAL

Name: 02-777-126732-0013.wav
Transcript: AH HE DID NOT DEPEND UPON EMOTIONAL EXCITEMENT TO KEEP UP HIS BELIEF NO DECLAMATIONS NO ANGER NO VISIONS OF BLOOD RED FLAGS WAVING OR METAPHORICAL LURID SUNS OF VENGEANCE RISING ABOVE THE HORIZON OF A DOOMED SOCIETY NOT HE

Name: 02-777-126732-0014.wav
Transcript: DON'T YOU THINK THAT IF I HAD NOT BEEN THE OPTIMIST I AM I COULD NOT HAVE FOUND IN FIFTEEN YEARS SOME MEANS TO CUT MY THROAT

Name: 02-777-126732-0015.wav
Transcript: A HARSH LAUGH FROM COMRADE OSSIPON CUT THE TIRADE DEAD SHORT IN A SUDDEN FALTERING OF THE TONGUE AND A BEWILDERED UNSTEADINESS OF THE APOSTLE'S MILDLY EXALTED EYES

Name: 02-777-126732-0016.wav
Transcript: ALEXANDER OSSIPON GOT UP TALL IN HIS THREADBARE BLUE SERGE SUIT UNDER THE LOW CEILING SHOOK OFF THE STIFFNESS OF LONG IMMOBILITY AND STROLLED AWAY INTO THE KITCHEN DOWN TWO STEPS TO LOOK OVER STEVIE'S SHOULDER

Name: 02-777-126732-0017.wav
Transcript: VERY CHARACTERISTIC PERFECTLY TYPICAL

Name: 02-777-126732-0018.wav
Transcript: YOU WOULD CALL THAT LAD A DEGENERATE WOULD YOU MUMBLED MISTER VERLOC

Name: 02-777-126732-0019.wav
Transcript: IT WAS KARL YUNDT WHO WAS HEARD IMPLACABLE TO HIS LAST BREATH

Name: 02-777-126732-0020.wav
Transcript: LOMBROSO IS AN ASS

Name: 02-777-126732-0021.wav
Transcript: FOR HIM THE CRIMINAL IS THE PRISONER SIMPLE IS IT NOT

Name: 02-777-126732-0022.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS AN EXTRAORDINARY FORCE OF SUGGESTION IN THIS POSTURING

Name: 02-777-126732-0023.wav
Transcript: THE FAMOUS TERRORIST HAD NEVER IN HIS LIFE RAISED PERSONALLY AS MUCH AS HIS LITTLE FINGER AGAINST THE SOCIAL EDIFICE

Name: 02-777-126732-0024.wav
Transcript: THE SHADOW OF HIS EVIL GIFT CLUNG TO HIM YET LIKE THE SMELL OF A DEADLY DRUG IN AN OLD VIAL OF POISON EMPTIED NOW USELESS READY TO BE THROWN AWAY UPON THE RUBBISH HEAP OF THINGS THAT HAD SERVED THEIR TIME

Name: 02-777-126732-0025.wav
Transcript: MICHAELIS THE TICKET OF LEAVE APOSTLE SMILED VAGUELY WITH HIS GLUED LIPS HIS PASTY MOON FACE DROOPED UNDER THE WEIGHT OF MELANCHOLY ASSENT

Name: 02-777-126732-0026.wav
Transcript: HE HAD BEEN A PRISONER HIMSELF

Name: 02-777-126732-0027.wav
Transcript: HIS OWN SKIN HAD SIZZLED UNDER THE RED HOT BRAND HE MURMURED SOFTLY

Name: 02-777-126732-0028.wav
Transcript: YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND HE BEGAN DISDAINFULLY BUT STOPPED SHORT INTIMIDATED BY THE DEAD BLACKNESS OF THE CAVERNOUS EYES IN THE FACE TURNED SLOWLY TOWARDS HIM WITH A BLIND STARE AS IF GUIDED ONLY BY THE SOUND

Name: 02-777-126732-0029.wav
Transcript: HE GAVE THE DISCUSSION UP WITH A SLIGHT SHRUG OF THE SHOULDERS

Name: 02-777-126732-0030.wav
Transcript: STEVIE ACCUSTOMED TO MOVE ABOUT DISREGARDED HAD GOT UP FROM THE KITCHEN TABLE CARRYING OFF HIS DRAWING TO BED WITH HIM

Name: 02-777-126732-0031.wav
Transcript: THE SHEET OF PAPER COVERED WITH CIRCLES DROPPED OUT OF HIS FINGERS AND HE REMAINED STARING AT THE OLD TERRORIST AS IF ROOTED SUDDENLY TO THE SPOT BY HIS MORBID HORROR AND DREAD OF PHYSICAL PAIN

Name: 02-777-126732-0032.wav
Transcript: HIS SCARED EYES BLAZED WITH INDIGNATION IT WOULD HURT TERRIBLY HIS MOUTH DROPPED OPEN

Name: 02-777-126732-0033.wav
Transcript: COMRADE OSSIPON'S FACE TWITCHED WITH EXASPERATION

Name: 02-777-126732-0034.wav
Transcript: I DON'T SAY THAT PROTESTED MICHAELIS GENTLY

Name: 02-777-126732-0035.wav
Transcript: HIS VISION OF TRUTH HAD GROWN SO INTENSE THAT THE SOUND OF A STRANGE VOICE FAILED TO ROUT IT THIS TIME

Name: 02-777-126732-0036.wav
Transcript: THE COALS IN THE GRATE SETTLED DOWN WITH A SLIGHT CRASH AND MICHAELIS THE HERMIT OF VISIONS IN THE DESERT OF A PENITENTIARY GOT UP IMPETUOUSLY

Name: 02-777-126732-0037.wav
Transcript: THE DISDAINFUL POUT OF COMRADE OSSIPON'S THICK LIPS ACCENTUATED THE NEGRO TYPE OF HIS FACE

Name: 02-777-126732-0038.wav
Transcript: HE PAUSED THEN ADDED WITH MODEST FIRMNESS

Name: 02-777-126732-0039.wav
Transcript: I WOULD CALL IT CANNIBALISTIC THAT'S WHAT IT IS

Name: 02-777-126732-0040.wav
Transcript: THEY ARE NOURISHING THEIR GREED ON THE QUIVERING FLESH AND THE WARM BLOOD OF THE PEOPLE NOTHING ELSE

Name: 02-777-126732-0041.wav
Transcript: STEVIE SWALLOWED THE TERRIFYING STATEMENT WITH AN AUDIBLE GULP AND AT ONCE AS THOUGH IT HAD BEEN SWIFT POISON SANK LIMPLY IN A SITTING POSTURE ON THE STEPS OF THE KITCHEN DOOR

Name: 02-777-126732-0042.wav
Transcript: HE CLOSED THE DOOR BEHIND THEIR BACKS WITH RESTRAINED VIOLENCE TURNED THE KEY SHOT THE BOLT

Name: 02-777-126732-0043.wav
Transcript: HE WAS NOT SATISFIED WITH HIS FRIENDS

Name: 02-777-126732-0044.wav
Transcript: WITH THE INSIGHT OF A KINDRED TEMPERAMENT HE PRONOUNCED HIS VERDICT

Name: 02-777-126732-0045.wav
Transcript: THERE ARE NATURES TOO TO WHOSE SENSE OF JUSTICE THE PRICE EXACTED LOOMS UP MONSTROUSLY ENORMOUS ODIOUS OPPRESSIVE WORRYING HUMILIATING EXTORTIONATE INTOLERABLE THOSE ARE THE FANATICS

Name: 02-777-126732-0046.wav
Transcript: IN ANY CASE HE HAD NOT THE TIME

Name: 02-777-126732-0047.wav
Transcript: LOAFING WAS ALL VERY WELL FOR THESE FELLOWS WHO KNEW NOT MISTER VLADIMIR AND HAD WOMEN TO FALL BACK UPON WHEREAS HE HAD A WOMAN TO PROVIDE FOR

Name: 02-777-126732-0048.wav
Transcript: THESE WERE BUT FEW AND FOR THE FIRST TIME SINCE HE OPENED HIS SHOP HE TOOK A COMMERCIAL SURVEY OF ITS VALUE

Name: 02-777-126732-0049.wav
Transcript: THIS SURVEY WAS UNFAVOURABLE

Name: 02-777-126732-0050.wav
Transcript: HE TOOK THE CASH BOX OUT OF THE DRAWER AND TURNING TO LEAVE THE SHOP BECAME AWARE THAT STEVIE WAS STILL DOWNSTAIRS

Name: 02-777-126732-0051.wav
Transcript: HE LOOKED DUBIOUSLY AT HIS BROTHER IN LAW BUT HE DID NOT ASK HIM FOR INFORMATION

Name: 02-777-126732-0052.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC PERCEIVED WITH SOME SURPRISE THAT HE DID NOT KNOW REALLY WHAT TO SAY TO STEVIE

Name: 02-777-126732-0053.wav
Transcript: HE STOOD STILL IN THE MIDDLE OF THE PARLOUR AND LOOKED INTO THE KITCHEN IN SILENCE

Name: 02-777-126732-0054.wav
Transcript: HE WATCHED HIM GESTICULATING AND MURMURING IN THE KITCHEN

Name: 02-777-126732-0055.wav
Transcript: STEVIE PROWLED ROUND THE TABLE LIKE AN EXCITED ANIMAL IN A CAGE

Name: 02-777-126732-0056.wav
Transcript: THE LIGHT THROWN DOWN BY THE SHADE FELL DAZZLINGLY ON THE WHITE PILLOW SUNK BY THE WEIGHT OF HER HEAD REPOSING WITH CLOSED EYES AND DARK HAIR DONE UP IN SEVERAL PLAITS FOR THE NIGHT

Name: 02-777-126732-0057.wav
Transcript: HER BARE FEET AS IF POKED THROUGH THE BOTTOM OF AN UNADORNED SLEEVED CALICO SACK BUTTONED TIGHTLY AT NECK AND WRISTS FELT OVER THE RUG FOR THE SLIPPERS WHILE SHE LOOKED UPWARD INTO HER HUSBAND'S FACE

Name: 02-777-126732-0058.wav
Transcript: THERE IS NO OCCUPATION THAT FAILS A MAN MORE COMPLETELY THAN THAT OF A SECRET AGENT OF POLICE

Name: 02-777-126732-0059.wav
Transcript: IT'S LIKE YOUR HORSE SUDDENLY FALLING DEAD UNDER YOU IN THE MIDST OF AN UNINHABITED AND THIRSTY PLAIN

Name: 02-777-126732-0060.wav
Transcript: THE COMPARISON OCCURRED TO MISTER VERLOC BECAUSE HE HAD SAT ASTRIDE VARIOUS ARMY HORSES IN HIS TIME AND HAD NOW THE SENSATION OF AN INCIPIENT FALL

Name: 02-777-126732-0061.wav
Transcript: THE PROSPECT WAS AS BLACK AS THE WINDOW PANE AGAINST WHICH HE WAS LEANING HIS FOREHEAD

Name: 02-777-126732-0062.wav
Transcript: YES NOT AT ALL WELL

Name: 02-777-126732-0063.wav
Transcript: DOWN BELOW IN THE QUIET NARROW STREET MEASURED FOOTSTEPS APPROACHED THE HOUSE THEN DIED AWAY UNHURRIED AND FIRM AS IF THE PASSER BY HAD STARTED TO PACE OUT ALL ETERNITY FROM GAS LAMP TO GAS LAMP IN A NIGHT WITHOUT END AND THE DROWSY TICKING OF THE OLD CLOCK ON THE LANDING BECAME DISTINCTLY AUDIBLE IN THE BEDROOM

Name: 02-777-126732-0064.wav
Transcript: THAT POOR BOY IS IN A VERY EXCITED STATE TO NIGHT SHE MURMURED AFTER A PAUSE WHICH LASTED FOR THREE TICKS OF THE CLOCK

Name: 02-777-126732-0065.wav
Transcript: THIS DREAD LED HIM TO MAKE THE REMARK THAT STEVIE HAD DISREGARDED HIS SUGGESTION TO GO TO BED

Name: 02-777-126732-0066.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO YOUNG MAN OF HIS AGE IN LONDON MORE WILLING AND DOCILE THAN STEPHEN SHE AFFIRMED NONE MORE AFFECTIONATE AND READY TO PLEASE AND EVEN USEFUL AS LONG AS PEOPLE DID NOT UPSET HIS POOR HEAD

Name: 02-777-126732-0067.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC'S ANXIETIES HAD PREVENTED HIM FROM ATTACHING ANY SENSE TO WHAT HIS WIFE WAS SAYING

Name: 02-777-126732-0068.wav
Transcript: THAT BOY HEARS TOO MUCH OF WHAT IS TALKED ABOUT HERE

Name: 02-777-126732-0069.wav
Transcript: IF I HAD KNOWN THEY WERE COMING TO NIGHT I WOULD HAVE SEEN TO IT THAT HE WENT TO BED AT THE SAME TIME I DID

Name: 02-777-126732-0070.wav
Transcript: HE WAS OUT OF HIS MIND WITH SOMETHING HE OVERHEARD ABOUT EATING PEOPLE'S FLESH AND DRINKING BLOOD WHAT'S THE GOOD OF TALKING LIKE THAT

Name: 02-777-126732-0071.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC WAS FULLY RESPONSIVE NOW

Name: 02-777-126732-0072.wav
Transcript: ASK KARL YUNDT HE GROWLED SAVAGELY

Name: 02-777-126732-0073.wav
Transcript: HE ISN'T FIT TO HEAR WHAT'S SAID HERE HE BELIEVES IT'S ALL TRUE

Name: 02-777-126732-0074.wav
Transcript: HE KNOWS NO BETTER HE GETS INTO HIS PASSIONS OVER IT

Name: 02-777-126732-0075.wav
Transcript: HE GLARED AT ME AS IF HE DIDN'T KNOW WHO I WAS WHEN I WENT DOWNSTAIRS

Name: 02-777-126732-0076.wav
Transcript: I WISH HE HAD NEVER BEEN TO SCHOOL MISSUS VERLOC BEGAN AGAIN BRUSQUELY

Name: 02-777-126732-0077.wav
Transcript: HE GETS A RED FACE PORING OVER THEM

Name: 02-777-126732-0078.wav
Transcript: I WOULDN'T GIVE A HALFPENNY FOR THE WHOLE LOT

Name: 02-777-126732-0079.wav
Transcript: THE OTHER DAY STEVIE GOT HOLD OF ONE AND THERE WAS A STORY IN IT OF A GERMAN SOLDIER OFFICER TEARING HALF OFF THE EAR OF A RECRUIT AND NOTHING WAS DONE TO HIM FOR IT THE BRUTE

Name: 02-777-126732-0080.wav
Transcript: HE CAN'T STAND THE NOTION OF ANY CRUELTY

Name: 02-777-126732-0081.wav
Transcript: COMFORTABLE DEAR

Name: 03-777-126732-0000.wav
Transcript: ALL IDEALISATION MAKES LIFE POORER

Name: 03-777-126732-0001.wav
Transcript: THEN WHY INDULGE IN PROPHETIC PHANTASIES

Name: 03-777-126732-0002.wav
Transcript: AT BEST THEY CAN ONLY INTERPRET THE MIND OF THE PROPHET AND CAN HAVE NO OBJECTIVE VALUE

Name: 03-777-126732-0066.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO YOUNG MAN OF HIS AGE IN LONDON MORE WILLING AND DOCILE THAN STEPHEN SHE AFFIRMED NONE MORE AFFECTIONATE AND READY TO PLEASE AND EVEN USEFUL AS LONG AS PEOPLE DID NOT UPSET HIS POOR HEAD

Name: 03-777-126732-0067.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC'S ANXIETIES HAD PREVENTED HIM FROM ATTACHING ANY SENSE TO WHAT HIS WIFE WAS SAYING

Name: 03-777-126732-0068.wav
Transcript: THAT BOY HEARS TOO MUCH OF WHAT IS TALKED ABOUT HERE

Name: 03-777-126732-0069.wav
Transcript: IF I HAD KNOWN THEY WERE COMING TO NIGHT I WOULD HAVE SEEN TO IT THAT HE WENT TO BED AT THE SAME TIME I DID

Name: 03-777-126732-0070.wav
Transcript: HE WAS OUT OF HIS MIND WITH SOMETHING HE OVERHEARD ABOUT EATING PEOPLE'S FLESH AND DRINKING BLOOD WHAT'S THE GOOD OF TALKING LIKE THAT

Name: 03-777-126732-0071.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC WAS FULLY RESPONSIVE NOW

Name: 03-777-126732-0072.wav
Transcript: ASK KARL YUNDT HE GROWLED SAVAGELY

Name: 03-777-126732-0073.wav
Transcript: HE ISN'T FIT TO HEAR WHAT'S SAID HERE HE BELIEVES IT'S ALL TRUE

Name: 03-777-126732-0074.wav
Transcript: HE KNOWS NO BETTER HE GETS INTO HIS PASSIONS OVER IT

Name: 03-777-126732-0075.wav
Transcript: HE GLARED AT ME AS IF HE DIDN'T KNOW WHO I WAS WHEN I WENT DOWNSTAIRS

Name: 03-777-126732-0076.wav
Transcript: I WISH HE HAD NEVER BEEN TO SCHOOL MISSUS VERLOC BEGAN AGAIN BRUSQUELY

Name: 03-777-126732-0077.wav
Transcript: HE GETS A RED FACE PORING OVER THEM

Name: 03-777-126732-0078.wav
Transcript: I WOULDN'T GIVE A HALFPENNY FOR THE WHOLE LOT

Name: 03-777-126732-0079.wav
Transcript: THE OTHER DAY STEVIE GOT HOLD OF ONE AND THERE WAS A STORY IN IT OF A GERMAN SOLDIER OFFICER TEARING HALF OFF THE EAR OF A RECRUIT AND NOTHING WAS DONE TO HIM FOR IT THE BRUTE

Name: 03-777-126732-0080.wav
Transcript: HE CAN'T STAND THE NOTION OF ANY CRUELTY

Name: 03-777-126732-0081.wav
Transcript: COMFORTABLE DEAR

Name: 04-777-126732-0000.wav
Transcript: ALL IDEALISATION MAKES LIFE POORER

Name: 04-777-126732-0001.wav
Transcript: THEN WHY INDULGE IN PROPHETIC PHANTASIES

Name: 04-777-126732-0002.wav
Transcript: AT BEST THEY CAN ONLY INTERPRET THE MIND OF THE PROPHET AND CAN HAVE NO OBJECTIVE VALUE

Name: 04-777-126732-0003.wav
Transcript: MICHAELIS THE TICKET OF LEAVE APOSTLE WAS SPEAKING IN AN EVEN VOICE A VOICE THAT WHEEZED AS IF DEADENED AND OPPRESSED BY THE LAYER OF FAT ON HIS CHEST

Name: 04-777-126732-0004.wav
Transcript: AND EVER SINCE HE HAD NEVER MANAGED TO GET HIS WEIGHT DOWN AS MUCH AS AN OUNCE

Name: 04-777-126732-0005.wav
Transcript: WITH HIS ELBOW PRESENTING NO APPEARANCE OF A JOINT BUT MORE LIKE A BEND IN A DUMMY'S LIMB THROWN OVER THE BACK OF A CHAIR HE LEANED FORWARD SLIGHTLY OVER HIS SHORT AND ENORMOUS THIGHS TO SPIT INTO THE GRATE

Name: 04-777-126732-0006.wav
Transcript: YES I HAD THE TIME TO THINK THINGS OUT A LITTLE HE ADDED WITHOUT EMPHASIS

Name: 04-777-126732-0007.wav
Transcript: WHEN HE ROSE PAINFULLY THE THRUSTING FORWARD OF A SKINNY GROPING HAND DEFORMED BY GOUTY SWELLINGS SUGGESTED THE EFFORT OF A MORIBUND MURDERER SUMMONING ALL HIS REMAINING STRENGTH FOR A LAST STAB

Name: 04-777-126732-0008.wav
Transcript: HIS ENUNCIATION WOULD HAVE BEEN ALMOST TOTALLY UNINTELLIGIBLE TO A STRANGER

Name: 04-777-126732-0009.wav
Transcript: THE OLD TERRORIST TURNED SLOWLY HIS HEAD ON HIS SKINNY NECK FROM SIDE TO SIDE

Name: 04-777-126732-0010.wav
Transcript: AND I COULD NEVER GET AS MANY AS THREE SUCH MEN TOGETHER

Name: 04-777-126732-0011.wav
Transcript: THE POSSESSORS OF PROPERTY HAD NOT ONLY TO FACE THE AWAKENED PROLETARIAT BUT THEY HAD ALSO TO FIGHT AMONGST THEMSELVES YES

Name: 04-777-126732-0012.wav
Transcript: STRUGGLE WARFARE WAS THE CONDITION OF PRIVATE OWNERSHIP IT WAS FATAL

Name: 04-777-126732-0013.wav
Transcript: AH HE DID NOT DEPEND UPON EMOTIONAL EXCITEMENT TO KEEP UP HIS BELIEF NO DECLAMATIONS NO ANGER NO VISIONS OF BLOOD RED FLAGS WAVING OR METAPHORICAL LURID SUNS OF VENGEANCE RISING ABOVE THE HORIZON OF A DOOMED SOCIETY NOT HE

Name: 04-777-126732-0014.wav
Transcript: DON'T YOU THINK THAT IF I HAD NOT BEEN THE OPTIMIST I AM I COULD NOT HAVE FOUND IN FIFTEEN YEARS SOME MEANS TO CUT MY THROAT

Name: 04-777-126732-0015.wav
Transcript: A HARSH LAUGH FROM COMRADE OSSIPON CUT THE TIRADE DEAD SHORT IN A SUDDEN FALTERING OF THE TONGUE AND A BEWILDERED UNSTEADINESS OF THE APOSTLE'S MILDLY EXALTED EYES

Name: 04-777-126732-0016.wav
Transcript: ALEXANDER OSSIPON GOT UP TALL IN HIS THREADBARE BLUE SERGE SUIT UNDER THE LOW CEILING SHOOK OFF THE STIFFNESS OF LONG IMMOBILITY AND STROLLED AWAY INTO THE KITCHEN DOWN TWO STEPS TO LOOK OVER STEVIE'S SHOULDER

Name: 04-777-126732-0017.wav
Transcript: VERY CHARACTERISTIC PERFECTLY TYPICAL

Name: 04-777-126732-0018.wav
Transcript: YOU WOULD CALL THAT LAD A DEGENERATE WOULD YOU MUMBLED MISTER VERLOC

Name: 04-777-126732-0019.wav
Transcript: IT WAS KARL YUNDT WHO WAS HEARD IMPLACABLE TO HIS LAST BREATH

Name: 04-777-126732-0020.wav
Transcript: LOMBROSO IS AN ASS

Name: 04-777-126732-0021.wav
Transcript: FOR HIM THE CRIMINAL IS THE PRISONER SIMPLE IS IT NOT

Name: 04-777-126732-0022.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS AN EXTRAORDINARY FORCE OF SUGGESTION IN THIS POSTURING

Name: 04-777-126732-0023.wav
Transcript: THE FAMOUS TERRORIST HAD NEVER IN HIS LIFE RAISED PERSONALLY AS MUCH AS HIS LITTLE FINGER AGAINST THE SOCIAL EDIFICE

Name: 04-777-126732-0024.wav
Transcript: THE SHADOW OF HIS EVIL GIFT CLUNG TO HIM YET LIKE THE SMELL OF A DEADLY DRUG IN AN OLD VIAL OF POISON EMPTIED NOW USELESS READY TO BE THROWN AWAY UPON THE RUBBISH HEAP OF THINGS THAT HAD SERVED THEIR TIME

Name: 04-777-126732-0025.wav
Transcript: MICHAELIS THE TICKET OF LEAVE APOSTLE SMILED VAGUELY WITH HIS GLUED LIPS HIS PASTY MOON FACE DROOPED UNDER THE WEIGHT OF MELANCHOLY ASSENT

Name: 04-777-126732-0026.wav
Transcript: HE HAD BEEN A PRISONER HIMSELF

Name: 04-777-126732-0027.wav
Transcript: HIS OWN SKIN HAD SIZZLED UNDER THE RED HOT BRAND HE MURMURED SOFTLY

Name: 04-777-126732-0028.wav
Transcript: YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND HE BEGAN DISDAINFULLY BUT STOPPED SHORT INTIMIDATED BY THE DEAD BLACKNESS OF THE CAVERNOUS EYES IN THE FACE TURNED SLOWLY TOWARDS HIM WITH A BLIND STARE AS IF GUIDED ONLY BY THE SOUND

Name: 04-777-126732-0029.wav
Transcript: HE GAVE THE DISCUSSION UP WITH A SLIGHT SHRUG OF THE SHOULDERS

Name: 04-777-126732-0030.wav
Transcript: STEVIE ACCUSTOMED TO MOVE ABOUT DISREGARDED HAD GOT UP FROM THE KITCHEN TABLE CARRYING OFF HIS DRAWING TO BED WITH HIM

Name: 04-777-126732-0031.wav
Transcript: THE SHEET OF PAPER COVERED WITH CIRCLES DROPPED OUT OF HIS FINGERS AND HE REMAINED STARING AT THE OLD TERRORIST AS IF ROOTED SUDDENLY TO THE SPOT BY HIS MORBID HORROR AND DREAD OF PHYSICAL PAIN

Name: 04-777-126732-0032.wav
Transcript: HIS SCARED EYES BLAZED WITH INDIGNATION IT WOULD HURT TERRIBLY HIS MOUTH DROPPED OPEN

Name: 04-777-126732-0033.wav
Transcript: COMRADE OSSIPON'S FACE TWITCHED WITH EXASPERATION

Name: 04-777-126732-0034.wav
Transcript: I DON'T SAY THAT PROTESTED MICHAELIS GENTLY

Name: 04-777-126732-0035.wav
Transcript: HIS VISION OF TRUTH HAD GROWN SO INTENSE THAT THE SOUND OF A STRANGE VOICE FAILED TO ROUT IT THIS TIME

Name: 04-777-126732-0036.wav
Transcript: THE COALS IN THE GRATE SETTLED DOWN WITH A SLIGHT CRASH AND MICHAELIS THE HERMIT OF VISIONS IN THE DESERT OF A PENITENTIARY GOT UP IMPETUOUSLY

Name: 04-777-126732-0037.wav
Transcript: THE DISDAINFUL POUT OF COMRADE OSSIPON'S THICK LIPS ACCENTUATED THE NEGRO TYPE OF HIS FACE

Name: 04-777-126732-0038.wav
Transcript: HE PAUSED THEN ADDED WITH MODEST FIRMNESS

Name: 04-777-126732-0039.wav
Transcript: I WOULD CALL IT CANNIBALISTIC THAT'S WHAT IT IS

Name: 04-777-126732-0040.wav
Transcript: THEY ARE NOURISHING THEIR GREED ON THE QUIVERING FLESH AND THE WARM BLOOD OF THE PEOPLE NOTHING ELSE

Name: 04-777-126732-0041.wav
Transcript: STEVIE SWALLOWED THE TERRIFYING STATEMENT WITH AN AUDIBLE GULP AND AT ONCE AS THOUGH IT HAD BEEN SWIFT POISON SANK LIMPLY IN A SITTING POSTURE ON THE STEPS OF THE KITCHEN DOOR

Name: 04-777-126732-0042.wav
Transcript: HE CLOSED THE DOOR BEHIND THEIR BACKS WITH RESTRAINED VIOLENCE TURNED THE KEY SHOT THE BOLT

Name: 04-777-126732-0043.wav
Transcript: HE WAS NOT SATISFIED WITH HIS FRIENDS

Name: 04-777-126732-0044.wav
Transcript: WITH THE INSIGHT OF A KINDRED TEMPERAMENT HE PRONOUNCED HIS VERDICT

Name: 04-777-126732-0045.wav
Transcript: THERE ARE NATURES TOO TO WHOSE SENSE OF JUSTICE THE PRICE EXACTED LOOMS UP MONSTROUSLY ENORMOUS ODIOUS OPPRESSIVE WORRYING HUMILIATING EXTORTIONATE INTOLERABLE THOSE ARE THE FANATICS

Name: 04-777-126732-0046.wav
Transcript: IN ANY CASE HE HAD NOT THE TIME

Name: 04-777-126732-0047.wav
Transcript: LOAFING WAS ALL VERY WELL FOR THESE FELLOWS WHO KNEW NOT MISTER VLADIMIR AND HAD WOMEN TO FALL BACK UPON WHEREAS HE HAD A WOMAN TO PROVIDE FOR

Name: 04-777-126732-0048.wav
Transcript: THESE WERE BUT FEW AND FOR THE FIRST TIME SINCE HE OPENED HIS SHOP HE TOOK A COMMERCIAL SURVEY OF ITS VALUE

Name: 04-777-126732-0049.wav
Transcript: THIS SURVEY WAS UNFAVOURABLE

Name: 04-777-126732-0050.wav
Transcript: HE TOOK THE CASH BOX OUT OF THE DRAWER AND TURNING TO LEAVE THE SHOP BECAME AWARE THAT STEVIE WAS STILL DOWNSTAIRS

Name: 04-777-126732-0051.wav
Transcript: HE LOOKED DUBIOUSLY AT HIS BROTHER IN LAW BUT HE DID NOT ASK HIM FOR INFORMATION

Name: 04-777-126732-0052.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC PERCEIVED WITH SOME SURPRISE THAT HE DID NOT KNOW REALLY WHAT TO SAY TO STEVIE

Name: 04-777-126732-0053.wav
Transcript: HE STOOD STILL IN THE MIDDLE OF THE PARLOUR AND LOOKED INTO THE KITCHEN IN SILENCE

Name: 04-777-126732-0054.wav
Transcript: HE WATCHED HIM GESTICULATING AND MURMURING IN THE KITCHEN

Name: 04-777-126732-0055.wav
Transcript: STEVIE PROWLED ROUND THE TABLE LIKE AN EXCITED ANIMAL IN A CAGE

Name: 04-777-126732-0056.wav
Transcript: THE LIGHT THROWN DOWN BY THE SHADE FELL DAZZLINGLY ON THE WHITE PILLOW SUNK BY THE WEIGHT OF HER HEAD REPOSING WITH CLOSED EYES AND DARK HAIR DONE UP IN SEVERAL PLAITS FOR THE NIGHT

Name: 04-777-126732-0057.wav
Transcript: HER BARE FEET AS IF POKED THROUGH THE BOTTOM OF AN UNADORNED SLEEVED CALICO SACK BUTTONED TIGHTLY AT NECK AND WRISTS FELT OVER THE RUG FOR THE SLIPPERS WHILE SHE LOOKED UPWARD INTO HER HUSBAND'S FACE

Name: 04-777-126732-0058.wav
Transcript: THERE IS NO OCCUPATION THAT FAILS A MAN MORE COMPLETELY THAN THAT OF A SECRET AGENT OF POLICE

Name: 04-777-126732-0059.wav
Transcript: IT'S LIKE YOUR HORSE SUDDENLY FALLING DEAD UNDER YOU IN THE MIDST OF AN UNINHABITED AND THIRSTY PLAIN

Name: 04-777-126732-0060.wav
Transcript: THE COMPARISON OCCURRED TO MISTER VERLOC BECAUSE HE HAD SAT ASTRIDE VARIOUS ARMY HORSES IN HIS TIME AND HAD NOW THE SENSATION OF AN INCIPIENT FALL

Name: 04-777-126732-0061.wav
Transcript: THE PROSPECT WAS AS BLACK AS THE WINDOW PANE AGAINST WHICH HE WAS LEANING HIS FOREHEAD

Name: 04-777-126732-0062.wav
Transcript: YES NOT AT ALL WELL

Name: 04-777-126732-0063.wav
Transcript: DOWN BELOW IN THE QUIET NARROW STREET MEASURED FOOTSTEPS APPROACHED THE HOUSE THEN DIED AWAY UNHURRIED AND FIRM AS IF THE PASSER BY HAD STARTED TO PACE OUT ALL ETERNITY FROM GAS LAMP TO GAS LAMP IN A NIGHT WITHOUT END AND THE DROWSY TICKING OF THE OLD CLOCK ON THE LANDING BECAME DISTINCTLY AUDIBLE IN THE BEDROOM

Name: 04-777-126732-0064.wav
Transcript: THAT POOR BOY IS IN A VERY EXCITED STATE TO NIGHT SHE MURMURED AFTER A PAUSE WHICH LASTED FOR THREE TICKS OF THE CLOCK

Transcript: HE LOOKED DUBIOUSLY AT HIS BROTHER IN LAW BUT HE DID NOT ASK HIM FOR INFORMATION

Name: 05-777-126732-0052.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC PERCEIVED WITH SOME SURPRISE THAT HE DID NOT KNOW REALLY WHAT TO SAY TO STEVIE

Name: 05-777-126732-0053.wav
Transcript: HE STOOD STILL IN THE MIDDLE OF THE PARLOUR AND LOOKED INTO THE KITCHEN IN SILENCE

Name: 05-777-126732-0054.wav
Transcript: HE WATCHED HIM GESTICULATING AND MURMURING IN THE KITCHEN

Name: 05-777-126732-0055.wav
Transcript: STEVIE PROWLED ROUND THE TABLE LIKE AN EXCITED ANIMAL IN A CAGE

Name: 05-777-126732-0056.wav
Transcript: THE LIGHT THROWN DOWN BY THE SHADE FELL DAZZLINGLY ON THE WHITE PILLOW SUNK BY THE WEIGHT OF HER HEAD REPOSING WITH CLOSED EYES AND DARK HAIR DONE UP IN SEVERAL PLAITS FOR THE NIGHT

Name: 05-777-126732-0057.wav
Transcript: HER BARE FEET AS IF POKED THROUGH THE BOTTOM OF AN UNADORNED SLEEVED CALICO SACK BUTTONED TIGHTLY AT NECK AND WRISTS FELT OVER THE RUG FOR THE SLIPPERS WHILE SHE LOOKED UPWARD INTO HER HUSBAND'S FACE

Name: 05-777-126732-0058.wav
Transcript: THERE IS NO OCCUPATION THAT FAILS A MAN MORE COMPLETELY THAN THAT OF A SECRET AGENT OF POLICE

Name: 05-777-126732-0059.wav
Transcript: IT'S LIKE YOUR HORSE SUDDENLY FALLING DEAD UNDER YOU IN THE MIDST OF AN UNINHABITED AND THIRSTY PLAIN

Name: 05-777-126732-0060.wav
Transcript: THE COMPARISON OCCURRED TO MISTER VERLOC BECAUSE HE HAD SAT ASTRIDE VARIOUS ARMY HORSES IN HIS TIME AND HAD NOW THE SENSATION OF AN INCIPIENT FALL

Name: 05-777-126732-0061.wav
Transcript: THE PROSPECT WAS AS BLACK AS THE WINDOW PANE AGAINST WHICH HE WAS LEANING HIS FOREHEAD

Name: 05-777-126732-0062.wav
Transcript: YES NOT AT ALL WELL

Name: 05-777-126732-0063.wav
Transcript: DOWN BELOW IN THE QUIET NARROW STREET MEASURED FOOTSTEPS APPROACHED THE HOUSE THEN DIED AWAY UNHURRIED AND FIRM AS IF THE PASSER BY HAD STARTED TO PACE OUT ALL ETERNITY FROM GAS LAMP TO GAS LAMP IN A NIGHT WITHOUT END AND THE DROWSY TICKING OF THE OLD CLOCK ON THE LANDING BECAME DISTINCTLY AUDIBLE IN THE BEDROOM

Name: 05-777-126732-0064.wav
Transcript: THAT POOR BOY IS IN A VERY EXCITED STATE TO NIGHT SHE MURMURED AFTER A PAUSE WHICH LASTED FOR THREE TICKS OF THE CLOCK

Name: 05-777-126732-0065.wav
Transcript: THIS DREAD LED HIM TO MAKE THE REMARK THAT STEVIE HAD DISREGARDED HIS SUGGESTION TO GO TO BED

Name: 05-777-126732-0066.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO YOUNG MAN OF HIS AGE IN LONDON MORE WILLING AND DOCILE THAN STEPHEN SHE AFFIRMED NONE MORE AFFECTIONATE AND READY TO PLEASE AND EVEN USEFUL AS LONG AS PEOPLE DID NOT UPSET HIS POOR HEAD

Name: 05-777-126732-0067.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC'S ANXIETIES HAD PREVENTED HIM FROM ATTACHING ANY SENSE TO WHAT HIS WIFE WAS SAYING

Name: 05-777-126732-0068.wav
Transcript: THAT BOY HEARS TOO MUCH OF WHAT IS TALKED ABOUT HERE

Name: 05-777-126732-0069.wav
Transcript: IF I HAD KNOWN THEY WERE COMING TO NIGHT I WOULD HAVE SEEN TO IT THAT HE WENT TO BED AT THE SAME TIME I DID

Name: 05-777-126732-0070.wav
Transcript: HE WAS OUT OF HIS MIND WITH SOMETHING HE OVERHEARD ABOUT EATING PEOPLE'S FLESH AND DRINKING BLOOD WHAT'S THE GOOD OF TALKING LIKE THAT

Name: 05-777-126732-0071.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC WAS FULLY RESPONSIVE NOW

Name: 05-777-126732-0072.wav
Transcript: ASK KARL YUNDT HE GROWLED SAVAGELY

Name: 05-777-126732-0073.wav
Transcript: HE ISN'T FIT TO HEAR WHAT'S SAID HERE HE BELIEVES IT'S ALL TRUE

Name: 05-777-126732-0074.wav
Transcript: HE KNOWS NO BETTER HE GETS INTO HIS PASSIONS OVER IT

Name: 05-777-126732-0075.wav
Transcript: HE GLARED AT ME AS IF HE DIDN'T KNOW WHO I WAS WHEN I WENT DOWNSTAIRS

Name: 05-777-126732-0076.wav
Transcript: I WISH HE HAD NEVER BEEN TO SCHOOL MISSUS VERLOC BEGAN AGAIN BRUSQUELY

Name: 05-777-126732-0077.wav
Transcript: HE GETS A RED FACE PORING OVER THEM

Name: 05-777-126732-0078.wav
Transcript: I WOULDN'T GIVE A HALFPENNY FOR THE WHOLE LOT

Name: 05-777-126732-0079.wav
Transcript: THE OTHER DAY STEVIE GOT HOLD OF ONE AND THERE WAS A STORY IN IT OF A GERMAN SOLDIER OFFICER TEARING HALF OFF THE EAR OF A RECRUIT AND NOTHING WAS DONE TO HIM FOR IT THE BRUTE

Name: 05-777-126732-0080.wav
Transcript: HE CAN'T STAND THE NOTION OF ANY CRUELTY

Name: 05-777-126732-0081.wav
Transcript: COMFORTABLE DEAR

Name: 06-777-126732-0000.wav
Transcript: ALL IDEALISATION MAKES LIFE POORER

Name: 06-777-126732-0001.wav
Transcript: THEN WHY INDULGE IN PROPHETIC PHANTASIES

Name: 06-777-126732-0002.wav
Transcript: AT BEST THEY CAN ONLY INTERPRET THE MIND OF THE PROPHET AND CAN HAVE NO OBJECTIVE VALUE

Name: 06-777-126732-0003.wav
Transcript: MICHAELIS THE TICKET OF LEAVE APOSTLE WAS SPEAKING IN AN EVEN VOICE A VOICE THAT WHEEZED AS IF DEADENED AND OPPRESSED BY THE LAYER OF FAT ON HIS CHEST

Name: 06-777-126732-0004.wav
Transcript: AND EVER SINCE HE HAD NEVER MANAGED TO GET HIS WEIGHT DOWN AS MUCH AS AN OUNCE

Name: 06-777-126732-0005.wav
Transcript: WITH HIS ELBOW PRESENTING NO APPEARANCE OF A JOINT BUT MORE LIKE A BEND IN A DUMMY'S LIMB THROWN OVER THE BACK OF A CHAIR HE LEANED FORWARD SLIGHTLY OVER HIS SHORT AND ENORMOUS THIGHS TO SPIT INTO THE GRATE

Name: 06-777-126732-0006.wav
Transcript: YES I HAD THE TIME TO THINK THINGS OUT A LITTLE HE ADDED WITHOUT EMPHASIS

Name: 06-777-126732-0007.wav
Transcript: WHEN HE ROSE PAINFULLY THE THRUSTING FORWARD OF A SKINNY GROPING HAND DEFORMED BY GOUTY SWELLINGS SUGGESTED THE EFFORT OF A MORIBUND MURDERER SUMMONING ALL HIS REMAINING STRENGTH FOR A LAST STAB

Name: 06-777-126732-0008.wav
Transcript: HIS ENUNCIATION WOULD HAVE BEEN ALMOST TOTALLY UNINTELLIGIBLE TO A STRANGER

Name: 06-777-126732-0009.wav
Transcript: THE OLD TERRORIST TURNED SLOWLY HIS HEAD ON HIS SKINNY NECK FROM SIDE TO SIDE

Name: 06-777-126732-0010.wav
Transcript: AND I COULD NEVER GET AS MANY AS THREE SUCH MEN TOGETHER

Name: 06-777-126732-0011.wav
Transcript: THE POSSESSORS OF PROPERTY HAD NOT ONLY TO FACE THE AWAKENED PROLETARIAT BUT THEY HAD ALSO TO FIGHT AMONGST THEMSELVES YES

Name: 06-777-126732-0012.wav
Transcript: STRUGGLE WARFARE WAS THE CONDITION OF PRIVATE OWNERSHIP IT WAS FATAL

Name: 06-777-126732-0013.wav
Transcript: AH HE DID NOT DEPEND UPON EMOTIONAL EXCITEMENT TO KEEP UP HIS BELIEF NO DECLAMATIONS NO ANGER NO VISIONS OF BLOOD RED FLAGS WAVING OR METAPHORICAL LURID SUNS OF VENGEANCE RISING ABOVE THE HORIZON OF A DOOMED SOCIETY NOT HE

Name: 06-777-126732-0014.wav
Transcript: DON'T YOU THINK THAT IF I HAD NOT BEEN THE OPTIMIST I AM I COULD NOT HAVE FOUND IN FIFTEEN YEARS SOME MEANS TO CUT MY THROAT

Name: 06-777-126732-0015.wav
Transcript: A HARSH LAUGH FROM COMRADE OSSIPON CUT THE TIRADE DEAD SHORT IN A SUDDEN FALTERING OF THE TONGUE AND A BEWILDERED UNSTEADINESS OF THE APOSTLE'S MILDLY EXALTED EYES

Name: 06-777-126732-0016.wav
Transcript: ALEXANDER OSSIPON GOT UP TALL IN HIS THREADBARE BLUE SERGE SUIT UNDER THE LOW CEILING SHOOK OFF THE STIFFNESS OF LONG IMMOBILITY AND STROLLED AWAY INTO THE KITCHEN DOWN TWO STEPS TO LOOK OVER STEVIE'S SHOULDER

Name: 06-777-126732-0017.wav
Transcript: VERY CHARACTERISTIC PERFECTLY TYPICAL

Name: 06-777-126732-0018.wav
Transcript: YOU WOULD CALL THAT LAD A DEGENERATE WOULD YOU MUMBLED MISTER VERLOC

Name: 06-777-126732-0019.wav
Transcript: IT WAS KARL YUNDT WHO WAS HEARD IMPLACABLE TO HIS LAST BREATH

Name: 06-777-126732-0020.wav
Transcript: LOMBROSO IS AN ASS

Name: 06-777-126732-0021.wav
Transcript: FOR HIM THE CRIMINAL IS THE PRISONER SIMPLE IS IT NOT

Name: 06-777-126732-0022.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS AN EXTRAORDINARY FORCE OF SUGGESTION IN THIS POSTURING

Name: 06-777-126732-0023.wav
Transcript: THE FAMOUS TERRORIST HAD NEVER IN HIS LIFE RAISED PERSONALLY AS MUCH AS HIS LITTLE FINGER AGAINST THE SOCIAL EDIFICE

Name: 06-777-126732-0024.wav
Transcript: THE SHADOW OF HIS EVIL GIFT CLUNG TO HIM YET LIKE THE SMELL OF A DEADLY DRUG IN AN OLD VIAL OF POISON EMPTIED NOW USELESS READY TO BE THROWN AWAY UPON THE RUBBISH HEAP OF THINGS THAT HAD SERVED THEIR TIME

Name: 06-777-126732-0025.wav
Transcript: MICHAELIS THE TICKET OF LEAVE APOSTLE SMILED VAGUELY WITH HIS GLUED LIPS HIS PASTY MOON FACE DROOPED UNDER THE WEIGHT OF MELANCHOLY ASSENT

Name: 06-777-126732-0026.wav
Transcript: HE HAD BEEN A PRISONER HIMSELF

Name: 06-777-126732-0027.wav
Transcript: HIS OWN SKIN HAD SIZZLED UNDER THE RED HOT BRAND HE MURMURED SOFTLY

Name: 06-777-126732-0028.wav
Transcript: YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND HE BEGAN DISDAINFULLY BUT STOPPED SHORT INTIMIDATED BY THE DEAD BLACKNESS OF THE CAVERNOUS EYES IN THE FACE TURNED SLOWLY TOWARDS HIM WITH A BLIND STARE AS IF GUIDED ONLY BY THE SOUND

Name: 06-777-126732-0029.wav
Transcript: HE GAVE THE DISCUSSION UP WITH A SLIGHT SHRUG OF THE SHOULDERS

Name: 06-777-126732-0030.wav
Transcript: STEVIE ACCUSTOMED TO MOVE ABOUT DISREGARDED HAD GOT UP FROM THE KITCHEN TABLE CARRYING OFF HIS DRAWING TO BED WITH HIM

Name: 06-777-126732-0031.wav
Transcript: THE SHEET OF PAPER COVERED WITH CIRCLES DROPPED OUT OF HIS FINGERS AND HE REMAINED STARING AT THE OLD TERRORIST AS IF ROOTED SUDDENLY TO THE SPOT BY HIS MORBID HORROR AND DREAD OF PHYSICAL PAIN

Name: 06-777-126732-0032.wav
Transcript: HIS SCARED EYES BLAZED WITH INDIGNATION IT WOULD HURT TERRIBLY HIS MOUTH DROPPED OPEN

Name: 06-777-126732-0033.wav
Transcript: COMRADE OSSIPON'S FACE TWITCHED WITH EXASPERATION

Name: 06-777-126732-0034.wav
Transcript: I DON'T SAY THAT PROTESTED MICHAELIS GENTLY

Name: 06-777-126732-0035.wav
Transcript: HIS VISION OF TRUTH HAD GROWN SO INTENSE THAT THE SOUND OF A STRANGE VOICE FAILED TO ROUT IT THIS TIME

Name: 06-777-126732-0036.wav
Transcript: THE COALS IN THE GRATE SETTLED DOWN WITH A SLIGHT CRASH AND MICHAELIS THE HERMIT OF VISIONS IN THE DESERT OF A PENITENTIARY GOT UP IMPETUOUSLY

Name: 06-777-126732-0037.wav
Transcript: THE DISDAINFUL POUT OF COMRADE OSSIPON'S THICK LIPS ACCENTUATED THE NEGRO TYPE OF HIS FACE

Name: 06-777-126732-0038.wav
Transcript: HE PAUSED THEN ADDED WITH MODEST FIRMNESS

Name: 06-777-126732-0039.wav
Transcript: I WOULD CALL IT CANNIBALISTIC THAT'S WHAT IT IS

Name: 06-777-126732-0040.wav
Transcript: THEY ARE NOURISHING THEIR GREED ON THE QUIVERING FLESH AND THE WARM BLOOD OF THE PEOPLE NOTHING ELSE

Name: 06-777-126732-0041.wav
Transcript: STEVIE SWALLOWED THE TERRIFYING STATEMENT WITH AN AUDIBLE GULP AND AT ONCE AS THOUGH IT HAD BEEN SWIFT POISON SANK LIMPLY IN A SITTING POSTURE ON THE STEPS OF THE KITCHEN DOOR

Name: 06-777-126732-0042.wav
Transcript: HE CLOSED THE DOOR BEHIND THEIR BACKS WITH RESTRAINED VIOLENCE TURNED THE KEY SHOT THE BOLT

Name: 06-777-126732-0043.wav
Transcript: HE WAS NOT SATISFIED WITH HIS FRIENDS

Name: 06-777-126732-0044.wav
Transcript: WITH THE INSIGHT OF A KINDRED TEMPERAMENT HE PRONOUNCED HIS VERDICT

Name: 06-777-126732-0045.wav
Transcript: THERE ARE NATURES TOO TO WHOSE SENSE OF JUSTICE THE PRICE EXACTED LOOMS UP MONSTROUSLY ENORMOUS ODIOUS OPPRESSIVE WORRYING HUMILIATING EXTORTIONATE INTOLERABLE THOSE ARE THE FANATICS

Name: 06-777-126732-0046.wav
Transcript: IN ANY CASE HE HAD NOT THE TIME

Name: 06-777-126732-0047.wav
Transcript: LOAFING WAS ALL VERY WELL FOR THESE FELLOWS WHO KNEW NOT MISTER VLADIMIR AND HAD WOMEN TO FALL BACK UPON WHEREAS HE HAD A WOMAN TO PROVIDE FOR

Name: 06-777-126732-0048.wav
Transcript: THESE WERE BUT FEW AND FOR THE FIRST TIME SINCE HE OPENED HIS SHOP HE TOOK A COMMERCIAL SURVEY OF ITS VALUE

Name: 06-777-126732-0049.wav
Transcript: THIS SURVEY WAS UNFAVOURABLE

Name: 07-777-126732-0034.wav
Transcript: I DON'T SAY THAT PROTESTED MICHAELIS GENTLY

Name: 07-777-126732-0035.wav
Transcript: HIS VISION OF TRUTH HAD GROWN SO INTENSE THAT THE SOUND OF A STRANGE VOICE FAILED TO ROUT IT THIS TIME

Name: 07-777-126732-0036.wav
Transcript: THE COALS IN THE GRATE SETTLED DOWN WITH A SLIGHT CRASH AND MICHAELIS THE HERMIT OF VISIONS IN THE DESERT OF A PENITENTIARY GOT UP IMPETUOUSLY

Name: 07-777-126732-0037.wav
Transcript: THE DISDAINFUL POUT OF COMRADE OSSIPON'S THICK LIPS ACCENTUATED THE NEGRO TYPE OF HIS FACE

Name: 07-777-126732-0038.wav
Transcript: HE PAUSED THEN ADDED WITH MODEST FIRMNESS

Name: 07-777-126732-0039.wav
Transcript: I WOULD CALL IT CANNIBALISTIC THAT'S WHAT IT IS

Name: 07-777-126732-0040.wav
Transcript: THEY ARE NOURISHING THEIR GREED ON THE QUIVERING FLESH AND THE WARM BLOOD OF THE PEOPLE NOTHING ELSE

Name: 07-777-126732-0041.wav
Transcript: STEVIE SWALLOWED THE TERRIFYING STATEMENT WITH AN AUDIBLE GULP AND AT ONCE AS THOUGH IT HAD BEEN SWIFT POISON SANK LIMPLY IN A SITTING POSTURE ON THE STEPS OF THE KITCHEN DOOR

Name: 07-777-126732-0042.wav
Transcript: HE CLOSED THE DOOR BEHIND THEIR BACKS WITH RESTRAINED VIOLENCE TURNED THE KEY SHOT THE BOLT

Name: 07-777-126732-0043.wav
Transcript: HE WAS NOT SATISFIED WITH HIS FRIENDS

Name: 07-777-126732-0044.wav
Transcript: WITH THE INSIGHT OF A KINDRED TEMPERAMENT HE PRONOUNCED HIS VERDICT

Name: 07-777-126732-0045.wav
Transcript: THERE ARE NATURES TOO TO WHOSE SENSE OF JUSTICE THE PRICE EXACTED LOOMS UP MONSTROUSLY ENORMOUS ODIOUS OPPRESSIVE WORRYING HUMILIATING EXTORTIONATE INTOLERABLE THOSE ARE THE FANATICS

Name: 07-777-126732-0046.wav
Transcript: IN ANY CASE HE HAD NOT THE TIME

Name: 07-777-126732-0047.wav
Transcript: LOAFING WAS ALL VERY WELL FOR THESE FELLOWS WHO KNEW NOT MISTER VLADIMIR AND HAD WOMEN TO FALL BACK UPON WHEREAS HE HAD A WOMAN TO PROVIDE FOR

Name: 07-777-126732-0048.wav
Transcript: THESE WERE BUT FEW AND FOR THE FIRST TIME SINCE HE OPENED HIS SHOP HE TOOK A COMMERCIAL SURVEY OF ITS VALUE

Name: 07-777-126732-0049.wav
Transcript: THIS SURVEY WAS UNFAVOURABLE

Name: 07-777-126732-0050.wav
Transcript: HE TOOK THE CASH BOX OUT OF THE DRAWER AND TURNING TO LEAVE THE SHOP BECAME AWARE THAT STEVIE WAS STILL DOWNSTAIRS

Name: 07-777-126732-0051.wav
Transcript: HE LOOKED DUBIOUSLY AT HIS BROTHER IN LAW BUT HE DID NOT ASK HIM FOR INFORMATION

Name: 07-777-126732-0052.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC PERCEIVED WITH SOME SURPRISE THAT HE DID NOT KNOW REALLY WHAT TO SAY TO STEVIE

Name: 07-777-126732-0053.wav
Transcript: HE STOOD STILL IN THE MIDDLE OF THE PARLOUR AND LOOKED INTO THE KITCHEN IN SILENCE

Name: 07-777-126732-0054.wav
Transcript: HE WATCHED HIM GESTICULATING AND MURMURING IN THE KITCHEN

Name: 07-777-126732-0055.wav
Transcript: STEVIE PROWLED ROUND THE TABLE LIKE AN EXCITED ANIMAL IN A CAGE

Name: 07-777-126732-0056.wav
Transcript: THE LIGHT THROWN DOWN BY THE SHADE FELL DAZZLINGLY ON THE WHITE PILLOW SUNK BY THE WEIGHT OF HER HEAD REPOSING WITH CLOSED EYES AND DARK HAIR DONE UP IN SEVERAL PLAITS FOR THE NIGHT

Name: 07-777-126732-0057.wav
Transcript: HER BARE FEET AS IF POKED THROUGH THE BOTTOM OF AN UNADORNED SLEEVED CALICO SACK BUTTONED TIGHTLY AT NECK AND WRISTS FELT OVER THE RUG FOR THE SLIPPERS WHILE SHE LOOKED UPWARD INTO HER HUSBAND'S FACE

Name: 07-777-126732-0058.wav
Transcript: THERE IS NO OCCUPATION THAT FAILS A MAN MORE COMPLETELY THAN THAT OF A SECRET AGENT OF POLICE

Name: 07-777-126732-0059.wav
Transcript: IT'S LIKE YOUR HORSE SUDDENLY FALLING DEAD UNDER YOU IN THE MIDST OF AN UNINHABITED AND THIRSTY PLAIN

Name: 07-777-126732-0060.wav
Transcript: THE COMPARISON OCCURRED TO MISTER VERLOC BECAUSE HE HAD SAT ASTRIDE VARIOUS ARMY HORSES IN HIS TIME AND HAD NOW THE SENSATION OF AN INCIPIENT FALL

Name: 07-777-126732-0061.wav
Transcript: THE PROSPECT WAS AS BLACK AS THE WINDOW PANE AGAINST WHICH HE WAS LEANING HIS FOREHEAD

Name: 07-777-126732-0062.wav
Transcript: YES NOT AT ALL WELL

Name: 07-777-126732-0063.wav
Transcript: DOWN BELOW IN THE QUIET NARROW STREET MEASURED FOOTSTEPS APPROACHED THE HOUSE THEN DIED AWAY UNHURRIED AND FIRM AS IF THE PASSER BY HAD STARTED TO PACE OUT ALL ETERNITY FROM GAS LAMP TO GAS LAMP IN A NIGHT WITHOUT END AND THE DROWSY TICKING OF THE OLD CLOCK ON THE LANDING BECAME DISTINCTLY AUDIBLE IN THE BEDROOM

Name: 07-777-126732-0064.wav
Transcript: THAT POOR BOY IS IN A VERY EXCITED STATE TO NIGHT SHE MURMURED AFTER A PAUSE WHICH LASTED FOR THREE TICKS OF THE CLOCK

Name: 07-777-126732-0065.wav
Transcript: THIS DREAD LED HIM TO MAKE THE REMARK THAT STEVIE HAD DISREGARDED HIS SUGGESTION TO GO TO BED

Name: 07-777-126732-0066.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO YOUNG MAN OF HIS AGE IN LONDON MORE WILLING AND DOCILE THAN STEPHEN SHE AFFIRMED NONE MORE AFFECTIONATE AND READY TO PLEASE AND EVEN USEFUL AS LONG AS PEOPLE DID NOT UPSET HIS POOR HEAD

Name: 07-777-126732-0067.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC'S ANXIETIES HAD PREVENTED HIM FROM ATTACHING ANY SENSE TO WHAT HIS WIFE WAS SAYING

Name: 07-777-126732-0068.wav
Transcript: THAT BOY HEARS TOO MUCH OF WHAT IS TALKED ABOUT HERE

Name: 07-777-126732-0069.wav
Transcript: IF I HAD KNOWN THEY WERE COMING TO NIGHT I WOULD HAVE SEEN TO IT THAT HE WENT TO BED AT THE SAME TIME I DID

Name: 07-777-126732-0070.wav
Transcript: HE WAS OUT OF HIS MIND WITH SOMETHING HE OVERHEARD ABOUT EATING PEOPLE'S FLESH AND DRINKING BLOOD WHAT'S THE GOOD OF TALKING LIKE THAT

Name: 07-777-126732-0071.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC WAS FULLY RESPONSIVE NOW

Name: 07-777-126732-0072.wav
Transcript: ASK KARL YUNDT HE GROWLED SAVAGELY

Name: 07-777-126732-0073.wav
Transcript: HE ISN'T FIT TO HEAR WHAT'S SAID HERE HE BELIEVES IT'S ALL TRUE

Name: 07-777-126732-0074.wav
Transcript: HE KNOWS NO BETTER HE GETS INTO HIS PASSIONS OVER IT

Name: 07-777-126732-0075.wav
Transcript: HE GLARED AT ME AS IF HE DIDN'T KNOW WHO I WAS WHEN I WENT DOWNSTAIRS

Name: 07-777-126732-0076.wav
Transcript: I WISH HE HAD NEVER BEEN TO SCHOOL MISSUS VERLOC BEGAN AGAIN BRUSQUELY

Name: 07-777-126732-0077.wav
Transcript: HE GETS A RED FACE PORING OVER THEM

Name: 07-777-126732-0078.wav
Transcript: I WOULDN'T GIVE A HALFPENNY FOR THE WHOLE LOT

Name: 07-777-126732-0079.wav
Transcript: THE OTHER DAY STEVIE GOT HOLD OF ONE AND THERE WAS A STORY IN IT OF A GERMAN SOLDIER OFFICER TEARING HALF OFF THE EAR OF A RECRUIT AND NOTHING WAS DONE TO HIM FOR IT THE BRUTE

Name: 07-777-126732-0080.wav
Transcript: HE CAN'T STAND THE NOTION OF ANY CRUELTY

Name: 07-777-126732-0081.wav
Transcript: COMFORTABLE DEAR

Name: 08-777-126732-0000.wav
Transcript: ALL IDEALISATION MAKES LIFE POORER

Name: 08-777-126732-0001.wav
Transcript: THEN WHY INDULGE IN PROPHETIC PHANTASIES

Name: 08-777-126732-0002.wav
Transcript: AT BEST THEY CAN ONLY INTERPRET THE MIND OF THE PROPHET AND CAN HAVE NO OBJECTIVE VALUE

Name: 08-777-126732-0003.wav
Transcript: MICHAELIS THE TICKET OF LEAVE APOSTLE WAS SPEAKING IN AN EVEN VOICE A VOICE THAT WHEEZED AS IF DEADENED AND OPPRESSED BY THE LAYER OF FAT ON HIS CHEST

Name: 08-777-126732-0004.wav
Transcript: AND EVER SINCE HE HAD NEVER MANAGED TO GET HIS WEIGHT DOWN AS MUCH AS AN OUNCE

Name: 08-777-126732-0005.wav
Transcript: WITH HIS ELBOW PRESENTING NO APPEARANCE OF A JOINT BUT MORE LIKE A BEND IN A DUMMY'S LIMB THROWN OVER THE BACK OF A CHAIR HE LEANED FORWARD SLIGHTLY OVER HIS SHORT AND ENORMOUS THIGHS TO SPIT INTO THE GRATE

Name: 08-777-126732-0006.wav
Transcript: YES I HAD THE TIME TO THINK THINGS OUT A LITTLE HE ADDED WITHOUT EMPHASIS

Name: 08-777-126732-0007.wav
Transcript: WHEN HE ROSE PAINFULLY THE THRUSTING FORWARD OF A SKINNY GROPING HAND DEFORMED BY GOUTY SWELLINGS SUGGESTED THE EFFORT OF A MORIBUND MURDERER SUMMONING ALL HIS REMAINING STRENGTH FOR A LAST STAB

Name: 08-777-126732-0008.wav
Transcript: HIS ENUNCIATION WOULD HAVE BEEN ALMOST TOTALLY UNINTELLIGIBLE TO A STRANGER

Name: 08-777-126732-0009.wav
Transcript: THE OLD TERRORIST TURNED SLOWLY HIS HEAD ON HIS SKINNY NECK FROM SIDE TO SIDE

Name: 08-777-126732-0010.wav
Transcript: AND I COULD NEVER GET AS MANY AS THREE SUCH MEN TOGETHER

Name: 08-777-126732-0011.wav
Transcript: THE POSSESSORS OF PROPERTY HAD NOT ONLY TO FACE THE AWAKENED PROLETARIAT BUT THEY HAD ALSO TO FIGHT AMONGST THEMSELVES YES

Name: 08-777-126732-0012.wav
Transcript: STRUGGLE WARFARE WAS THE CONDITION OF PRIVATE OWNERSHIP IT WAS FATAL

Name: 08-777-126732-0013.wav
Transcript: AH HE DID NOT DEPEND UPON EMOTIONAL EXCITEMENT TO KEEP UP HIS BELIEF NO DECLAMATIONS NO ANGER NO VISIONS OF BLOOD RED FLAGS WAVING OR METAPHORICAL LURID SUNS OF VENGEANCE RISING ABOVE THE HORIZON OF A DOOMED SOCIETY NOT HE

Name: 08-777-126732-0014.wav
Transcript: DON'T YOU THINK THAT IF I HAD NOT BEEN THE OPTIMIST I AM I COULD NOT HAVE FOUND IN FIFTEEN YEARS SOME MEANS TO CUT MY THROAT

Name: 08-777-126732-0015.wav
Transcript: A HARSH LAUGH FROM COMRADE OSSIPON CUT THE TIRADE DEAD SHORT IN A SUDDEN FALTERING OF THE TONGUE AND A BEWILDERED UNSTEADINESS OF THE APOSTLE'S MILDLY EXALTED EYES

Name: 08-777-126732-0016.wav
Transcript: ALEXANDER OSSIPON GOT UP TALL IN HIS THREADBARE BLUE SERGE SUIT UNDER THE LOW CEILING SHOOK OFF THE STIFFNESS OF LONG IMMOBILITY AND STROLLED AWAY INTO THE KITCHEN DOWN TWO STEPS TO LOOK OVER STEVIE'S SHOULDER

Name: 08-777-126732-0017.wav
Transcript: VERY CHARACTERISTIC PERFECTLY TYPICAL

Name: 08-777-126732-0018.wav
Transcript: YOU WOULD CALL THAT LAD A DEGENERATE WOULD YOU MUMBLED MISTER VERLOC

Name: 08-777-126732-0019.wav
Transcript: IT WAS KARL YUNDT WHO WAS HEARD IMPLACABLE TO HIS LAST BREATH

Name: 08-777-126732-0020.wav
Transcript: LOMBROSO IS AN ASS

Name: 08-777-126732-0021.wav
Transcript: FOR HIM THE CRIMINAL IS THE PRISONER SIMPLE IS IT NOT

Name: 08-777-126732-0022.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS AN EXTRAORDINARY FORCE OF SUGGESTION IN THIS POSTURING

Name: 08-777-126732-0023.wav
Transcript: THE FAMOUS TERRORIST HAD NEVER IN HIS LIFE RAISED PERSONALLY AS MUCH AS HIS LITTLE FINGER AGAINST THE SOCIAL EDIFICE

Name: 08-777-126732-0024.wav
Transcript: THE SHADOW OF HIS EVIL GIFT CLUNG TO HIM YET LIKE THE SMELL OF A DEADLY DRUG IN AN OLD VIAL OF POISON EMPTIED NOW USELESS READY TO BE THROWN AWAY UPON THE RUBBISH HEAP OF THINGS THAT HAD SERVED THEIR TIME

Name: 08-777-126732-0025.wav
Transcript: MICHAELIS THE TICKET OF LEAVE APOSTLE SMILED VAGUELY WITH HIS GLUED LIPS HIS PASTY MOON FACE DROOPED UNDER THE WEIGHT OF MELANCHOLY ASSENT

Name: 08-777-126732-0026.wav
Transcript: HE HAD BEEN A PRISONER HIMSELF

Name: 08-777-126732-0027.wav
Transcript: HIS OWN SKIN HAD SIZZLED UNDER THE RED HOT BRAND HE MURMURED SOFTLY

Name: 08-777-126732-0028.wav
Transcript: YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND HE BEGAN DISDAINFULLY BUT STOPPED SHORT INTIMIDATED BY THE DEAD BLACKNESS OF THE CAVERNOUS EYES IN THE FACE TURNED SLOWLY TOWARDS HIM WITH A BLIND STARE AS IF GUIDED ONLY BY THE SOUND

Name: 08-777-126732-0029.wav
Transcript: HE GAVE THE DISCUSSION UP WITH A SLIGHT SHRUG OF THE SHOULDERS

Name: 08-777-126732-0030.wav
Transcript: STEVIE ACCUSTOMED TO MOVE ABOUT DISREGARDED HAD GOT UP FROM THE KITCHEN TABLE CARRYING OFF HIS DRAWING TO BED WITH HIM

Name: 09-777-126732-0018.wav
Transcript: YOU WOULD CALL THAT LAD A DEGENERATE WOULD YOU MUMBLED MISTER VERLOC

Name: 09-777-126732-0019.wav
Transcript: IT WAS KARL YUNDT WHO WAS HEARD IMPLACABLE TO HIS LAST BREATH

Name: 09-777-126732-0020.wav
Transcript: LOMBROSO IS AN ASS

Name: 09-777-126732-0021.wav
Transcript: FOR HIM THE CRIMINAL IS THE PRISONER SIMPLE IS IT NOT

Name: 09-777-126732-0022.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS AN EXTRAORDINARY FORCE OF SUGGESTION IN THIS POSTURING

Name: 09-777-126732-0023.wav
Transcript: THE FAMOUS TERRORIST HAD NEVER IN HIS LIFE RAISED PERSONALLY AS MUCH AS HIS LITTLE FINGER AGAINST THE SOCIAL EDIFICE

Name: 09-777-126732-0024.wav
Transcript: THE SHADOW OF HIS EVIL GIFT CLUNG TO HIM YET LIKE THE SMELL OF A DEADLY DRUG IN AN OLD VIAL OF POISON EMPTIED NOW USELESS READY TO BE THROWN AWAY UPON THE RUBBISH HEAP OF THINGS THAT HAD SERVED THEIR TIME

Name: 09-777-126732-0025.wav
Transcript: MICHAELIS THE TICKET OF LEAVE APOSTLE SMILED VAGUELY WITH HIS GLUED LIPS HIS PASTY MOON FACE DROOPED UNDER THE WEIGHT OF MELANCHOLY ASSENT

Name: 09-777-126732-0026.wav
Transcript: HE HAD BEEN A PRISONER HIMSELF

Name: 09-777-126732-0027.wav
Transcript: HIS OWN SKIN HAD SIZZLED UNDER THE RED HOT BRAND HE MURMURED SOFTLY

Name: 09-777-126732-0028.wav
Transcript: YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND HE BEGAN DISDAINFULLY BUT STOPPED SHORT INTIMIDATED BY THE DEAD BLACKNESS OF THE CAVERNOUS EYES IN THE FACE TURNED SLOWLY TOWARDS HIM WITH A BLIND STARE AS IF GUIDED ONLY BY THE SOUND

Name: 09-777-126732-0029.wav
Transcript: HE GAVE THE DISCUSSION UP WITH A SLIGHT SHRUG OF THE SHOULDERS

Name: 09-777-126732-0030.wav
Transcript: STEVIE ACCUSTOMED TO MOVE ABOUT DISREGARDED HAD GOT UP FROM THE KITCHEN TABLE CARRYING OFF HIS DRAWING TO BED WITH HIM

Name: 09-777-126732-0031.wav
Transcript: THE SHEET OF PAPER COVERED WITH CIRCLES DROPPED OUT OF HIS FINGERS AND HE REMAINED STARING AT THE OLD TERRORIST AS IF ROOTED SUDDENLY TO THE SPOT BY HIS MORBID HORROR AND DREAD OF PHYSICAL PAIN

Name: 09-777-126732-0032.wav
Transcript: HIS SCARED EYES BLAZED WITH INDIGNATION IT WOULD HURT TERRIBLY HIS MOUTH DROPPED OPEN

Name: 09-777-126732-0033.wav
Transcript: COMRADE OSSIPON'S FACE TWITCHED WITH EXASPERATION

Name: 09-777-126732-0034.wav
Transcript: I DON'T SAY THAT PROTESTED MICHAELIS GENTLY

Name: 09-777-126732-0035.wav
Transcript: HIS VISION OF TRUTH HAD GROWN SO INTENSE THAT THE SOUND OF A STRANGE VOICE FAILED TO ROUT IT THIS TIME

Name: 09-777-126732-0036.wav
Transcript: THE COALS IN THE GRATE SETTLED DOWN WITH A SLIGHT CRASH AND MICHAELIS THE HERMIT OF VISIONS IN THE DESERT OF A PENITENTIARY GOT UP IMPETUOUSLY

Name: 09-777-126732-0037.wav
Transcript: THE DISDAINFUL POUT OF COMRADE OSSIPON'S THICK LIPS ACCENTUATED THE NEGRO TYPE OF HIS FACE

Name: 09-777-126732-0038.wav
Transcript: HE PAUSED THEN ADDED WITH MODEST FIRMNESS

Name: 09-777-126732-0039.wav
Transcript: I WOULD CALL IT CANNIBALISTIC THAT'S WHAT IT IS

Name: 09-777-126732-0040.wav
Transcript: THEY ARE NOURISHING THEIR GREED ON THE QUIVERING FLESH AND THE WARM BLOOD OF THE PEOPLE NOTHING ELSE

Name: 09-777-126732-0041.wav
Transcript: STEVIE SWALLOWED THE TERRIFYING STATEMENT WITH AN AUDIBLE GULP AND AT ONCE AS THOUGH IT HAD BEEN SWIFT POISON SANK LIMPLY IN A SITTING POSTURE ON THE STEPS OF THE KITCHEN DOOR

Name: 09-777-126732-0042.wav
Transcript: HE CLOSED THE DOOR BEHIND THEIR BACKS WITH RESTRAINED VIOLENCE TURNED THE KEY SHOT THE BOLT

Name: 09-777-126732-0043.wav
Transcript: HE WAS NOT SATISFIED WITH HIS FRIENDS

Name: 09-777-126732-0044.wav
Transcript: WITH THE INSIGHT OF A KINDRED TEMPERAMENT HE PRONOUNCED HIS VERDICT

Name: 09-777-126732-0045.wav
Transcript: THERE ARE NATURES TOO TO WHOSE SENSE OF JUSTICE THE PRICE EXACTED LOOMS UP MONSTROUSLY ENORMOUS ODIOUS OPPRESSIVE WORRYING HUMILIATING EXTORTIONATE INTOLERABLE THOSE ARE THE FANATICS

Name: 09-777-126732-0046.wav
Transcript: IN ANY CASE HE HAD NOT THE TIME

Name: 09-777-126732-0047.wav
Transcript: LOAFING WAS ALL VERY WELL FOR THESE FELLOWS WHO KNEW NOT MISTER VLADIMIR AND HAD WOMEN TO FALL BACK UPON WHEREAS HE HAD A WOMAN TO PROVIDE FOR

Name: 09-777-126732-0048.wav
Transcript: THESE WERE BUT FEW AND FOR THE FIRST TIME SINCE HE OPENED HIS SHOP HE TOOK A COMMERCIAL SURVEY OF ITS VALUE

Name: 09-777-126732-0049.wav
Transcript: THIS SURVEY WAS UNFAVOURABLE

Name: 09-777-126732-0050.wav
Transcript: HE TOOK THE CASH BOX OUT OF THE DRAWER AND TURNING TO LEAVE THE SHOP BECAME AWARE THAT STEVIE WAS STILL DOWNSTAIRS

Name: 09-777-126732-0051.wav
Transcript: HE LOOKED DUBIOUSLY AT HIS BROTHER IN LAW BUT HE DID NOT ASK HIM FOR INFORMATION

Name: 09-777-126732-0052.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC PERCEIVED WITH SOME SURPRISE THAT HE DID NOT KNOW REALLY WHAT TO SAY TO STEVIE

Name: 09-777-126732-0053.wav
Transcript: HE STOOD STILL IN THE MIDDLE OF THE PARLOUR AND LOOKED INTO THE KITCHEN IN SILENCE

Name: 09-777-126732-0054.wav
Transcript: HE WATCHED HIM GESTICULATING AND MURMURING IN THE KITCHEN

Name: 09-777-126732-0055.wav
Transcript: STEVIE PROWLED ROUND THE TABLE LIKE AN EXCITED ANIMAL IN A CAGE

Name: 09-777-126732-0056.wav
Transcript: THE LIGHT THROWN DOWN BY THE SHADE FELL DAZZLINGLY ON THE WHITE PILLOW SUNK BY THE WEIGHT OF HER HEAD REPOSING WITH CLOSED EYES AND DARK HAIR DONE UP IN SEVERAL PLAITS FOR THE NIGHT

Name: 09-777-126732-0057.wav
Transcript: HER BARE FEET AS IF POKED THROUGH THE BOTTOM OF AN UNADORNED SLEEVED CALICO SACK BUTTONED TIGHTLY AT NECK AND WRISTS FELT OVER THE RUG FOR THE SLIPPERS WHILE SHE LOOKED UPWARD INTO HER HUSBAND'S FACE

Name: 09-777-126732-0058.wav
Transcript: THERE IS NO OCCUPATION THAT FAILS A MAN MORE COMPLETELY THAN THAT OF A SECRET AGENT OF POLICE

Name: 09-777-126732-0059.wav
Transcript: IT'S LIKE YOUR HORSE SUDDENLY FALLING DEAD UNDER YOU IN THE MIDST OF AN UNINHABITED AND THIRSTY PLAIN

Name: 09-777-126732-0060.wav
Transcript: THE COMPARISON OCCURRED TO MISTER VERLOC BECAUSE HE HAD SAT ASTRIDE VARIOUS ARMY HORSES IN HIS TIME AND HAD NOW THE SENSATION OF AN INCIPIENT FALL

Name: 09-777-126732-0061.wav
Transcript: THE PROSPECT WAS AS BLACK AS THE WINDOW PANE AGAINST WHICH HE WAS LEANING HIS FOREHEAD

Name: 09-777-126732-0062.wav
Transcript: YES NOT AT ALL WELL

Name: 09-777-126732-0063.wav
Transcript: DOWN BELOW IN THE QUIET NARROW STREET MEASURED FOOTSTEPS APPROACHED THE HOUSE THEN DIED AWAY UNHURRIED AND FIRM AS IF THE PASSER BY HAD STARTED TO PACE OUT ALL ETERNITY FROM GAS LAMP TO GAS LAMP IN A NIGHT WITHOUT END AND THE DROWSY TICKING OF THE OLD CLOCK ON THE LANDING BECAME DISTINCTLY AUDIBLE IN THE BEDROOM

Name: 09-777-126732-0064.wav
Transcript: THAT POOR BOY IS IN A VERY EXCITED STATE TO NIGHT SHE MURMURED AFTER A PAUSE WHICH LASTED FOR THREE TICKS OF THE CLOCK

Name: 09-777-126732-0065.wav
Transcript: THIS DREAD LED HIM TO MAKE THE REMARK THAT STEVIE HAD DISREGARDED HIS SUGGESTION TO GO TO BED

Name: 09-777-126732-0066.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO YOUNG MAN OF HIS AGE IN LONDON MORE WILLING AND DOCILE THAN STEPHEN SHE AFFIRMED NONE MORE AFFECTIONATE AND READY TO PLEASE AND EVEN USEFUL AS LONG AS PEOPLE DID NOT UPSET HIS POOR HEAD

Name: 09-777-126732-0067.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC'S ANXIETIES HAD PREVENTED HIM FROM ATTACHING ANY SENSE TO WHAT HIS WIFE WAS SAYING

Name: 09-777-126732-0068.wav
Transcript: THAT BOY HEARS TOO MUCH OF WHAT IS TALKED ABOUT HERE

Name: 09-777-126732-0069.wav
Transcript: IF I HAD KNOWN THEY WERE COMING TO NIGHT I WOULD HAVE SEEN TO IT THAT HE WENT TO BED AT THE SAME TIME I DID

Name: 09-777-126732-0070.wav
Transcript: HE WAS OUT OF HIS MIND WITH SOMETHING HE OVERHEARD ABOUT EATING PEOPLE'S FLESH AND DRINKING BLOOD WHAT'S THE GOOD OF TALKING LIKE THAT

Name: 09-777-126732-0071.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC WAS FULLY RESPONSIVE NOW

Name: 09-777-126732-0072.wav
Transcript: ASK KARL YUNDT HE GROWLED SAVAGELY

Name: 09-777-126732-0073.wav
Transcript: HE ISN'T FIT TO HEAR WHAT'S SAID HERE HE BELIEVES IT'S ALL TRUE

Name: 09-777-126732-0074.wav
Transcript: HE KNOWS NO BETTER HE GETS INTO HIS PASSIONS OVER IT

Name: 09-777-126732-0075.wav
Transcript: HE GLARED AT ME AS IF HE DIDN'T KNOW WHO I WAS WHEN I WENT DOWNSTAIRS

Name: 09-777-126732-0076.wav
Transcript: I WISH HE HAD NEVER BEEN TO SCHOOL MISSUS VERLOC BEGAN AGAIN BRUSQUELY

Name: 09-777-126732-0077.wav
Transcript: HE GETS A RED FACE PORING OVER THEM

Name: 09-777-126732-0078.wav
Transcript: I WOULDN'T GIVE A HALFPENNY FOR THE WHOLE LOT

Name: 09-777-126732-0079.wav
Transcript: THE OTHER DAY STEVIE GOT HOLD OF ONE AND THERE WAS A STORY IN IT OF A GERMAN SOLDIER OFFICER TEARING HALF OFF THE EAR OF A RECRUIT AND NOTHING WAS DONE TO HIM FOR IT THE BRUTE

Name: 09-777-126732-0080.wav
Transcript: HE CAN'T STAND THE NOTION OF ANY CRUELTY

Name: 09-777-126732-0081.wav
Transcript: COMFORTABLE DEAR

Name: 10-777-126732-0000.wav
Transcript: ALL IDEALISATION MAKES LIFE POORER

Name: 10-777-126732-0001.wav
Transcript: THEN WHY INDULGE IN PROPHETIC PHANTASIES

Name: 10-777-126732-0002.wav
Transcript: AT BEST THEY CAN ONLY INTERPRET THE MIND OF THE PROPHET AND CAN HAVE NO OBJECTIVE VALUE

Name: 10-777-126732-0003.wav
Transcript: MICHAELIS THE TICKET OF LEAVE APOSTLE WAS SPEAKING IN AN EVEN VOICE A VOICE THAT WHEEZED AS IF DEADENED AND OPPRESSED BY THE LAYER OF FAT ON HIS CHEST

Name: 10-777-126732-0004.wav
Transcript: AND EVER SINCE HE HAD NEVER MANAGED TO GET HIS WEIGHT DOWN AS MUCH AS AN OUNCE

Name: 10-777-126732-0005.wav
Transcript: WITH HIS ELBOW PRESENTING NO APPEARANCE OF A JOINT BUT MORE LIKE A BEND IN A DUMMY'S LIMB THROWN OVER THE BACK OF A CHAIR HE LEANED FORWARD SLIGHTLY OVER HIS SHORT AND ENORMOUS THIGHS TO SPIT INTO THE GRATE

Name: 10-777-126732-0006.wav
Transcript: YES I HAD THE TIME TO THINK THINGS OUT A LITTLE HE ADDED WITHOUT EMPHASIS

Name: 10-777-126732-0007.wav
Transcript: WHEN HE ROSE PAINFULLY THE THRUSTING FORWARD OF A SKINNY GROPING HAND DEFORMED BY GOUTY SWELLINGS SUGGESTED THE EFFORT OF A MORIBUND MURDERER SUMMONING ALL HIS REMAINING STRENGTH FOR A LAST STAB

Name: 10-777-126732-0008.wav
Transcript: HIS ENUNCIATION WOULD HAVE BEEN ALMOST TOTALLY UNINTELLIGIBLE TO A STRANGER

Name: 10-777-126732-0009.wav
Transcript: THE OLD TERRORIST TURNED SLOWLY HIS HEAD ON HIS SKINNY NECK FROM SIDE TO SIDE

Name: 10-777-126732-0010.wav
Transcript: AND I COULD NEVER GET AS MANY AS THREE SUCH MEN TOGETHER

Name: 10-777-126732-0011.wav
Transcript: THE POSSESSORS OF PROPERTY HAD NOT ONLY TO FACE THE AWAKENED PROLETARIAT BUT THEY HAD ALSO TO FIGHT AMONGST THEMSELVES YES

Name: 10-777-126732-0012.wav
Transcript: STRUGGLE WARFARE WAS THE CONDITION OF PRIVATE OWNERSHIP IT WAS FATAL

Name: 10-777-126732-0013.wav
Transcript: AH HE DID NOT DEPEND UPON EMOTIONAL EXCITEMENT TO KEEP UP HIS BELIEF NO DECLAMATIONS NO ANGER NO VISIONS OF BLOOD RED FLAGS WAVING OR METAPHORICAL LURID SUNS OF VENGEANCE RISING ABOVE THE HORIZON OF A DOOMED SOCIETY NOT HE

Name: 10-777-126732-0014.wav
Transcript: DON'T YOU THINK THAT IF I HAD NOT BEEN THE OPTIMIST I AM I COULD NOT HAVE FOUND IN FIFTEEN YEARS SOME MEANS TO CUT MY THROAT

Name: 10-777-126732-0015.wav
Transcript: A HARSH LAUGH FROM COMRADE OSSIPON CUT THE TIRADE DEAD SHORT IN A SUDDEN FALTERING OF THE TONGUE AND A BEWILDERED UNSTEADINESS OF THE APOSTLE'S MILDLY EXALTED EYES

Name: 10-777-126732-0016.wav
Transcript: ALEXANDER OSSIPON GOT UP TALL IN HIS THREADBARE BLUE SERGE SUIT UNDER THE LOW CEILING SHOOK OFF THE STIFFNESS OF LONG IMMOBILITY AND STROLLED AWAY INTO THE KITCHEN DOWN TWO STEPS TO LOOK OVER STEVIE'S SHOULDER

Transcript: AND EVER SINCE HE HAD NEVER MANAGED TO GET HIS WEIGHT DOWN AS MUCH AS AN OUNCE

Name: 777-126732-0005.wav
Transcript: WITH HIS ELBOW PRESENTING NO APPEARANCE OF A JOINT BUT MORE LIKE A BEND IN A DUMMY'S LIMB THROWN OVER THE BACK OF A CHAIR HE LEANED FORWARD SLIGHTLY OVER HIS SHORT AND ENORMOUS THIGHS TO SPIT INTO THE GRATE

Name: 777-126732-0006.wav
Transcript: YES I HAD THE TIME TO THINK THINGS OUT A LITTLE HE ADDED WITHOUT EMPHASIS

Name: 777-126732-0007.wav
Transcript: WHEN HE ROSE PAINFULLY THE THRUSTING FORWARD OF A SKINNY GROPING HAND DEFORMED BY GOUTY SWELLINGS SUGGESTED THE EFFORT OF A MORIBUND MURDERER SUMMONING ALL HIS REMAINING STRENGTH FOR A LAST STAB

Name: 777-126732-0008.wav
Transcript: HIS ENUNCIATION WOULD HAVE BEEN ALMOST TOTALLY UNINTELLIGIBLE TO A STRANGER

Name: 777-126732-0009.wav
Transcript: THE OLD TERRORIST TURNED SLOWLY HIS HEAD ON HIS SKINNY NECK FROM SIDE TO SIDE

Name: 777-126732-0010.wav
Transcript: AND I COULD NEVER GET AS MANY AS THREE SUCH MEN TOGETHER

Name: 777-126732-0011.wav
Transcript: THE POSSESSORS OF PROPERTY HAD NOT ONLY TO FACE THE AWAKENED PROLETARIAT BUT THEY HAD ALSO TO FIGHT AMONGST THEMSELVES YES

Name: 777-126732-0012.wav
Transcript: STRUGGLE WARFARE WAS THE CONDITION OF PRIVATE OWNERSHIP IT WAS FATAL

Name: 777-126732-0013.wav
Transcript: AH HE DID NOT DEPEND UPON EMOTIONAL EXCITEMENT TO KEEP UP HIS BELIEF NO DECLAMATIONS NO ANGER NO VISIONS OF BLOOD RED FLAGS WAVING OR METAPHORICAL LURID SUNS OF VENGEANCE RISING ABOVE THE HORIZON OF A DOOMED SOCIETY NOT HE

Name: 777-126732-0014.wav
Transcript: DON'T YOU THINK THAT IF I HAD NOT BEEN THE OPTIMIST I AM I COULD NOT HAVE FOUND IN FIFTEEN YEARS SOME MEANS TO CUT MY THROAT

Name: 777-126732-0015.wav
Transcript: A HARSH LAUGH FROM COMRADE OSSIPON CUT THE TIRADE DEAD SHORT IN A SUDDEN FALTERING OF THE TONGUE AND A BEWILDERED UNSTEADINESS OF THE APOSTLE'S MILDLY EXALTED EYES

Name: 777-126732-0016.wav
Transcript: ALEXANDER OSSIPON GOT UP TALL IN HIS THREADBARE BLUE SERGE SUIT UNDER THE LOW CEILING SHOOK OFF THE STIFFNESS OF LONG IMMOBILITY AND STROLLED AWAY INTO THE KITCHEN DOWN TWO STEPS TO LOOK OVER STEVIE'S SHOULDER

Name: 777-126732-0017.wav
Transcript: VERY CHARACTERISTIC PERFECTLY TYPICAL

Name: 777-126732-0018.wav
Transcript: YOU WOULD CALL THAT LAD A DEGENERATE WOULD YOU MUMBLED MISTER VERLOC

Name: 777-126732-0019.wav
Transcript: IT WAS KARL YUNDT WHO WAS HEARD IMPLACABLE TO HIS LAST BREATH

Name: 777-126732-0020.wav
Transcript: LOMBROSO IS AN ASS

Name: 777-126732-0021.wav
Transcript: FOR HIM THE CRIMINAL IS THE PRISONER SIMPLE IS IT NOT

Name: 777-126732-0022.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS AN EXTRAORDINARY FORCE OF SUGGESTION IN THIS POSTURING

Name: 777-126732-0023.wav
Transcript: THE FAMOUS TERRORIST HAD NEVER IN HIS LIFE RAISED PERSONALLY AS MUCH AS HIS LITTLE FINGER AGAINST THE SOCIAL EDIFICE

Name: 777-126732-0024.wav
Transcript: THE SHADOW OF HIS EVIL GIFT CLUNG TO HIM YET LIKE THE SMELL OF A DEADLY DRUG IN AN OLD VIAL OF POISON EMPTIED NOW USELESS READY TO BE THROWN AWAY UPON THE RUBBISH HEAP OF THINGS THAT HAD SERVED THEIR TIME

Name: 777-126732-0025.wav
Transcript: MICHAELIS THE TICKET OF LEAVE APOSTLE SMILED VAGUELY WITH HIS GLUED LIPS HIS PASTY MOON FACE DROOPED UNDER THE WEIGHT OF MELANCHOLY ASSENT

Name: 777-126732-0026.wav
Transcript: HE HAD BEEN A PRISONER HIMSELF

Name: 777-126732-0027.wav
Transcript: HIS OWN SKIN HAD SIZZLED UNDER THE RED HOT BRAND HE MURMURED SOFTLY

Name: 777-126732-0028.wav
Transcript: YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND HE BEGAN DISDAINFULLY BUT STOPPED SHORT INTIMIDATED BY THE DEAD BLACKNESS OF THE CAVERNOUS EYES IN THE FACE TURNED SLOWLY TOWARDS HIM WITH A BLIND STARE AS IF GUIDED ONLY BY THE SOUND

Name: 777-126732-0029.wav
Transcript: HE GAVE THE DISCUSSION UP WITH A SLIGHT SHRUG OF THE SHOULDERS

Name: 777-126732-0030.wav
Transcript: STEVIE ACCUSTOMED TO MOVE ABOUT DISREGARDED HAD GOT UP FROM THE KITCHEN TABLE CARRYING OFF HIS DRAWING TO BED WITH HIM

Name: 777-126732-0031.wav
Transcript: THE SHEET OF PAPER COVERED WITH CIRCLES DROPPED OUT OF HIS FINGERS AND HE REMAINED STARING AT THE OLD TERRORIST AS IF ROOTED SUDDENLY TO THE SPOT BY HIS MORBID HORROR AND DREAD OF PHYSICAL PAIN

Name: 777-126732-0032.wav
Transcript: HIS SCARED EYES BLAZED WITH INDIGNATION IT WOULD HURT TERRIBLY HIS MOUTH DROPPED OPEN

Name: 777-126732-0033.wav
Transcript: COMRADE OSSIPON'S FACE TWITCHED WITH EXASPERATION

Name: 777-126732-0034.wav
Transcript: I DON'T SAY THAT PROTESTED MICHAELIS GENTLY

Name: 777-126732-0035.wav
Transcript: HIS VISION OF TRUTH HAD GROWN SO INTENSE THAT THE SOUND OF A STRANGE VOICE FAILED TO ROUT IT THIS TIME

Name: 777-126732-0036.wav
Transcript: THE COALS IN THE GRATE SETTLED DOWN WITH A SLIGHT CRASH AND MICHAELIS THE HERMIT OF VISIONS IN THE DESERT OF A PENITENTIARY GOT UP IMPETUOUSLY

Name: 777-126732-0037.wav
Transcript: THE DISDAINFUL POUT OF COMRADE OSSIPON'S THICK LIPS ACCENTUATED THE NEGRO TYPE OF HIS FACE

Name: 777-126732-0038.wav
Transcript: HE PAUSED THEN ADDED WITH MODEST FIRMNESS

Name: 777-126732-0039.wav
Transcript: I WOULD CALL IT CANNIBALISTIC THAT'S WHAT IT IS

Name: 777-126732-0040.wav
Transcript: THEY ARE NOURISHING THEIR GREED ON THE QUIVERING FLESH AND THE WARM BLOOD OF THE PEOPLE NOTHING ELSE

Name: 777-126732-0041.wav
Transcript: STEVIE SWALLOWED THE TERRIFYING STATEMENT WITH AN AUDIBLE GULP AND AT ONCE AS THOUGH IT HAD BEEN SWIFT POISON SANK LIMPLY IN A SITTING POSTURE ON THE STEPS OF THE KITCHEN DOOR

Name: 777-126732-0042.wav
Transcript: HE CLOSED THE DOOR BEHIND THEIR BACKS WITH RESTRAINED VIOLENCE TURNED THE KEY SHOT THE BOLT

Name: 777-126732-0043.wav
Transcript: HE WAS NOT SATISFIED WITH HIS FRIENDS

Name: 777-126732-0044.wav
Transcript: WITH THE INSIGHT OF A KINDRED TEMPERAMENT HE PRONOUNCED HIS VERDICT

Name: 777-126732-0045.wav
Transcript: THERE ARE NATURES TOO TO WHOSE SENSE OF JUSTICE THE PRICE EXACTED LOOMS UP MONSTROUSLY ENORMOUS ODIOUS OPPRESSIVE WORRYING HUMILIATING EXTORTIONATE INTOLERABLE THOSE ARE THE FANATICS

Name: 777-126732-0046.wav
Transcript: IN ANY CASE HE HAD NOT THE TIME

Name: 777-126732-0047.wav
Transcript: LOAFING WAS ALL VERY WELL FOR THESE FELLOWS WHO KNEW NOT MISTER VLADIMIR AND HAD WOMEN TO FALL BACK UPON WHEREAS HE HAD A WOMAN TO PROVIDE FOR

Name: 777-126732-0048.wav
Transcript: THESE WERE BUT FEW AND FOR THE FIRST TIME SINCE HE OPENED HIS SHOP HE TOOK A COMMERCIAL SURVEY OF ITS VALUE

Name: 777-126732-0049.wav
Transcript: THIS SURVEY WAS UNFAVOURABLE

Name: 777-126732-0050.wav
Transcript: HE TOOK THE CASH BOX OUT OF THE DRAWER AND TURNING TO LEAVE THE SHOP BECAME AWARE THAT STEVIE WAS STILL DOWNSTAIRS

Name: 777-126732-0051.wav
Transcript: HE LOOKED DUBIOUSLY AT HIS BROTHER IN LAW BUT HE DID NOT ASK HIM FOR INFORMATION

Name: 777-126732-0052.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC PERCEIVED WITH SOME SURPRISE THAT HE DID NOT KNOW REALLY WHAT TO SAY TO STEVIE

Name: 777-126732-0053.wav
Transcript: HE STOOD STILL IN THE MIDDLE OF THE PARLOUR AND LOOKED INTO THE KITCHEN IN SILENCE

Name: 777-126732-0054.wav
Transcript: HE WATCHED HIM GESTICULATING AND MURMURING IN THE KITCHEN

Name: 777-126732-0055.wav
Transcript: STEVIE PROWLED ROUND THE TABLE LIKE AN EXCITED ANIMAL IN A CAGE

Name: 777-126732-0056.wav
Transcript: THE LIGHT THROWN DOWN BY THE SHADE FELL DAZZLINGLY ON THE WHITE PILLOW SUNK BY THE WEIGHT OF HER HEAD REPOSING WITH CLOSED EYES AND DARK HAIR DONE UP IN SEVERAL PLAITS FOR THE NIGHT

Name: 777-126732-0057.wav
Transcript: HER BARE FEET AS IF POKED THROUGH THE BOTTOM OF AN UNADORNED SLEEVED CALICO SACK BUTTONED TIGHTLY AT NECK AND WRISTS FELT OVER THE RUG FOR THE SLIPPERS WHILE SHE LOOKED UPWARD INTO HER HUSBAND'S FACE

Name: 777-126732-0058.wav
Transcript: THERE IS NO OCCUPATION THAT FAILS A MAN MORE COMPLETELY THAN THAT OF A SECRET AGENT OF POLICE

Name: 777-126732-0059.wav
Transcript: IT'S LIKE YOUR HORSE SUDDENLY FALLING DEAD UNDER YOU IN THE MIDST OF AN UNINHABITED AND THIRSTY PLAIN

Name: 777-126732-0060.wav
Transcript: THE COMPARISON OCCURRED TO MISTER VERLOC BECAUSE HE HAD SAT ASTRIDE VARIOUS ARMY HORSES IN HIS TIME AND HAD NOW THE SENSATION OF AN INCIPIENT FALL

Name: 777-126732-0061.wav
Transcript: THE PROSPECT WAS AS BLACK AS THE WINDOW PANE AGAINST WHICH HE WAS LEANING HIS FOREHEAD

Name: 777-126732-0062.wav
Transcript: YES NOT AT ALL WELL

Name: 777-126732-0063.wav
Transcript: DOWN BELOW IN THE QUIET NARROW STREET MEASURED FOOTSTEPS APPROACHED THE HOUSE THEN DIED AWAY UNHURRIED AND FIRM AS IF THE PASSER BY HAD STARTED TO PACE OUT ALL ETERNITY FROM GAS LAMP TO GAS LAMP IN A NIGHT WITHOUT END AND THE DROWSY TICKING OF THE OLD CLOCK ON THE LANDING BECAME DISTINCTLY AUDIBLE IN THE BEDROOM

Name: 777-126732-0064.wav
Transcript: THAT POOR BOY IS IN A VERY EXCITED STATE TO NIGHT SHE MURMURED AFTER A PAUSE WHICH LASTED FOR THREE TICKS OF THE CLOCK

Name: 777-126732-0065.wav
Transcript: THIS DREAD LED HIM TO MAKE THE REMARK THAT STEVIE HAD DISREGARDED HIS SUGGESTION TO GO TO BED

Name: 777-126732-0066.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO YOUNG MAN OF HIS AGE IN LONDON MORE WILLING AND DOCILE THAN STEPHEN SHE AFFIRMED NONE MORE AFFECTIONATE AND READY TO PLEASE AND EVEN USEFUL AS LONG AS PEOPLE DID NOT UPSET HIS POOR HEAD

Name: 777-126732-0067.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC'S ANXIETIES HAD PREVENTED HIM FROM ATTACHING ANY SENSE TO WHAT HIS WIFE WAS SAYING

Name: 777-126732-0068.wav
Transcript: THAT BOY HEARS TOO MUCH OF WHAT IS TALKED ABOUT HERE

Name: 777-126732-0069.wav
Transcript: IF I HAD KNOWN THEY WERE COMING TO NIGHT I WOULD HAVE SEEN TO IT THAT HE WENT TO BED AT THE SAME TIME I DID

Name: 777-126732-0070.wav
Transcript: HE WAS OUT OF HIS MIND WITH SOMETHING HE OVERHEARD ABOUT EATING PEOPLE'S FLESH AND DRINKING BLOOD WHAT'S THE GOOD OF TALKING LIKE THAT

Name: 777-126732-0071.wav
Transcript: MISTER VERLOC WAS FULLY RESPONSIVE NOW

Name: 777-126732-0072.wav
Transcript: ASK KARL YUNDT HE GROWLED SAVAGELY

Name: 777-126732-0073.wav
Transcript: HE ISN'T FIT TO HEAR WHAT'S SAID HERE HE BELIEVES IT'S ALL TRUE

Name: 777-126732-0074.wav
Transcript: HE KNOWS NO BETTER HE GETS INTO HIS PASSIONS OVER IT

Name: 777-126732-0075.wav
Transcript: HE GLARED AT ME AS IF HE DIDN'T KNOW WHO I WAS WHEN I WENT DOWNSTAIRS

Name: 777-126732-0076.wav
Transcript: I WISH HE HAD NEVER BEEN TO SCHOOL MISSUS VERLOC BEGAN AGAIN BRUSQUELY

Name: 777-126732-0077.wav
Transcript: HE GETS A RED FACE PORING OVER THEM

Name: 777-126732-0078.wav
Transcript: I WOULDN'T GIVE A HALFPENNY FOR THE WHOLE LOT

Name: 777-126732-0079.wav
Transcript: THE OTHER DAY STEVIE GOT HOLD OF ONE AND THERE WAS A STORY IN IT OF A GERMAN SOLDIER OFFICER TEARING HALF OFF THE EAR OF A RECRUIT AND NOTHING WAS DONE TO HIM FOR IT THE BRUTE

Name: 777-126732-0080.wav
Transcript: HE CAN'T STAND THE NOTION OF ANY CRUELTY

Name: 777-126732-0081.wav
Transcript: COMFORTABLE DEAR

Name: 01-652-129742-0000.wav
Transcript: ASPARAGUS SALAD COOK THE ASPARAGUS IN SALTED WATER DRAIN AND CHILL

Name: 01-652-129742-0001.wav
Transcript: BIRDS NEST SALAD HAVE READY AS MANY CRISP LEAVES OF LETTUCE AS MAY BE REQUIRED TO MAKE A DAINTY LITTLE NEST FOR EACH PERSON

Name: 01-652-129742-0002.wav
Transcript: SERVE WITH FRENCH DRESSING HIDDEN UNDER THE LEAVES OF THE NEST

Name: 01-652-129742-0003.wav
Transcript: CABBAGE SALAD CHOP OR SHAVE FINE HALF A MEDIUM SIZE HEAD OF CABBAGE THAT HAS BEEN LEFT IN COLD WATER UNTIL CRISP THEN DRAIN

Name: 01-652-129742-0004.wav
Transcript: ADD TWO TABLESPOONS THICK SOUR CREAM TWO TABLESPOONS SUGAR A SPRINKLE OF MUSTARD AND HALF CUP OF VINEGAR

Name: 01-652-129742-0005.wav
Transcript: BEAT UNTIL THOROUGHLY MIXED POUR OVER THE CABBAGE AND TOSS LIGHTLY UNTIL UNIFORMLY SEASONED

Name: 01-652-129742-0006.wav
Transcript: CAULIFLOWER MAYONNAISE TAKE COLD BOILED CAULIFLOWER BREAK INTO BRANCHES ADDING SALT PEPPER AND VINEGAR TO SEASON

Name: 01-652-129742-0007.wav
Transcript: SURROUND WITH A GARNISH OF COOKED AND DICED CARROTS TURNIPS GREEN PEAS

Name: 01-652-129742-0008.wav
Transcript: POUR MAYONNAISE OVER ALL CHILL AND SERVE

Name: 01-652-129742-0009.wav
Transcript: CELERY AND NUT SALAD CUT ENOUGH CELERY FINE TO MEASURE TWO CUPS ADD ONE CUP OF FINELY SHREDDED OR SHAVED CABBAGE AND ONE AND ONE HALF CUPS OF WALNUT MEATS BROKEN IN SMALL PIECES BUT NOT CHOPPED

Name: 01-652-129742-0010.wav
Transcript: STIR THE SOAKED GELATIN IN WHILE THE CUCUMBER IS HOT

Name: 01-652-129742-0011.wav
Transcript: SET INTO A COLD PLACE TO CHILL AND BECOME FIRM

Name: 01-652-129742-0012.wav
Transcript: SALAD TWO CUPS OF APPLES CUT INTO SMALL PIECES ONE CUP CELERY CUT INTO SMALL PIECES ONE CUP ENGLISH WALNUTS

Name: 01-652-129742-0013.wav
Transcript: SERVE ON A LETTUCE LEAF WITH MAYONNAISE DRESSING MADE WITHOUT MUSTARD AND THINNED WITH CREAM

Name: 01-652-129742-0014.wav
Transcript: GARNISH DISH THAT DRESSING IS MADE IN WITH A LITTLE GARLIC

Name: 01-652-129742-0015.wav
Transcript: PUT THE PULP INTO A BASIN WITH TWO OUNCES OF MELTED BUTTER TWO TABLESPOONFULS OF LEMON JUICE HALF A POUND OF CHESTNUTS BOILED AND GRATED AND SEASONING OF SALT AND WHITE PEPPER TO TASTE

Name: 01-652-129742-0016.wav
Transcript: TOMATO BASKETS TOMATO BASKETS ARE CHARMING ACCESSORIES FOR HOLDING VEGETABLE SALAD CHICKEN SHRIMPS COLD BEANS ASPARAGUS TIPS SHREDDED CELERY CUCUMBERS CUT IN CUBES AND MINCED PEPPERS

Name: 01-652-129742-0017.wav
Transcript: HANDLES OF WATERCRESS MAY BE ATTACHED TO THESE BASKETS

Name: 01-652-129742-0018.wav
Transcript: THIS DRESSING SHOULD STAND IN THE ICE BOX FOUR OR FIVE HOURS TO BECOME SEASONED

Name: 01-652-129742-0019.wav
Transcript: WHEN THICKENED STRAIN AND COOL

Name: 01-652-129742-0020.wav
Transcript: STRAIN AND BOTTLE AND PUT IN ICE BOX SHAKE BEFORE USING EACH TIME

Name: 652-129742-0010.wav
Transcript: STIR THE SOAKED GELATIN IN WHILE THE CUCUMBER IS HOT

Name: 652-129742-0011.wav
Transcript: SET INTO A COLD PLACE TO CHILL AND BECOME FIRM

Name: 652-129742-0012.wav
Transcript: SALAD TWO CUPS OF APPLES CUT INTO SMALL PIECES ONE CUP CELERY CUT INTO SMALL PIECES ONE CUP ENGLISH WALNUTS

Name: 652-129742-0013.wav
Transcript: SERVE ON A LETTUCE LEAF WITH MAYONNAISE DRESSING MADE WITHOUT MUSTARD AND THINNED WITH CREAM

Name: 652-129742-0014.wav
Transcript: GARNISH DISH THAT DRESSING IS MADE IN WITH A LITTLE GARLIC

Name: 652-129742-0015.wav
Transcript: PUT THE PULP INTO A BASIN WITH TWO OUNCES OF MELTED BUTTER TWO TABLESPOONFULS OF LEMON JUICE HALF A POUND OF CHESTNUTS BOILED AND GRATED AND SEASONING OF SALT AND WHITE PEPPER TO TASTE

Name: 652-129742-0016.wav
Transcript: TOMATO BASKETS TOMATO BASKETS ARE CHARMING ACCESSORIES FOR HOLDING VEGETABLE SALAD CHICKEN SHRIMPS COLD BEANS ASPARAGUS TIPS SHREDDED CELERY CUCUMBERS CUT IN CUBES AND MINCED PEPPERS

Name: 652-129742-0017.wav
Transcript: HANDLES OF WATERCRESS MAY BE ATTACHED TO THESE BASKETS

Name: 652-129742-0018.wav
Transcript: THIS DRESSING SHOULD STAND IN THE ICE BOX FOUR OR FIVE HOURS TO BECOME SEASONED

Name: 652-129742-0019.wav
Transcript: WHEN THICKENED STRAIN AND COOL

Name: 652-129742-0020.wav
Transcript: STRAIN AND BOTTLE AND PUT IN ICE BOX SHAKE BEFORE USING EACH TIME

Name: 01-652-130726-0000.wav
Transcript: SAN FRANCISCO'S CARE FREE SPIRIT WAS FULLY EXEMPLIFIED BEFORE THE ASHES OF THE GREAT FIRE OF NINETEEN O SIX WERE COLD

Name: 01-652-130726-0001.wav
Transcript: THOMPSON OPENED A LARGE RESTAURANT IN O'FARRELL STREET JUST ABOVE FILLMORE AND FOR TWO YEARS OR MORE DID A THRIVING BUSINESS HIS PLACE BEING NOTED FOR ITS GOOD COOKING AND ITS SPLENDID SERVICE

Name: 01-652-130726-0002.wav
Transcript: ONE OF HIS WAITERS PHIL TYSON WAS ONE OF THE EARLIER ONES TO GO BACK INTO THE BURNED DISTRICT TO BEGIN BUSINESS AND HE OPENED A RESTAURANT CALLED THE DEL MONTE IN POWELL STREET NEAR MARKET BUT IT WAS TOO EARLY FOR SUCCESS AND CLOSED AFTER A SHORT CAREER

Name: 01-652-130726-0003.wav
Transcript: HERE AS WELL AS IN A NUMBER OF OTHER PLACES ONE CAN WELL APPRECIATE THE COLLOQUIAL DEFINITION OF CABARET

Name: 01-652-130726-0004.wav
Transcript: HERE THERE IS ALWAYS GOOD MUSIC AND FOOD WELL COOKED AND WELL SERVED AND ALWAYS A LIVELY CROWD DURING THE LUNCHEON DINNER AND AFTER THEATRE HOURS THE ROOM IS NOT LARGE BUT ITS DIMENSIONS ARE GREATLY MAGNIFIED OWING TO THE COVERING OF MIRRORS WHICH LINE THE WALLS

Name: 01-652-130726-0005.wav
Transcript: THIS GARISH DISPLAY OF MIRRORS AND ELABORATE DECORATION OF CEILING AND PILLARS GIVES IT THE APPEARANCE OF THE ABODE OF SATURNALIA BUT DECORUM IS THE RULE AMONG THE PATRONS

Name: 01-652-130726-0006.wav
Transcript: JOHN TAIT IS THE PRESIDING SPIRIT HERE HE HAVING MADE REPUTATION AS CLUB MANAGER AND THEN AS MANAGER OF THE CLIFF HOUSE

Name: 01-652-130726-0007.wav
Transcript: THE POODLE DOG HAS A HOTEL ATTACHMENT WHERE ONE MAY GET ROOMS OR FULL APARTMENTS

Name: 01-652-130726-0008.wav
Transcript: IF YOU KNOW HOW TO ORDER AND DO NOT CARE TO COUNT THE COST WHEN YOU ORDER PROBABLY THE BEST DINNER AT THESE RESTAURANTS CAN BE HAD AT EITHER BLANCO'S OR THE POODLE DOG

Name: 01-652-130726-0009.wav
Transcript: THE CUISINE IS OF THE BEST AND THE CHEFS RANK AT THE TOP OF THEIR ART

Name: 01-652-130726-0010.wav
Transcript: AT THE TWO MENTIONED ONE PAYS FOR THE SURROUNDINGS AS WELL AS FOR THE FOOD AND SOMETIMES THIS IS WORTH PAYING FOR

Name: 01-652-130726-0011.wav
Transcript: THE RESTAURANTS OF THE PRESENT DAY THAT APPROACH NEAREST THE OLD BOHEMIAN RESTAURANTS OF PRE FIRE DAYS OF THE FRENCH CLASS ARE JACK'S IN SACRAMENTO STREET BETWEEN MONTGOMERY AND KEARNY FELIX IN MONTGOMERY STREET BETWEEN CLAY AND WASHINGTON AND THE POODLE DOG BERGEZ FRANKS IN BUSH STREET BETWEEN KEARNY AND GRANT AVENUE

Name: 01-652-130726-0012.wav
Transcript: IN EITHER OF THESE RESTAURANTS YOU WILL BE SERVED WITH THE BEST THE MARKET AFFORDS COOKED THE RIGHT WAY

Name: 01-652-130726-0013.wav
Transcript: IN THIS SAME DISTRICT IS THE MINT IN COMMERCIAL STREET BETWEEN MONTGOMERY AND KEARNY STREETS

Name: 01-652-130726-0014.wav
Transcript: IT HAS CHANGED FROM WHAT IT WAS IN THE OLD DAYS BUT IS STILL AN EXCELLENT PLACE TO DINE

Name: 01-652-130726-0015.wav
Transcript: IT IS AN IDEA THAT IS WORTH WHILE BUT UNFORTUNATELY THE PROPRIETORS DEPEND TOO MUCH ON THE DECORATIVE FEATURE AND TOO LITTLE ON THE FOOD AND HOW THEY SERVE IT

Name: 01-652-130726-0016.wav
Transcript: THE FLY TRAP AND CHARLIE'S FASHION THE FIRST IN SUTTER STREET NEAR KEARNY AND THE OTHER IN MARKET NEAR SUTTER SERVE WELL COOKED FOODS ESPECIALLY SOUP SALADS AND FISH

Name: 01-652-130726-0017.wav
Transcript: OF COURSE THESE ARE NOT THE ENTIRE MENUS BUT OF ALL THE WELL PREPARED DISHES THESE ARE THEIR BEST

Name: 01-652-130726-0018.wav
Transcript: BOTH SERVE GOOD SPANISH DINNERS AT REASONABLE PRICES

Name: 01-652-130726-0019.wav
Transcript: HIS PRICES ARE MODERATE AND HIS COOKING AND VIANDS OF THE BEST AND WILL SATISFY THE MOST CRITICAL OF THE GOURMETS

Name: 01-652-130726-0020.wav
Transcript: AT THE CORNER OF MARKET AND EDDY STREETS IS THE ODEON DOWN IN A BASEMENT WITH DECORATIONS OF MOST GARISH ORDER

Name: 01-652-130726-0021.wav
Transcript: ONE CAN ALMOST IMAGINE HIMSELF IN ONE OF THE FAMOUS RATHSKELLERS OF OLD HEIDELBERG NOT AT THE SCHLOSS OF COURSE FOR HERE YOU CANNOT LOOK DOWN ON THE WEISER AS IT FLOWS BENEATH THE WINDOWS OF THE GREAT WINE STUBE ON THE HILL

Name: 01-652-130726-0022.wav
Transcript: BUT IF YOU REALLY LOVE GOOD MUSIC MUSIC THAT HAS MELODY AND RHYTHM AND SOOTHING CADENCES GO TO THE HEIDELBERG INN AND LISTEN TO THE CONCERT WHICH IS A FEATURE OF THE PLACE EVERY EVENING

Name: 01-652-130726-0023.wav
Transcript: WE FINALLY GOT HIM TO SELECT THE ONE PRIZED ABOVE ALL OTHERS AND THIS IS WHAT CHEF SCHEILER GAVE US

Name: 01-652-130726-0024.wav
Transcript: TO THE PICKLE ADD TWO LARGE ONIONS CUT IN QUARTERS TWO FRESH CARROTS AND ABOUT ONE OUNCE OF MIXED WHOLE ALLSPICE BLACK PEPPERS CLOVES AND BAY LEAVES

Name: 01-652-130726-0025.wav
Transcript: PUT IN THE OVEN AND BROWN TO A GOLDEN COLOR

Name: 01-652-130726-0026.wav
Transcript: THEN TAKE IT OUT OF THE ROASTING PAN AND PUT IT INTO A CASSEROLE AFTER SPRINKLING IT WITH TWO OUNCES OF FLOUR

Name: 01-652-130726-0027.wav
Transcript: PUT INTO THE OVEN AGAIN AND COOK FOR HALF AN HOUR BASTING FREQUENTLY WITH THE ORIGINAL BRINE

Name: 01-652-130726-0028.wav
Transcript: WHEN DONE TAKE THE MEAT OUT OF THE SAUCE

Name: 01-652-130726-0029.wav
Transcript: STRAIN THE SAUCE THROUGH A FINE COLLANDER AND ADD A FEW RAISINS A PIECE OF HONEY CAKE OR GINGER SNAPS AND THE MEAT OF ONE FRESH TOMATO

Name: 01-652-130726-0030.wav
Transcript: SEASON WITH SALT AND PEPPER AND A LITTLE SUGAR TO TASTE

Name: 01-652-130726-0031.wav
Transcript: THE HOF BRAU HOWEVER IS LESS DISTINCTIVELY GERMAN AS THE GREATER NUMBER OF ITS PATRONS ARE AMERICANS

Name: 01-652-130726-0032.wav
Transcript: THE SPECIALTY OF THE HOF BRAU IS ABALONE'S AND THEY HAVE AS A FEATURE THIS SHELL FISH COOKED IN SEVERAL WAYS

Name: 01-652-130726-0033.wav
Transcript: THEY ALSO HAVE AS THE CHEF IN CHARGE OF THE ABALONE DISHES HERBERT FORMERLY CHEF FOR ONE OF THE YACHT CLUBS OF THE COAST WHO CLAIMS TO HAVE THE ONLY PROPER RECIPE FOR MAKING ABALONE'S TENDER

Name: 01-652-130726-0034.wav
Transcript: UNDER ORDINARY CIRCUMSTANCES THE ABALONE IS TOUGH AND UNPALATABLE BUT AFTER THE DEFT MANIPULATION OF HERBERT THEY ARE TENDER AND MAKE A FINE DISH EITHER FRIED AS CHOWDER OR A LA NEWBERG

Name: 01-652-130726-0035.wav
Transcript: IN ADDITION TO ABALONE'S THE HOF BRAU MAKES A SPECIALTY OF LITTLE OREGON CRAWFISH

Name: 02-652-130726-0000.wav
