Name: 01-3081-166546-0010.wav
Transcript: I KNOW IT SOUNDS FOOLISH BUT THE ALTERNATIVE IS SO IMPROBABLE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0011.wav
Transcript: THE BOYS LOOK WIDE AWAKE ENOUGH BUT WHO CAN TELL I WOULD SOONER BELIEVE THAT

Name: 01-3081-166546-0012.wav
Transcript: A MAN WAS LOOKING IN FROM THE CORRIDOR BEHIND AT THE FOUR PERSONS WE WERE JUST DISCUSSING

Name: 01-3081-166546-0013.wav
Transcript: I INQUIRED OF GEORGE WITH MY EYES STILL ON THIS FURTIVE WATCHER

Name: 01-3081-166546-0014.wav
Transcript: I TOOK QUITE A FANCY TO HIM WHY

Name: 01-3081-166546-0015.wav
Transcript: I AM LOOKING AT HIM NOW

Name: 01-3081-166546-0016.wav
Transcript: JUST AN EVERYDAY DETECTIVE BUT AMBITIOUS I SUPPOSE AND QUITE ALIVE TO THE IMPORTANCE OF BEING THOROUGH

Name: 01-3081-166546-0017.wav
Transcript: YES HE'S MERCURIAL IN ALL HIS MOVEMENTS

Name: 01-3081-166546-0018.wav
Transcript: WHAT DOES HE WANT

Name: 01-3081-166546-0019.wav
Transcript: I ASKED AS SOON AS GEORGE HAD RETURNED TO MY SIDE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0020.wav
Transcript: HE WANTS ME TO STAND READY TO OBEY ANY SUMMONS THE POLICE MAY SEND ME

Name: 01-3081-166546-0021.wav
Transcript: I EMPHASISED COMPLACENTLY

Name: 01-3081-166546-0022.wav
Transcript: HE APPEARED TO KNOW FOR HE TOLD ME AT ONCE THAT HE WAS DETECTIVE GRYCE A MAN WHO HAD GROWN OLD IN SOLVING JUST SUCH BAFFLING PROBLEMS AS THESE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0023.wav
Transcript: HE GAVE UP WORK SOME TIME AGO I HAVE BEEN TOLD MY HUSBAND WENT ON BUT EVIDENTLY A GREAT CASE STILL HAS ITS ALLUREMENT FOR HIM

Name: 01-3081-166546-0024.wav
Transcript: THE TRAIL HERE MUST BE A VERY BLIND ONE FOR THEM TO CALL HIM IN

Name: 01-3081-166546-0025.wav
Transcript: I WISH WE HAD NOT LEFT SO SOON

Name: 01-3081-166546-0026.wav
Transcript: HE WAS LATE OF COURSE BUT WHEN HE DID APPEAR I ALMOST FORGOT OUR USUAL GREETING IN MY HURRY TO ASK HIM IF HE HAD SEEN THE EVENING PAPERS

Name: 01-3081-166546-0027.wav
Transcript: HOWEVER A LITTLE LATER WE HAD A COMFORTABLE CHAT

Name: 01-3081-166546-0028.wav
Transcript: IT WAS ONE WHICH GAVE ME A SMALL TRIUMPH OVER GEORGE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0029.wav
Transcript: THE SUGGESTION HE HAD LAUGHED AT WAS NOT SO ENTIRELY FOOLISH AS HE HAD BEEN PLEASED TO CONSIDER IT

Name: 01-3081-166546-0030.wav
Transcript: THEIR GREETING WAS CORDIAL AND THE LINES ON THE LATTER'S FACE RELAXED A LITTLE AS HE MET THE STILL BRIGHT EYE OF THE MAN UPON WHOSE INSTINCT AND JUDGMENT SO MUCH RELIANCE HAD ALWAYS BEEN PLACED

Name: 01-3081-166546-0031.wav
Transcript: THIS IS VERY GOOD OF YOU HE BEGAN GLANCING DOWN AT THE AGED DETECTIVE'S BUNDLED UP LEGS AND GENTLY PUSHING A CHAIR TOWARDS HIM

Name: 01-3081-166546-0032.wav
Transcript: IT'S THE MOST INEXPLICABLE THERE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0033.wav
Transcript: BUT CLEWS THERE ARE ABSOLUTELY NONE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0034.wav
Transcript: THAT IS WE HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO FIND ANY PERHAPS YOU CAN

Name: 01-3081-166546-0035.wav
Transcript: AT LEAST THAT IS WHAT WE HOPE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0036.wav
Transcript: IT'S A CASE IN A THOUSAND GRYCE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0037.wav
Transcript: THE OLD MAN'S EYES SHOT FIRE AND UNCONSCIOUSLY ONE FOOT SLIPPED TO THE FLOOR

Name: 01-3081-166546-0038.wav
Transcript: SHE HAD NO COMPANION NEAR HER

Name: 01-3081-166546-0039.wav
Transcript: NO WORD NO CRY JUST A COLLAPSE AND SUDDEN FALL

Name: 01-3081-166546-0040.wav
Transcript: IN OLDEN DAYS THEY WOULD HAVE SAID STRUCK BY A BOLT FROM HEAVEN

Name: 01-3081-166546-0041.wav
Transcript: WHAT DO YOU MAKE OF IT GRYCE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0042.wav
Transcript: I SHOULD LIKE TO SEE THE DESK YOU SPEAK OF AND THE SPOT WHERE SHE FELL

Name: 01-3081-166546-0043.wav
Transcript: A YOUNG FELLOW WHO HAD BEEN HOVERING IN THE BACKGROUND AT ONCE STEPPED FORWARD

Name: 01-3081-166546-0044.wav
Transcript: HE WAS THE PLAIN FACED DETECTIVE WHO HAD SPOKEN TO GEORGE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0045.wav
Transcript: THIS SWEETWATER AS THEY CALLED HIM WAS I HAVE SINCE UNDERSTOOD ONE OF HIS PROTEGES AND MORE OR LESS OF A FAVOURITE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0046.wav
Transcript: BEEN OVER THE GROUND STUDIED THE AFFAIR CAREFULLY

Name: 01-3081-166546-0047.wav
Transcript: VERY WELL THEN YOU'RE IN A POSITION TO PIONEER ME

Name: 01-3081-166546-0048.wav
Transcript: WELL WELL THAT'S HONEST AT ALL EVENTS

Name: 01-3081-166546-0049.wav
Transcript: BUT I'M IN NO POSITION TO MAKE PROMISES

Name: 01-3081-166546-0050.wav
Transcript: OLD DAYS DON'T RETURN FOR THE ASKING

Name: 01-3081-166546-0051.wav
Transcript: WHETHER HE GOT ANYTHING ELSE IT WOULD BE IMPOSSIBLE TO SAY FROM HIS MANNER AS HE FINALLY SANK INTO A CHAIR BY ONE OF THE OPENINGS AND LOOKED DOWN ON THE LOBBY BELOW

Name: 01-3081-166546-0052.wav
Transcript: ONE OR TWO OF THE MUSICIANS FROM THE END OF THE HALL

Name: 01-3081-166546-0053.wav
Transcript: NATURALLY THEY REACHED HER FIRST

Name: 01-3081-166546-0054.wav
Transcript: MARK SOWERBY AND CLAUS HENNERBERG

Name: 01-3081-166546-0055.wav
Transcript: HONEST GERMANS MEN WHO HAVE PLAYED HERE FOR YEARS

Name: 01-3081-166546-0056.wav
Transcript: WHO CAME NEXT ON THE SCENE SOME PEOPLE FROM THE LOBBY

Name: 01-3081-166546-0057.wav
Transcript: ANYBODY BEFORE THE FATHER CAME IN

Name: 01-3081-166546-0058.wav
Transcript: YES MISS CLARKE THE MIDDLE AGED LADY WITH THE PARRISHES

Name: 01-3081-166546-0059.wav
Transcript: I SUPPOSE SHE HAS BEEN CAREFULLY QUESTIONED VERY I SHOULD SAY

Name: 01-3081-166546-0060.wav
Transcript: AND SHE SPEAKS OF NO WEAPON

Name: 01-3081-166546-0061.wav
Transcript: NOT TILL THE DOCTOR CAME HER DOCTOR WHO WAS HAPPILY IN HIS OFFICE IN THIS VERY BUILDING

Name: 01-3081-166546-0062.wav
Transcript: YES MISTER SLATER THE ASSISTANT MANAGER WHO WAS IN THE LOBBY AT THE TIME SAYS THAT TEN MINUTES AT LEAST MUST HAVE ELAPSED

Name: 01-3081-166546-0063.wav
Transcript: NO DOUBT

Name: 01-3081-166546-0064.wav
Transcript: SWEETWATER SOMEONE DREW THAT WEAPON OUT

Name: 01-3081-166546-0065.wav
Transcript: NOT ALTOGETHER BY ME

Name: 01-3081-166546-0066.wav
Transcript: WHEREVER SHE PLEASES ONLY I CAN'T WALK FAR

Name: 01-3081-166546-0067.wav
Transcript: IT HAS NOT BEEN RUNNING SINCE LAST NIGHT OR IT WOULD BE FULL OF CURIOUS PEOPLE ALL THE TIME HUSTLING TO GET A GLIMPSE OF THIS PLACE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0068.wav
Transcript: BUT THEY'LL PUT A MAN ON FOR YOU

Name: 01-3081-166546-0069.wav
Transcript: VERY GOOD MANAGE IT AS YOU WILL

Name: 01-3081-166546-0070.wav
Transcript: I'LL WAIT HERE TILL YOU'RE READY EXPLAIN YOURSELF TO THE LADY TELL HER I'M AN OLD AND RHEUMATIC INVALID WHO HAS BEEN USED TO ASKING HIS OWN QUESTIONS

Name: 01-3081-166546-0071.wav
Transcript: AS HER QUIET FIGURE APPEARED IN THE DOORWAY SWEETWATER STOLE A GLANCE AT MISTER GRYCE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0072.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO DOUBTING THEM IN THIS INSTANCE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0073.wav
Transcript: YES

Name: 01-3081-166546-0074.wav
Transcript: FOR SOME LITTLE TIME THAT IS IT SEEMED LONG THOUGH I BELIEVE IT WAS NOT MORE THAN A MINUTE BEFORE TWO MEN CAME RUNNING FROM THE MUSICIANS GALLERY

Name: 01-3081-166546-0075.wav
Transcript: YES MANY TIMES

Name: 01-3081-166546-0076.wav
Transcript: WHAT MADE THE DIFFERENCE

Name: 01-3081-166546-0077.wav
Transcript: MISS CLARKE STARTED AND HER SWEET FACE SHOWED A MOMENT'S PERPLEXITY DID I SHE QUERIED MUSINGLY

Name: 01-3081-166546-0078.wav
Transcript: NO A VERY NATURAL ONE I SHOULD SAY

Name: 01-3081-166546-0079.wav
Transcript: AND THE GLANCE SHE CAST HIM WHILE NOT MEETING HIS EYE SHOWED THAT SHE UNDERSTOOD THE IMPORTANCE OF THE ADMISSION

Name: 01-3081-166546-0080.wav
Transcript: I KNOW SHE SAID WHAT YOU ARE GOING TO ASK ME NOW

Name: 01-3081-166546-0081.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO PONIARD IN THE WOUND

Name: 01-3081-166546-0082.wav
Transcript: THE TIME IS NARROWED DOWN TO ONE AND IN THAT ONE MISS CLARKE WAS THE ONLY PERSON TO TOUCH HER

Name: 01-3081-166546-0083.wav
Transcript: I WILL TROUBLE YOU NO FURTHER

Name: 01-3081-166546-0084.wav
Transcript: SWEETWATER HELP ME OUT OF THIS

Name: 01-3081-166546-0085.wav
Transcript: BUT VIGOUR RETURNED TO HIM BEFORE HE HAD WELL REACHED THE DOOR AND HE SHOWED SOME OF HIS OLD SPIRIT AS HE THANKED MISS CLARKE AND TURNED TO TAKE THE ELEVATOR

Name: 01-3081-166546-0086.wav
Transcript: THE NEXT MINUTE SHE WAS IN THIS LADY'S ARMS

Name: 01-3081-166546-0087.wav
Transcript: NO WEAPON PROTRUDED FROM THE WOUND NOR WAS ANY FOUND ON OR NEAR HER IN THE MEZZANINE WHAT FOLLOWS

Name: 01-3081-166546-0088.wav
Transcript: SHE STRUCK THE BLOW HERSELF AND THE STRENGTH OF PURPOSE WHICH LED HER TO DO THIS GAVE HER THE ADDITIONAL FORCE TO PULL THE WEAPON OUT AND FLING IT FROM HER

Name: 01-3081-166546-0089.wav
Transcript: IT DID NOT FALL UPON THE FLOOR AROUND HER THEREFORE IT FLEW THROUGH ONE OF THOSE OPENINGS INTO THE LOBBY AND THERE IT EITHER WILL BE OR HAS BEEN FOUND

Name: 02-3081-166546-0000.wav
Transcript: WHEN WE TOOK OUR SEATS AT THE BREAKFAST TABLE IT WAS WITH THE FEELING OF BEING NO LONGER LOOKED UPON AS CONNECTED IN ANY WAY WITH THIS CASE

Name: 02-3081-166546-0001.wav
Transcript: INSTANTLY THEY ABSORBED ALL MY ATTENTION THOUGH I DARED NOT GIVE THEM A DIRECT LOOK AND CONTINUED TO OBSERVE THEM ONLY IN THE GLASS

Transcript: YES AND A VERY RESPECTABLE ONE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0013.wav
Transcript: I INQUIRED OF GEORGE WITH MY EYES STILL ON THIS FURTIVE WATCHER

Name: 03-3081-166546-0014.wav
Transcript: I TOOK QUITE A FANCY TO HIM WHY

Name: 03-3081-166546-0015.wav
Transcript: I AM LOOKING AT HIM NOW

Name: 03-3081-166546-0016.wav
Transcript: JUST AN EVERYDAY DETECTIVE BUT AMBITIOUS I SUPPOSE AND QUITE ALIVE TO THE IMPORTANCE OF BEING THOROUGH

Name: 03-3081-166546-0017.wav
Transcript: YES HE'S MERCURIAL IN ALL HIS MOVEMENTS

Name: 03-3081-166546-0018.wav
Transcript: WHAT DOES HE WANT

Name: 03-3081-166546-0019.wav
Transcript: I ASKED AS SOON AS GEORGE HAD RETURNED TO MY SIDE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0020.wav
Transcript: HE WANTS ME TO STAND READY TO OBEY ANY SUMMONS THE POLICE MAY SEND ME

Name: 03-3081-166546-0021.wav
Transcript: I EMPHASISED COMPLACENTLY

Name: 03-3081-166546-0022.wav
Transcript: HE APPEARED TO KNOW FOR HE TOLD ME AT ONCE THAT HE WAS DETECTIVE GRYCE A MAN WHO HAD GROWN OLD IN SOLVING JUST SUCH BAFFLING PROBLEMS AS THESE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0023.wav
Transcript: HE GAVE UP WORK SOME TIME AGO I HAVE BEEN TOLD MY HUSBAND WENT ON BUT EVIDENTLY A GREAT CASE STILL HAS ITS ALLUREMENT FOR HIM

Name: 03-3081-166546-0024.wav
Transcript: THE TRAIL HERE MUST BE A VERY BLIND ONE FOR THEM TO CALL HIM IN

Name: 03-3081-166546-0025.wav
Transcript: I WISH WE HAD NOT LEFT SO SOON

Name: 03-3081-166546-0026.wav
Transcript: HE WAS LATE OF COURSE BUT WHEN HE DID APPEAR I ALMOST FORGOT OUR USUAL GREETING IN MY HURRY TO ASK HIM IF HE HAD SEEN THE EVENING PAPERS

Name: 03-3081-166546-0027.wav
Transcript: HOWEVER A LITTLE LATER WE HAD A COMFORTABLE CHAT

Name: 03-3081-166546-0028.wav
Transcript: IT WAS ONE WHICH GAVE ME A SMALL TRIUMPH OVER GEORGE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0029.wav
Transcript: THE SUGGESTION HE HAD LAUGHED AT WAS NOT SO ENTIRELY FOOLISH AS HE HAD BEEN PLEASED TO CONSIDER IT

Name: 03-3081-166546-0030.wav
Transcript: THEIR GREETING WAS CORDIAL AND THE LINES ON THE LATTER'S FACE RELAXED A LITTLE AS HE MET THE STILL BRIGHT EYE OF THE MAN UPON WHOSE INSTINCT AND JUDGMENT SO MUCH RELIANCE HAD ALWAYS BEEN PLACED

Name: 03-3081-166546-0031.wav
Transcript: THIS IS VERY GOOD OF YOU HE BEGAN GLANCING DOWN AT THE AGED DETECTIVE'S BUNDLED UP LEGS AND GENTLY PUSHING A CHAIR TOWARDS HIM

Name: 03-3081-166546-0032.wav
Transcript: IT'S THE MOST INEXPLICABLE THERE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0033.wav
Transcript: BUT CLEWS THERE ARE ABSOLUTELY NONE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0034.wav
Transcript: THAT IS WE HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO FIND ANY PERHAPS YOU CAN

Name: 03-3081-166546-0035.wav
Transcript: AT LEAST THAT IS WHAT WE HOPE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0036.wav
Transcript: IT'S A CASE IN A THOUSAND GRYCE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0037.wav
Transcript: THE OLD MAN'S EYES SHOT FIRE AND UNCONSCIOUSLY ONE FOOT SLIPPED TO THE FLOOR

Name: 03-3081-166546-0038.wav
Transcript: SHE HAD NO COMPANION NEAR HER

Name: 03-3081-166546-0039.wav
Transcript: NO WORD NO CRY JUST A COLLAPSE AND SUDDEN FALL

Name: 03-3081-166546-0040.wav
Transcript: IN OLDEN DAYS THEY WOULD HAVE SAID STRUCK BY A BOLT FROM HEAVEN

Name: 03-3081-166546-0041.wav
Transcript: WHAT DO YOU MAKE OF IT GRYCE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0042.wav
Transcript: I SHOULD LIKE TO SEE THE DESK YOU SPEAK OF AND THE SPOT WHERE SHE FELL

Name: 03-3081-166546-0043.wav
Transcript: A YOUNG FELLOW WHO HAD BEEN HOVERING IN THE BACKGROUND AT ONCE STEPPED FORWARD

Name: 03-3081-166546-0044.wav
Transcript: HE WAS THE PLAIN FACED DETECTIVE WHO HAD SPOKEN TO GEORGE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0045.wav
Transcript: THIS SWEETWATER AS THEY CALLED HIM WAS I HAVE SINCE UNDERSTOOD ONE OF HIS PROTEGES AND MORE OR LESS OF A FAVOURITE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0046.wav
Transcript: BEEN OVER THE GROUND STUDIED THE AFFAIR CAREFULLY

Name: 03-3081-166546-0047.wav
Transcript: VERY WELL THEN YOU'RE IN A POSITION TO PIONEER ME

Name: 03-3081-166546-0048.wav
Transcript: WELL WELL THAT'S HONEST AT ALL EVENTS

Name: 03-3081-166546-0049.wav
Transcript: BUT I'M IN NO POSITION TO MAKE PROMISES

Name: 03-3081-166546-0050.wav
Transcript: OLD DAYS DON'T RETURN FOR THE ASKING

Name: 03-3081-166546-0051.wav
Transcript: WHETHER HE GOT ANYTHING ELSE IT WOULD BE IMPOSSIBLE TO SAY FROM HIS MANNER AS HE FINALLY SANK INTO A CHAIR BY ONE OF THE OPENINGS AND LOOKED DOWN ON THE LOBBY BELOW

Name: 03-3081-166546-0052.wav
Transcript: ONE OR TWO OF THE MUSICIANS FROM THE END OF THE HALL

Name: 03-3081-166546-0053.wav
Transcript: NATURALLY THEY REACHED HER FIRST

Name: 03-3081-166546-0054.wav
Transcript: MARK SOWERBY AND CLAUS HENNERBERG

Name: 03-3081-166546-0055.wav
Transcript: HONEST GERMANS MEN WHO HAVE PLAYED HERE FOR YEARS

Name: 03-3081-166546-0056.wav
Transcript: WHO CAME NEXT ON THE SCENE SOME PEOPLE FROM THE LOBBY

Name: 03-3081-166546-0057.wav
Transcript: ANYBODY BEFORE THE FATHER CAME IN

Name: 03-3081-166546-0058.wav
Transcript: YES MISS CLARKE THE MIDDLE AGED LADY WITH THE PARRISHES

Name: 03-3081-166546-0059.wav
Transcript: I SUPPOSE SHE HAS BEEN CAREFULLY QUESTIONED VERY I SHOULD SAY

Name: 03-3081-166546-0060.wav
Transcript: AND SHE SPEAKS OF NO WEAPON

Name: 03-3081-166546-0061.wav
Transcript: NOT TILL THE DOCTOR CAME HER DOCTOR WHO WAS HAPPILY IN HIS OFFICE IN THIS VERY BUILDING

Name: 03-3081-166546-0062.wav
Transcript: YES MISTER SLATER THE ASSISTANT MANAGER WHO WAS IN THE LOBBY AT THE TIME SAYS THAT TEN MINUTES AT LEAST MUST HAVE ELAPSED

Name: 03-3081-166546-0063.wav
Transcript: NO DOUBT

Name: 03-3081-166546-0064.wav
Transcript: SWEETWATER SOMEONE DREW THAT WEAPON OUT

Name: 03-3081-166546-0065.wav
Transcript: NOT ALTOGETHER BY ME

Name: 03-3081-166546-0066.wav
Transcript: WHEREVER SHE PLEASES ONLY I CAN'T WALK FAR

Name: 03-3081-166546-0067.wav
Transcript: IT HAS NOT BEEN RUNNING SINCE LAST NIGHT OR IT WOULD BE FULL OF CURIOUS PEOPLE ALL THE TIME HUSTLING TO GET A GLIMPSE OF THIS PLACE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0068.wav
Transcript: BUT THEY'LL PUT A MAN ON FOR YOU

Name: 03-3081-166546-0069.wav
Transcript: VERY GOOD MANAGE IT AS YOU WILL

Name: 03-3081-166546-0070.wav
Transcript: I'LL WAIT HERE TILL YOU'RE READY EXPLAIN YOURSELF TO THE LADY TELL HER I'M AN OLD AND RHEUMATIC INVALID WHO HAS BEEN USED TO ASKING HIS OWN QUESTIONS

Name: 03-3081-166546-0071.wav
Transcript: AS HER QUIET FIGURE APPEARED IN THE DOORWAY SWEETWATER STOLE A GLANCE AT MISTER GRYCE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0072.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO DOUBTING THEM IN THIS INSTANCE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0073.wav
Transcript: YES

Name: 03-3081-166546-0074.wav
Transcript: FOR SOME LITTLE TIME THAT IS IT SEEMED LONG THOUGH I BELIEVE IT WAS NOT MORE THAN A MINUTE BEFORE TWO MEN CAME RUNNING FROM THE MUSICIANS GALLERY

Name: 03-3081-166546-0075.wav
Transcript: YES MANY TIMES

Name: 03-3081-166546-0076.wav
Transcript: WHAT MADE THE DIFFERENCE

Name: 03-3081-166546-0077.wav
Transcript: MISS CLARKE STARTED AND HER SWEET FACE SHOWED A MOMENT'S PERPLEXITY DID I SHE QUERIED MUSINGLY

Name: 03-3081-166546-0078.wav
Transcript: NO A VERY NATURAL ONE I SHOULD SAY

Name: 03-3081-166546-0079.wav
Transcript: AND THE GLANCE SHE CAST HIM WHILE NOT MEETING HIS EYE SHOWED THAT SHE UNDERSTOOD THE IMPORTANCE OF THE ADMISSION

Name: 03-3081-166546-0080.wav
Transcript: I KNOW SHE SAID WHAT YOU ARE GOING TO ASK ME NOW

Name: 03-3081-166546-0081.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO PONIARD IN THE WOUND

Name: 03-3081-166546-0082.wav
Transcript: THE TIME IS NARROWED DOWN TO ONE AND IN THAT ONE MISS CLARKE WAS THE ONLY PERSON TO TOUCH HER

Name: 03-3081-166546-0083.wav
Transcript: I WILL TROUBLE YOU NO FURTHER

Name: 03-3081-166546-0084.wav
Transcript: SWEETWATER HELP ME OUT OF THIS

Name: 03-3081-166546-0085.wav
Transcript: BUT VIGOUR RETURNED TO HIM BEFORE HE HAD WELL REACHED THE DOOR AND HE SHOWED SOME OF HIS OLD SPIRIT AS HE THANKED MISS CLARKE AND TURNED TO TAKE THE ELEVATOR

Name: 03-3081-166546-0086.wav
Transcript: THE NEXT MINUTE SHE WAS IN THIS LADY'S ARMS

Name: 03-3081-166546-0087.wav
Transcript: NO WEAPON PROTRUDED FROM THE WOUND NOR WAS ANY FOUND ON OR NEAR HER IN THE MEZZANINE WHAT FOLLOWS

Name: 03-3081-166546-0088.wav
Transcript: SHE STRUCK THE BLOW HERSELF AND THE STRENGTH OF PURPOSE WHICH LED HER TO DO THIS GAVE HER THE ADDITIONAL FORCE TO PULL THE WEAPON OUT AND FLING IT FROM HER

Name: 03-3081-166546-0089.wav
Transcript: IT DID NOT FALL UPON THE FLOOR AROUND HER THEREFORE IT FLEW THROUGH ONE OF THOSE OPENINGS INTO THE LOBBY AND THERE IT EITHER WILL BE OR HAS BEEN FOUND

Name: 04-3081-166546-0000.wav
Transcript: WHEN WE TOOK OUR SEATS AT THE BREAKFAST TABLE IT WAS WITH THE FEELING OF BEING NO LONGER LOOKED UPON AS CONNECTED IN ANY WAY WITH THIS CASE

Name: 04-3081-166546-0001.wav
Transcript: INSTANTLY THEY ABSORBED ALL MY ATTENTION THOUGH I DARED NOT GIVE THEM A DIRECT LOOK AND CONTINUED TO OBSERVE THEM ONLY IN THE GLASS

Name: 04-3081-166546-0002.wav
Transcript: YES AND A VERY RESPECTABLE ONE

Name: 04-3081-166546-0003.wav
Transcript: THE LADY IS NOT THE MOTHER OF THE BOYS BUT THEIR AUNT

Name: 04-3081-166546-0004.wav
Transcript: THE BOYS BELONG TO THE GENTLEMAN WHO IS A WIDOWER

Name: 04-3081-166546-0005.wav
Transcript: GEORGE NODDED

Name: 04-3081-166546-0006.wav
Transcript: THE BOYS LOOK WIDE AWAKE ENOUGH IF THE FATHER DOES NOT

Name: 04-3081-166546-0007.wav
Transcript: DO THEY STILL INSIST THAT MISS CHALLONER WAS THE ONLY PERSON IN THE ROOM WITH THEM AT THIS TIME

Transcript: HAVE YOU EVER THOUGHT THAT SHE MIGHT HAVE BEEN A SUICIDE

Transcript: JUST AN EVERYDAY DETECTIVE BUT AMBITIOUS I SUPPOSE AND QUITE ALIVE TO THE IMPORTANCE OF BEING THOROUGH

Name: 05-3081-166546-0017.wav
Transcript: YES HE'S MERCURIAL IN ALL HIS MOVEMENTS

Name: 05-3081-166546-0018.wav
Transcript: WHAT DOES HE WANT

Name: 05-3081-166546-0019.wav
Transcript: I ASKED AS SOON AS GEORGE HAD RETURNED TO MY SIDE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0020.wav
Transcript: HE WANTS ME TO STAND READY TO OBEY ANY SUMMONS THE POLICE MAY SEND ME

Name: 05-3081-166546-0021.wav
Transcript: I EMPHASISED COMPLACENTLY

Name: 05-3081-166546-0022.wav
Transcript: HE APPEARED TO KNOW FOR HE TOLD ME AT ONCE THAT HE WAS DETECTIVE GRYCE A MAN WHO HAD GROWN OLD IN SOLVING JUST SUCH BAFFLING PROBLEMS AS THESE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0023.wav
Transcript: HE GAVE UP WORK SOME TIME AGO I HAVE BEEN TOLD MY HUSBAND WENT ON BUT EVIDENTLY A GREAT CASE STILL HAS ITS ALLUREMENT FOR HIM

Name: 05-3081-166546-0024.wav
Transcript: THE TRAIL HERE MUST BE A VERY BLIND ONE FOR THEM TO CALL HIM IN

Name: 05-3081-166546-0025.wav
Transcript: I WISH WE HAD NOT LEFT SO SOON

Name: 05-3081-166546-0026.wav
Transcript: HE WAS LATE OF COURSE BUT WHEN HE DID APPEAR I ALMOST FORGOT OUR USUAL GREETING IN MY HURRY TO ASK HIM IF HE HAD SEEN THE EVENING PAPERS

Name: 05-3081-166546-0027.wav
Transcript: HOWEVER A LITTLE LATER WE HAD A COMFORTABLE CHAT

Name: 05-3081-166546-0028.wav
Transcript: IT WAS ONE WHICH GAVE ME A SMALL TRIUMPH OVER GEORGE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0029.wav
Transcript: THE SUGGESTION HE HAD LAUGHED AT WAS NOT SO ENTIRELY FOOLISH AS HE HAD BEEN PLEASED TO CONSIDER IT

Name: 05-3081-166546-0030.wav
Transcript: THEIR GREETING WAS CORDIAL AND THE LINES ON THE LATTER'S FACE RELAXED A LITTLE AS HE MET THE STILL BRIGHT EYE OF THE MAN UPON WHOSE INSTINCT AND JUDGMENT SO MUCH RELIANCE HAD ALWAYS BEEN PLACED

Name: 05-3081-166546-0031.wav
Transcript: THIS IS VERY GOOD OF YOU HE BEGAN GLANCING DOWN AT THE AGED DETECTIVE'S BUNDLED UP LEGS AND GENTLY PUSHING A CHAIR TOWARDS HIM

Name: 05-3081-166546-0032.wav
Transcript: IT'S THE MOST INEXPLICABLE THERE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0033.wav
Transcript: BUT CLEWS THERE ARE ABSOLUTELY NONE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0034.wav
Transcript: THAT IS WE HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO FIND ANY PERHAPS YOU CAN

Name: 05-3081-166546-0035.wav
Transcript: AT LEAST THAT IS WHAT WE HOPE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0036.wav
Transcript: IT'S A CASE IN A THOUSAND GRYCE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0037.wav
Transcript: THE OLD MAN'S EYES SHOT FIRE AND UNCONSCIOUSLY ONE FOOT SLIPPED TO THE FLOOR

Name: 05-3081-166546-0038.wav
Transcript: SHE HAD NO COMPANION NEAR HER

Name: 05-3081-166546-0039.wav
Transcript: NO WORD NO CRY JUST A COLLAPSE AND SUDDEN FALL

Name: 05-3081-166546-0040.wav
Transcript: IN OLDEN DAYS THEY WOULD HAVE SAID STRUCK BY A BOLT FROM HEAVEN

Name: 05-3081-166546-0041.wav
Transcript: WHAT DO YOU MAKE OF IT GRYCE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0042.wav
Transcript: I SHOULD LIKE TO SEE THE DESK YOU SPEAK OF AND THE SPOT WHERE SHE FELL

Name: 05-3081-166546-0043.wav
Transcript: A YOUNG FELLOW WHO HAD BEEN HOVERING IN THE BACKGROUND AT ONCE STEPPED FORWARD

Name: 05-3081-166546-0044.wav
Transcript: HE WAS THE PLAIN FACED DETECTIVE WHO HAD SPOKEN TO GEORGE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0045.wav
Transcript: THIS SWEETWATER AS THEY CALLED HIM WAS I HAVE SINCE UNDERSTOOD ONE OF HIS PROTEGES AND MORE OR LESS OF A FAVOURITE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0046.wav
Transcript: BEEN OVER THE GROUND STUDIED THE AFFAIR CAREFULLY

Name: 05-3081-166546-0047.wav
Transcript: VERY WELL THEN YOU'RE IN A POSITION TO PIONEER ME

Name: 05-3081-166546-0048.wav
Transcript: WELL WELL THAT'S HONEST AT ALL EVENTS

Name: 05-3081-166546-0049.wav
Transcript: BUT I'M IN NO POSITION TO MAKE PROMISES

Name: 05-3081-166546-0050.wav
Transcript: OLD DAYS DON'T RETURN FOR THE ASKING

Name: 05-3081-166546-0051.wav
Transcript: WHETHER HE GOT ANYTHING ELSE IT WOULD BE IMPOSSIBLE TO SAY FROM HIS MANNER AS HE FINALLY SANK INTO A CHAIR BY ONE OF THE OPENINGS AND LOOKED DOWN ON THE LOBBY BELOW

Name: 05-3081-166546-0052.wav
Transcript: ONE OR TWO OF THE MUSICIANS FROM THE END OF THE HALL

Name: 05-3081-166546-0053.wav
Transcript: NATURALLY THEY REACHED HER FIRST

Name: 05-3081-166546-0054.wav
Transcript: MARK SOWERBY AND CLAUS HENNERBERG

Name: 05-3081-166546-0055.wav
Transcript: HONEST GERMANS MEN WHO HAVE PLAYED HERE FOR YEARS

Name: 05-3081-166546-0056.wav
Transcript: WHO CAME NEXT ON THE SCENE SOME PEOPLE FROM THE LOBBY

Name: 05-3081-166546-0057.wav
Transcript: ANYBODY BEFORE THE FATHER CAME IN

Name: 05-3081-166546-0058.wav
Transcript: YES MISS CLARKE THE MIDDLE AGED LADY WITH THE PARRISHES

Name: 05-3081-166546-0059.wav
Transcript: I SUPPOSE SHE HAS BEEN CAREFULLY QUESTIONED VERY I SHOULD SAY

Name: 05-3081-166546-0060.wav
Transcript: AND SHE SPEAKS OF NO WEAPON

Name: 05-3081-166546-0061.wav
Transcript: NOT TILL THE DOCTOR CAME HER DOCTOR WHO WAS HAPPILY IN HIS OFFICE IN THIS VERY BUILDING

Name: 05-3081-166546-0062.wav
Transcript: YES MISTER SLATER THE ASSISTANT MANAGER WHO WAS IN THE LOBBY AT THE TIME SAYS THAT TEN MINUTES AT LEAST MUST HAVE ELAPSED

Name: 05-3081-166546-0063.wav
Transcript: NO DOUBT

Name: 05-3081-166546-0064.wav
Transcript: SWEETWATER SOMEONE DREW THAT WEAPON OUT

Name: 05-3081-166546-0065.wav
Transcript: NOT ALTOGETHER BY ME

Name: 05-3081-166546-0066.wav
Transcript: WHEREVER SHE PLEASES ONLY I CAN'T WALK FAR

Name: 05-3081-166546-0067.wav
Transcript: IT HAS NOT BEEN RUNNING SINCE LAST NIGHT OR IT WOULD BE FULL OF CURIOUS PEOPLE ALL THE TIME HUSTLING TO GET A GLIMPSE OF THIS PLACE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0068.wav
Transcript: BUT THEY'LL PUT A MAN ON FOR YOU

Name: 05-3081-166546-0069.wav
Transcript: VERY GOOD MANAGE IT AS YOU WILL

Name: 05-3081-166546-0070.wav
Transcript: I'LL WAIT HERE TILL YOU'RE READY EXPLAIN YOURSELF TO THE LADY TELL HER I'M AN OLD AND RHEUMATIC INVALID WHO HAS BEEN USED TO ASKING HIS OWN QUESTIONS

Name: 05-3081-166546-0071.wav
Transcript: AS HER QUIET FIGURE APPEARED IN THE DOORWAY SWEETWATER STOLE A GLANCE AT MISTER GRYCE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0072.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO DOUBTING THEM IN THIS INSTANCE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0073.wav
Transcript: YES

Name: 05-3081-166546-0074.wav
Transcript: FOR SOME LITTLE TIME THAT IS IT SEEMED LONG THOUGH I BELIEVE IT WAS NOT MORE THAN A MINUTE BEFORE TWO MEN CAME RUNNING FROM THE MUSICIANS GALLERY

Name: 05-3081-166546-0075.wav
Transcript: YES MANY TIMES

Name: 05-3081-166546-0076.wav
Transcript: WHAT MADE THE DIFFERENCE

Name: 05-3081-166546-0077.wav
Transcript: MISS CLARKE STARTED AND HER SWEET FACE SHOWED A MOMENT'S PERPLEXITY DID I SHE QUERIED MUSINGLY

Name: 05-3081-166546-0078.wav
Transcript: NO A VERY NATURAL ONE I SHOULD SAY

Name: 05-3081-166546-0079.wav
Transcript: AND THE GLANCE SHE CAST HIM WHILE NOT MEETING HIS EYE SHOWED THAT SHE UNDERSTOOD THE IMPORTANCE OF THE ADMISSION

Name: 05-3081-166546-0080.wav
Transcript: I KNOW SHE SAID WHAT YOU ARE GOING TO ASK ME NOW

Name: 05-3081-166546-0081.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO PONIARD IN THE WOUND

Name: 05-3081-166546-0082.wav
Transcript: THE TIME IS NARROWED DOWN TO ONE AND IN THAT ONE MISS CLARKE WAS THE ONLY PERSON TO TOUCH HER

Name: 05-3081-166546-0083.wav
Transcript: I WILL TROUBLE YOU NO FURTHER

Name: 05-3081-166546-0084.wav
Transcript: SWEETWATER HELP ME OUT OF THIS

Name: 05-3081-166546-0085.wav
Transcript: BUT VIGOUR RETURNED TO HIM BEFORE HE HAD WELL REACHED THE DOOR AND HE SHOWED SOME OF HIS OLD SPIRIT AS HE THANKED MISS CLARKE AND TURNED TO TAKE THE ELEVATOR

Name: 05-3081-166546-0086.wav
Transcript: THE NEXT MINUTE SHE WAS IN THIS LADY'S ARMS

Name: 05-3081-166546-0087.wav
Transcript: NO WEAPON PROTRUDED FROM THE WOUND NOR WAS ANY FOUND ON OR NEAR HER IN THE MEZZANINE WHAT FOLLOWS

Name: 05-3081-166546-0088.wav
Transcript: SHE STRUCK THE BLOW HERSELF AND THE STRENGTH OF PURPOSE WHICH LED HER TO DO THIS GAVE HER THE ADDITIONAL FORCE TO PULL THE WEAPON OUT AND FLING IT FROM HER

Name: 05-3081-166546-0089.wav
Transcript: IT DID NOT FALL UPON THE FLOOR AROUND HER THEREFORE IT FLEW THROUGH ONE OF THOSE OPENINGS INTO THE LOBBY AND THERE IT EITHER WILL BE OR HAS BEEN FOUND

Name: 06-3081-166546-0000.wav
Transcript: WHEN WE TOOK OUR SEATS AT THE BREAKFAST TABLE IT WAS WITH THE FEELING OF BEING NO LONGER LOOKED UPON AS CONNECTED IN ANY WAY WITH THIS CASE

Name: 06-3081-166546-0001.wav
Transcript: INSTANTLY THEY ABSORBED ALL MY ATTENTION THOUGH I DARED NOT GIVE THEM A DIRECT LOOK AND CONTINUED TO OBSERVE THEM ONLY IN THE GLASS

Name: 06-3081-166546-0002.wav
Transcript: YES AND A VERY RESPECTABLE ONE

Name: 06-3081-166546-0003.wav
Transcript: THE LADY IS NOT THE MOTHER OF THE BOYS BUT THEIR AUNT

Name: 06-3081-166546-0004.wav
Transcript: THE BOYS BELONG TO THE GENTLEMAN WHO IS A WIDOWER

Name: 06-3081-166546-0005.wav
Transcript: GEORGE NODDED

Name: 06-3081-166546-0006.wav
Transcript: THE BOYS LOOK WIDE AWAKE ENOUGH IF THE FATHER DOES NOT

Name: 06-3081-166546-0007.wav
Transcript: DO THEY STILL INSIST THAT MISS CHALLONER WAS THE ONLY PERSON IN THE ROOM WITH THEM AT THIS TIME

Transcript: HAVE YOU EVER THOUGHT THAT SHE MIGHT HAVE BEEN A SUICIDE

Transcript: HE WANTS ME TO STAND READY TO OBEY ANY SUMMONS THE POLICE MAY SEND ME

Name: 07-3081-166546-0021.wav
Transcript: I EMPHASISED COMPLACENTLY

Name: 07-3081-166546-0022.wav
Transcript: HE APPEARED TO KNOW FOR HE TOLD ME AT ONCE THAT HE WAS DETECTIVE GRYCE A MAN WHO HAD GROWN OLD IN SOLVING JUST SUCH BAFFLING PROBLEMS AS THESE

Name: 07-3081-166546-0023.wav
Transcript: HE GAVE UP WORK SOME TIME AGO I HAVE BEEN TOLD MY HUSBAND WENT ON BUT EVIDENTLY A GREAT CASE STILL HAS ITS ALLUREMENT FOR HIM

Name: 07-3081-166546-0024.wav
Transcript: THE TRAIL HERE MUST BE A VERY BLIND ONE FOR THEM TO CALL HIM IN

Name: 07-3081-166546-0025.wav
Transcript: I WISH WE HAD NOT LEFT SO SOON

Name: 07-3081-166546-0026.wav
Transcript: HE WAS LATE OF COURSE BUT WHEN HE DID APPEAR I ALMOST FORGOT OUR USUAL GREETING IN MY HURRY TO ASK HIM IF HE HAD SEEN THE EVENING PAPERS

Name: 07-3081-166546-0027.wav
Transcript: HOWEVER A LITTLE LATER WE HAD A COMFORTABLE CHAT

Name: 07-3081-166546-0028.wav
Transcript: IT WAS ONE WHICH GAVE ME A SMALL TRIUMPH OVER GEORGE

Name: 07-3081-166546-0029.wav
Transcript: THE SUGGESTION HE HAD LAUGHED AT WAS NOT SO ENTIRELY FOOLISH AS HE HAD BEEN PLEASED TO CONSIDER IT

Name: 07-3081-166546-0030.wav
Transcript: THEIR GREETING WAS CORDIAL AND THE LINES ON THE LATTER'S FACE RELAXED A LITTLE AS HE MET THE STILL BRIGHT EYE OF THE MAN UPON WHOSE INSTINCT AND JUDGMENT SO MUCH RELIANCE HAD ALWAYS BEEN PLACED

Name: 07-3081-166546-0031.wav
Transcript: THIS IS VERY GOOD OF YOU HE BEGAN GLANCING DOWN AT THE AGED DETECTIVE'S BUNDLED UP LEGS AND GENTLY PUSHING A CHAIR TOWARDS HIM

Name: 07-3081-166546-0032.wav
Transcript: IT'S THE MOST INEXPLICABLE THERE

Name: 07-3081-166546-0033.wav
Transcript: BUT CLEWS THERE ARE ABSOLUTELY NONE

Name: 07-3081-166546-0034.wav
Transcript: THAT IS WE HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO FIND ANY PERHAPS YOU CAN

Name: 07-3081-166546-0035.wav
Transcript: AT LEAST THAT IS WHAT WE HOPE

Name: 07-3081-166546-0036.wav
Transcript: IT'S A CASE IN A THOUSAND GRYCE

Name: 07-3081-166546-0037.wav
Transcript: THE OLD MAN'S EYES SHOT FIRE AND UNCONSCIOUSLY ONE FOOT SLIPPED TO THE FLOOR

Name: 07-3081-166546-0038.wav
Transcript: SHE HAD NO COMPANION NEAR HER

Name: 07-3081-166546-0039.wav
Transcript: NO WORD NO CRY JUST A COLLAPSE AND SUDDEN FALL

Name: 07-3081-166546-0040.wav
Transcript: IN OLDEN DAYS THEY WOULD HAVE SAID STRUCK BY A BOLT FROM HEAVEN

Name: 07-3081-166546-0041.wav
Transcript: WHAT DO YOU MAKE OF IT GRYCE

Name: 07-3081-166546-0042.wav
Transcript: I SHOULD LIKE TO SEE THE DESK YOU SPEAK OF AND THE SPOT WHERE SHE FELL

Name: 07-3081-166546-0043.wav
Transcript: A YOUNG FELLOW WHO HAD BEEN HOVERING IN THE BACKGROUND AT ONCE STEPPED FORWARD

Name: 07-3081-166546-0044.wav
Transcript: HE WAS THE PLAIN FACED DETECTIVE WHO HAD SPOKEN TO GEORGE

Name: 07-3081-166546-0045.wav
Transcript: THIS SWEETWATER AS THEY CALLED HIM WAS I HAVE SINCE UNDERSTOOD ONE OF HIS PROTEGES AND MORE OR LESS OF A FAVOURITE

Name: 07-3081-166546-0046.wav
Transcript: BEEN OVER THE GROUND STUDIED THE AFFAIR CAREFULLY

Name: 07-3081-166546-0047.wav
Transcript: VERY WELL THEN YOU'RE IN A POSITION TO PIONEER ME

Name: 07-3081-166546-0048.wav
Transcript: WELL WELL THAT'S HONEST AT ALL EVENTS

Name: 07-3081-166546-0049.wav
Transcript: BUT I'M IN NO POSITION TO MAKE PROMISES

Name: 07-3081-166546-0050.wav
Transcript: OLD DAYS DON'T RETURN FOR THE ASKING

Name: 07-3081-166546-0051.wav
Transcript: WHETHER HE GOT ANYTHING ELSE IT WOULD BE IMPOSSIBLE TO SAY FROM HIS MANNER AS HE FINALLY SANK INTO A CHAIR BY ONE OF THE OPENINGS AND LOOKED DOWN ON THE LOBBY BELOW

Name: 07-3081-166546-0052.wav
Transcript: ONE OR TWO OF THE MUSICIANS FROM THE END OF THE HALL

Name: 07-3081-166546-0053.wav
Transcript: NATURALLY THEY REACHED HER FIRST

Name: 07-3081-166546-0054.wav
Transcript: MARK SOWERBY AND CLAUS HENNERBERG

Name: 07-3081-166546-0055.wav
Transcript: HONEST GERMANS MEN WHO HAVE PLAYED HERE FOR YEARS

Name: 07-3081-166546-0056.wav
Transcript: WHO CAME NEXT ON THE SCENE SOME PEOPLE FROM THE LOBBY

Name: 07-3081-166546-0057.wav
Transcript: ANYBODY BEFORE THE FATHER CAME IN

Name: 07-3081-166546-0058.wav
Transcript: YES MISS CLARKE THE MIDDLE AGED LADY WITH THE PARRISHES

Name: 07-3081-166546-0059.wav
Transcript: I SUPPOSE SHE HAS BEEN CAREFULLY QUESTIONED VERY I SHOULD SAY

Name: 07-3081-166546-0060.wav
Transcript: AND SHE SPEAKS OF NO WEAPON

Name: 07-3081-166546-0061.wav
Transcript: NOT TILL THE DOCTOR CAME HER DOCTOR WHO WAS HAPPILY IN HIS OFFICE IN THIS VERY BUILDING

Name: 07-3081-166546-0062.wav
Transcript: YES MISTER SLATER THE ASSISTANT MANAGER WHO WAS IN THE LOBBY AT THE TIME SAYS THAT TEN MINUTES AT LEAST MUST HAVE ELAPSED

Name: 07-3081-166546-0063.wav
Transcript: NO DOUBT

Name: 07-3081-166546-0064.wav
Transcript: SWEETWATER SOMEONE DREW THAT WEAPON OUT

Name: 07-3081-166546-0065.wav
Transcript: NOT ALTOGETHER BY ME

Name: 07-3081-166546-0066.wav
Transcript: WHEREVER SHE PLEASES ONLY I CAN'T WALK FAR

Name: 07-3081-166546-0067.wav
Transcript: IT HAS NOT BEEN RUNNING SINCE LAST NIGHT OR IT WOULD BE FULL OF CURIOUS PEOPLE ALL THE TIME HUSTLING TO GET A GLIMPSE OF THIS PLACE

Name: 07-3081-166546-0068.wav
Transcript: BUT THEY'LL PUT A MAN ON FOR YOU

Name: 07-3081-166546-0069.wav
Transcript: VERY GOOD MANAGE IT AS YOU WILL

Name: 07-3081-166546-0070.wav
Transcript: I'LL WAIT HERE TILL YOU'RE READY EXPLAIN YOURSELF TO THE LADY TELL HER I'M AN OLD AND RHEUMATIC INVALID WHO HAS BEEN USED TO ASKING HIS OWN QUESTIONS

Name: 07-3081-166546-0071.wav
Transcript: AS HER QUIET FIGURE APPEARED IN THE DOORWAY SWEETWATER STOLE A GLANCE AT MISTER GRYCE

Name: 07-3081-166546-0072.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO DOUBTING THEM IN THIS INSTANCE

Name: 07-3081-166546-0073.wav
Transcript: YES

Name: 07-3081-166546-0074.wav
Transcript: FOR SOME LITTLE TIME THAT IS IT SEEMED LONG THOUGH I BELIEVE IT WAS NOT MORE THAN A MINUTE BEFORE TWO MEN CAME RUNNING FROM THE MUSICIANS GALLERY

Name: 07-3081-166546-0075.wav
Transcript: YES MANY TIMES

Name: 07-3081-166546-0076.wav
Transcript: WHAT MADE THE DIFFERENCE

Name: 07-3081-166546-0077.wav
Transcript: MISS CLARKE STARTED AND HER SWEET FACE SHOWED A MOMENT'S PERPLEXITY DID I SHE QUERIED MUSINGLY

Name: 07-3081-166546-0078.wav
Transcript: NO A VERY NATURAL ONE I SHOULD SAY

Name: 07-3081-166546-0079.wav
Transcript: AND THE GLANCE SHE CAST HIM WHILE NOT MEETING HIS EYE SHOWED THAT SHE UNDERSTOOD THE IMPORTANCE OF THE ADMISSION

Name: 07-3081-166546-0080.wav
Transcript: I KNOW SHE SAID WHAT YOU ARE GOING TO ASK ME NOW

Name: 07-3081-166546-0081.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO PONIARD IN THE WOUND

Name: 07-3081-166546-0082.wav
Transcript: THE TIME IS NARROWED DOWN TO ONE AND IN THAT ONE MISS CLARKE WAS THE ONLY PERSON TO TOUCH HER

Name: 07-3081-166546-0083.wav
Transcript: I WILL TROUBLE YOU NO FURTHER

Name: 07-3081-166546-0084.wav
Transcript: SWEETWATER HELP ME OUT OF THIS

Name: 07-3081-166546-0085.wav
Transcript: BUT VIGOUR RETURNED TO HIM BEFORE HE HAD WELL REACHED THE DOOR AND HE SHOWED SOME OF HIS OLD SPIRIT AS HE THANKED MISS CLARKE AND TURNED TO TAKE THE ELEVATOR

Name: 07-3081-166546-0086.wav
Transcript: THE NEXT MINUTE SHE WAS IN THIS LADY'S ARMS

Name: 07-3081-166546-0087.wav
Transcript: NO WEAPON PROTRUDED FROM THE WOUND NOR WAS ANY FOUND ON OR NEAR HER IN THE MEZZANINE WHAT FOLLOWS

Name: 07-3081-166546-0088.wav
Transcript: SHE STRUCK THE BLOW HERSELF AND THE STRENGTH OF PURPOSE WHICH LED HER TO DO THIS GAVE HER THE ADDITIONAL FORCE TO PULL THE WEAPON OUT AND FLING IT FROM HER

Name: 07-3081-166546-0089.wav
Transcript: IT DID NOT FALL UPON THE FLOOR AROUND HER THEREFORE IT FLEW THROUGH ONE OF THOSE OPENINGS INTO THE LOBBY AND THERE IT EITHER WILL BE OR HAS BEEN FOUND

Name: 08-3081-166546-0000.wav
Transcript: WHEN WE TOOK OUR SEATS AT THE BREAKFAST TABLE IT WAS WITH THE FEELING OF BEING NO LONGER LOOKED UPON AS CONNECTED IN ANY WAY WITH THIS CASE

Name: 08-3081-166546-0001.wav
Transcript: INSTANTLY THEY ABSORBED ALL MY ATTENTION THOUGH I DARED NOT GIVE THEM A DIRECT LOOK AND CONTINUED TO OBSERVE THEM ONLY IN THE GLASS

Name: 08-3081-166546-0002.wav
Transcript: YES AND A VERY RESPECTABLE ONE

Name: 08-3081-166546-0003.wav
Transcript: THE LADY IS NOT THE MOTHER OF THE BOYS BUT THEIR AUNT

Name: 08-3081-166546-0004.wav
Transcript: THE BOYS BELONG TO THE GENTLEMAN WHO IS A WIDOWER

Name: 08-3081-166546-0005.wav
Transcript: GEORGE NODDED

Name: 08-3081-166546-0006.wav
Transcript: THE BOYS LOOK WIDE AWAKE ENOUGH IF THE FATHER DOES NOT

Name: 08-3081-166546-0007.wav
Transcript: DO THEY STILL INSIST THAT MISS CHALLONER WAS THE ONLY PERSON IN THE ROOM WITH THEM AT THIS TIME

Name: 08-3081-166546-0008.wav
Transcript: GEORGE

Name: 08-3081-166546-0009.wav
Transcript: HAVE YOU EVER THOUGHT THAT SHE MIGHT HAVE BEEN A SUICIDE

Name: 08-3081-166546-0010.wav
Transcript: I KNOW IT SOUNDS FOOLISH BUT THE ALTERNATIVE IS SO IMPROBABLE

Name: 08-3081-166546-0011.wav
Transcript: THE BOYS LOOK WIDE AWAKE ENOUGH BUT WHO CAN TELL I WOULD SOONER BELIEVE THAT

Name: 08-3081-166546-0012.wav
Transcript: A MAN WAS LOOKING IN FROM THE CORRIDOR BEHIND AT THE FOUR PERSONS WE WERE JUST DISCUSSING

Name: 08-3081-166546-0013.wav
Transcript: I INQUIRED OF GEORGE WITH MY EYES STILL ON THIS FURTIVE WATCHER

Name: 08-3081-166546-0014.wav
Transcript: I TOOK QUITE A FANCY TO HIM WHY

Name: 08-3081-166546-0015.wav
Transcript: I AM LOOKING AT HIM NOW

Transcript: JUST AN EVERYDAY DETECTIVE BUT AMBITIOUS I SUPPOSE AND QUITE ALIVE TO THE IMPORTANCE OF BEING THOROUGH

Transcript: HE GAVE UP WORK SOME TIME AGO I HAVE BEEN TOLD MY HUSBAND WENT ON BUT EVIDENTLY A GREAT CASE STILL HAS ITS ALLUREMENT FOR HIM

Name: 09-3081-166546-0024.wav
Transcript: THE TRAIL HERE MUST BE A VERY BLIND ONE FOR THEM TO CALL HIM IN

Name: 09-3081-166546-0025.wav
Transcript: I WISH WE HAD NOT LEFT SO SOON

Name: 09-3081-166546-0026.wav
Transcript: HE WAS LATE OF COURSE BUT WHEN HE DID APPEAR I ALMOST FORGOT OUR USUAL GREETING IN MY HURRY TO ASK HIM IF HE HAD SEEN THE EVENING PAPERS

Name: 09-3081-166546-0027.wav
Transcript: HOWEVER A LITTLE LATER WE HAD A COMFORTABLE CHAT

Name: 09-3081-166546-0028.wav
Transcript: IT WAS ONE WHICH GAVE ME A SMALL TRIUMPH OVER GEORGE

Name: 09-3081-166546-0029.wav
Transcript: THE SUGGESTION HE HAD LAUGHED AT WAS NOT SO ENTIRELY FOOLISH AS HE HAD BEEN PLEASED TO CONSIDER IT

Name: 09-3081-166546-0030.wav
Transcript: THEIR GREETING WAS CORDIAL AND THE LINES ON THE LATTER'S FACE RELAXED A LITTLE AS HE MET THE STILL BRIGHT EYE OF THE MAN UPON WHOSE INSTINCT AND JUDGMENT SO MUCH RELIANCE HAD ALWAYS BEEN PLACED

Name: 09-3081-166546-0031.wav
Transcript: THIS IS VERY GOOD OF YOU HE BEGAN GLANCING DOWN AT THE AGED DETECTIVE'S BUNDLED UP LEGS AND GENTLY PUSHING A CHAIR TOWARDS HIM

Name: 09-3081-166546-0032.wav
Transcript: IT'S THE MOST INEXPLICABLE THERE

Name: 09-3081-166546-0033.wav
Transcript: BUT CLEWS THERE ARE ABSOLUTELY NONE

Name: 09-3081-166546-0034.wav
Transcript: THAT IS WE HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO FIND ANY PERHAPS YOU CAN

Name: 09-3081-166546-0035.wav
Transcript: AT LEAST THAT IS WHAT WE HOPE

Name: 09-3081-166546-0036.wav
Transcript: IT'S A CASE IN A THOUSAND GRYCE

Name: 09-3081-166546-0037.wav
Transcript: THE OLD MAN'S EYES SHOT FIRE AND UNCONSCIOUSLY ONE FOOT SLIPPED TO THE FLOOR

Name: 09-3081-166546-0038.wav
Transcript: SHE HAD NO COMPANION NEAR HER

Name: 09-3081-166546-0039.wav
Transcript: NO WORD NO CRY JUST A COLLAPSE AND SUDDEN FALL

Name: 09-3081-166546-0040.wav
Transcript: IN OLDEN DAYS THEY WOULD HAVE SAID STRUCK BY A BOLT FROM HEAVEN

Name: 09-3081-166546-0041.wav
Transcript: WHAT DO YOU MAKE OF IT GRYCE

Name: 09-3081-166546-0042.wav
Transcript: I SHOULD LIKE TO SEE THE DESK YOU SPEAK OF AND THE SPOT WHERE SHE FELL

Name: 09-3081-166546-0043.wav
Transcript: A YOUNG FELLOW WHO HAD BEEN HOVERING IN THE BACKGROUND AT ONCE STEPPED FORWARD

Name: 09-3081-166546-0044.wav
Transcript: HE WAS THE PLAIN FACED DETECTIVE WHO HAD SPOKEN TO GEORGE

Name: 09-3081-166546-0045.wav
Transcript: THIS SWEETWATER AS THEY CALLED HIM WAS I HAVE SINCE UNDERSTOOD ONE OF HIS PROTEGES AND MORE OR LESS OF A FAVOURITE

Name: 09-3081-166546-0046.wav
Transcript: BEEN OVER THE GROUND STUDIED THE AFFAIR CAREFULLY

Name: 09-3081-166546-0047.wav
Transcript: VERY WELL THEN YOU'RE IN A POSITION TO PIONEER ME

Name: 09-3081-166546-0048.wav
Transcript: WELL WELL THAT'S HONEST AT ALL EVENTS

Name: 09-3081-166546-0049.wav
Transcript: BUT I'M IN NO POSITION TO MAKE PROMISES

Name: 09-3081-166546-0050.wav
Transcript: OLD DAYS DON'T RETURN FOR THE ASKING

Name: 09-3081-166546-0051.wav
Transcript: WHETHER HE GOT ANYTHING ELSE IT WOULD BE IMPOSSIBLE TO SAY FROM HIS MANNER AS HE FINALLY SANK INTO A CHAIR BY ONE OF THE OPENINGS AND LOOKED DOWN ON THE LOBBY BELOW

Name: 09-3081-166546-0052.wav
Transcript: ONE OR TWO OF THE MUSICIANS FROM THE END OF THE HALL

Name: 09-3081-166546-0053.wav
Transcript: NATURALLY THEY REACHED HER FIRST

Name: 09-3081-166546-0054.wav
Transcript: MARK SOWERBY AND CLAUS HENNERBERG

Name: 09-3081-166546-0055.wav
Transcript: HONEST GERMANS MEN WHO HAVE PLAYED HERE FOR YEARS

Name: 09-3081-166546-0056.wav
Transcript: WHO CAME NEXT ON THE SCENE SOME PEOPLE FROM THE LOBBY

Name: 09-3081-166546-0057.wav
Transcript: ANYBODY BEFORE THE FATHER CAME IN

Name: 09-3081-166546-0058.wav
Transcript: YES MISS CLARKE THE MIDDLE AGED LADY WITH THE PARRISHES

Name: 09-3081-166546-0059.wav
Transcript: I SUPPOSE SHE HAS BEEN CAREFULLY QUESTIONED VERY I SHOULD SAY

Name: 09-3081-166546-0060.wav
Transcript: AND SHE SPEAKS OF NO WEAPON

Name: 09-3081-166546-0061.wav
Transcript: NOT TILL THE DOCTOR CAME HER DOCTOR WHO WAS HAPPILY IN HIS OFFICE IN THIS VERY BUILDING

Name: 09-3081-166546-0062.wav
Transcript: YES MISTER SLATER THE ASSISTANT MANAGER WHO WAS IN THE LOBBY AT THE TIME SAYS THAT TEN MINUTES AT LEAST MUST HAVE ELAPSED

Name: 09-3081-166546-0063.wav
Transcript: NO DOUBT

Name: 09-3081-166546-0064.wav
Transcript: SWEETWATER SOMEONE DREW THAT WEAPON OUT

Name: 09-3081-166546-0065.wav
Transcript: NOT ALTOGETHER BY ME

Name: 09-3081-166546-0066.wav
Transcript: WHEREVER SHE PLEASES ONLY I CAN'T WALK FAR

Name: 09-3081-166546-0067.wav
Transcript: IT HAS NOT BEEN RUNNING SINCE LAST NIGHT OR IT WOULD BE FULL OF CURIOUS PEOPLE ALL THE TIME HUSTLING TO GET A GLIMPSE OF THIS PLACE

Name: 09-3081-166546-0068.wav
Transcript: BUT THEY'LL PUT A MAN ON FOR YOU

Name: 09-3081-166546-0069.wav
Transcript: VERY GOOD MANAGE IT AS YOU WILL

Name: 09-3081-166546-0070.wav
Transcript: I'LL WAIT HERE TILL YOU'RE READY EXPLAIN YOURSELF TO THE LADY TELL HER I'M AN OLD AND RHEUMATIC INVALID WHO HAS BEEN USED TO ASKING HIS OWN QUESTIONS

Name: 09-3081-166546-0071.wav
Transcript: AS HER QUIET FIGURE APPEARED IN THE DOORWAY SWEETWATER STOLE A GLANCE AT MISTER GRYCE

Name: 09-3081-166546-0072.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO DOUBTING THEM IN THIS INSTANCE

Name: 09-3081-166546-0073.wav
Transcript: YES

Name: 09-3081-166546-0074.wav
Transcript: FOR SOME LITTLE TIME THAT IS IT SEEMED LONG THOUGH I BELIEVE IT WAS NOT MORE THAN A MINUTE BEFORE TWO MEN CAME RUNNING FROM THE MUSICIANS GALLERY

Name: 09-3081-166546-0075.wav
Transcript: YES MANY TIMES

Name: 09-3081-166546-0076.wav
Transcript: WHAT MADE THE DIFFERENCE

Name: 09-3081-166546-0077.wav
Transcript: MISS CLARKE STARTED AND HER SWEET FACE SHOWED A MOMENT'S PERPLEXITY DID I SHE QUERIED MUSINGLY

Name: 09-3081-166546-0078.wav
Transcript: NO A VERY NATURAL ONE I SHOULD SAY

Name: 09-3081-166546-0079.wav
Transcript: AND THE GLANCE SHE CAST HIM WHILE NOT MEETING HIS EYE SHOWED THAT SHE UNDERSTOOD THE IMPORTANCE OF THE ADMISSION

Name: 09-3081-166546-0080.wav
Transcript: I KNOW SHE SAID WHAT YOU ARE GOING TO ASK ME NOW

Name: 09-3081-166546-0081.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO PONIARD IN THE WOUND

Name: 09-3081-166546-0082.wav
Transcript: THE TIME IS NARROWED DOWN TO ONE AND IN THAT ONE MISS CLARKE WAS THE ONLY PERSON TO TOUCH HER

Name: 09-3081-166546-0083.wav
Transcript: I WILL TROUBLE YOU NO FURTHER

Name: 09-3081-166546-0084.wav
Transcript: SWEETWATER HELP ME OUT OF THIS

Name: 09-3081-166546-0085.wav
Transcript: BUT VIGOUR RETURNED TO HIM BEFORE HE HAD WELL REACHED THE DOOR AND HE SHOWED SOME OF HIS OLD SPIRIT AS HE THANKED MISS CLARKE AND TURNED TO TAKE THE ELEVATOR

Name: 09-3081-166546-0086.wav
Transcript: THE NEXT MINUTE SHE WAS IN THIS LADY'S ARMS

Name: 09-3081-166546-0087.wav
Transcript: NO WEAPON PROTRUDED FROM THE WOUND NOR WAS ANY FOUND ON OR NEAR HER IN THE MEZZANINE WHAT FOLLOWS

Name: 09-3081-166546-0088.wav
Transcript: SHE STRUCK THE BLOW HERSELF AND THE STRENGTH OF PURPOSE WHICH LED HER TO DO THIS GAVE HER THE ADDITIONAL FORCE TO PULL THE WEAPON OUT AND FLING IT FROM HER

Name: 09-3081-166546-0089.wav
Transcript: IT DID NOT FALL UPON THE FLOOR AROUND HER THEREFORE IT FLEW THROUGH ONE OF THOSE OPENINGS INTO THE LOBBY AND THERE IT EITHER WILL BE OR HAS BEEN FOUND

Name: 10-3081-166546-0000.wav
Transcript: WHEN WE TOOK OUR SEATS AT THE BREAKFAST TABLE IT WAS WITH THE FEELING OF BEING NO LONGER LOOKED UPON AS CONNECTED IN ANY WAY WITH THIS CASE

Name: 10-3081-166546-0001.wav
Transcript: INSTANTLY THEY ABSORBED ALL MY ATTENTION THOUGH I DARED NOT GIVE THEM A DIRECT LOOK AND CONTINUED TO OBSERVE THEM ONLY IN THE GLASS

Name: 10-3081-166546-0002.wav
Transcript: YES AND A VERY RESPECTABLE ONE

Name: 10-3081-166546-0003.wav
Transcript: THE LADY IS NOT THE MOTHER OF THE BOYS BUT THEIR AUNT

Name: 10-3081-166546-0004.wav
Transcript: THE BOYS BELONG TO THE GENTLEMAN WHO IS A WIDOWER

Name: 10-3081-166546-0005.wav
Transcript: GEORGE NODDED

Name: 10-3081-166546-0006.wav
Transcript: THE BOYS LOOK WIDE AWAKE ENOUGH IF THE FATHER DOES NOT

Name: 10-3081-166546-0007.wav
Transcript: DO THEY STILL INSIST THAT MISS CHALLONER WAS THE ONLY PERSON IN THE ROOM WITH THEM AT THIS TIME

Name: 10-3081-166546-0008.wav
Transcript: GEORGE

Name: 10-3081-166546-0009.wav
Transcript: HAVE YOU EVER THOUGHT THAT SHE MIGHT HAVE BEEN A SUICIDE

Name: 10-3081-166546-0010.wav
Transcript: I KNOW IT SOUNDS FOOLISH BUT THE ALTERNATIVE IS SO IMPROBABLE

Name: 10-3081-166546-0011.wav
Transcript: THE BOYS LOOK WIDE AWAKE ENOUGH BUT WHO CAN TELL I WOULD SOONER BELIEVE THAT

Name: 10-3081-166546-0012.wav
Transcript: A MAN WAS LOOKING IN FROM THE CORRIDOR BEHIND AT THE FOUR PERSONS WE WERE JUST DISCUSSING

Name: 10-3081-166546-0013.wav
Transcript: I INQUIRED OF GEORGE WITH MY EYES STILL ON THIS FURTIVE WATCHER

Name: 10-3081-166546-0014.wav
Transcript: I TOOK QUITE A FANCY TO HIM WHY

Name: 10-3081-166546-0015.wav
Transcript: I AM LOOKING AT HIM NOW

Transcript: JUST AN EVERYDAY DETECTIVE BUT AMBITIOUS I SUPPOSE AND QUITE ALIVE TO THE IMPORTANCE OF BEING THOROUGH

Transcript: HE WAS LATE OF COURSE BUT WHEN HE DID APPEAR I ALMOST FORGOT OUR USUAL GREETING IN MY HURRY TO ASK HIM IF HE HAD SEEN THE EVENING PAPERS

Name: 3081-166546-0027.wav
Transcript: HOWEVER A LITTLE LATER WE HAD A COMFORTABLE CHAT

Name: 3081-166546-0028.wav
Transcript: IT WAS ONE WHICH GAVE ME A SMALL TRIUMPH OVER GEORGE

Name: 3081-166546-0029.wav
Transcript: THE SUGGESTION HE HAD LAUGHED AT WAS NOT SO ENTIRELY FOOLISH AS HE HAD BEEN PLEASED TO CONSIDER IT

Name: 3081-166546-0030.wav
Transcript: THEIR GREETING WAS CORDIAL AND THE LINES ON THE LATTER'S FACE RELAXED A LITTLE AS HE MET THE STILL BRIGHT EYE OF THE MAN UPON WHOSE INSTINCT AND JUDGMENT SO MUCH RELIANCE HAD ALWAYS BEEN PLACED

Name: 3081-166546-0031.wav
Transcript: THIS IS VERY GOOD OF YOU HE BEGAN GLANCING DOWN AT THE AGED DETECTIVE'S BUNDLED UP LEGS AND GENTLY PUSHING A CHAIR TOWARDS HIM

Name: 3081-166546-0032.wav
Transcript: IT'S THE MOST INEXPLICABLE THERE

Name: 3081-166546-0033.wav
Transcript: BUT CLEWS THERE ARE ABSOLUTELY NONE

Name: 3081-166546-0034.wav
Transcript: THAT IS WE HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO FIND ANY PERHAPS YOU CAN

Name: 3081-166546-0035.wav
Transcript: AT LEAST THAT IS WHAT WE HOPE

Name: 3081-166546-0036.wav
Transcript: IT'S A CASE IN A THOUSAND GRYCE

Name: 3081-166546-0037.wav
Transcript: THE OLD MAN'S EYES SHOT FIRE AND UNCONSCIOUSLY ONE FOOT SLIPPED TO THE FLOOR

Name: 3081-166546-0038.wav
Transcript: SHE HAD NO COMPANION NEAR HER

Name: 3081-166546-0039.wav
Transcript: NO WORD NO CRY JUST A COLLAPSE AND SUDDEN FALL

Name: 3081-166546-0040.wav
Transcript: IN OLDEN DAYS THEY WOULD HAVE SAID STRUCK BY A BOLT FROM HEAVEN

Name: 3081-166546-0041.wav
Transcript: WHAT DO YOU MAKE OF IT GRYCE

Name: 3081-166546-0042.wav
Transcript: I SHOULD LIKE TO SEE THE DESK YOU SPEAK OF AND THE SPOT WHERE SHE FELL

Name: 3081-166546-0043.wav
Transcript: A YOUNG FELLOW WHO HAD BEEN HOVERING IN THE BACKGROUND AT ONCE STEPPED FORWARD

Name: 3081-166546-0044.wav
Transcript: HE WAS THE PLAIN FACED DETECTIVE WHO HAD SPOKEN TO GEORGE

Name: 3081-166546-0045.wav
Transcript: THIS SWEETWATER AS THEY CALLED HIM WAS I HAVE SINCE UNDERSTOOD ONE OF HIS PROTEGES AND MORE OR LESS OF A FAVOURITE

Name: 3081-166546-0046.wav
Transcript: BEEN OVER THE GROUND STUDIED THE AFFAIR CAREFULLY

Name: 3081-166546-0047.wav
Transcript: VERY WELL THEN YOU'RE IN A POSITION TO PIONEER ME

Name: 3081-166546-0048.wav
Transcript: WELL WELL THAT'S HONEST AT ALL EVENTS

Name: 3081-166546-0049.wav
Transcript: BUT I'M IN NO POSITION TO MAKE PROMISES

Name: 3081-166546-0050.wav
Transcript: OLD DAYS DON'T RETURN FOR THE ASKING

Name: 3081-166546-0051.wav
Transcript: WHETHER HE GOT ANYTHING ELSE IT WOULD BE IMPOSSIBLE TO SAY FROM HIS MANNER AS HE FINALLY SANK INTO A CHAIR BY ONE OF THE OPENINGS AND LOOKED DOWN ON THE LOBBY BELOW

Name: 3081-166546-0052.wav
Transcript: ONE OR TWO OF THE MUSICIANS FROM THE END OF THE HALL

Name: 3081-166546-0053.wav
Transcript: NATURALLY THEY REACHED HER FIRST

Name: 3081-166546-0054.wav
Transcript: MARK SOWERBY AND CLAUS HENNERBERG

Name: 3081-166546-0055.wav
Transcript: HONEST GERMANS MEN WHO HAVE PLAYED HERE FOR YEARS

Name: 3081-166546-0056.wav
Transcript: WHO CAME NEXT ON THE SCENE SOME PEOPLE FROM THE LOBBY

Name: 3081-166546-0057.wav
Transcript: ANYBODY BEFORE THE FATHER CAME IN

Name: 3081-166546-0058.wav
Transcript: YES MISS CLARKE THE MIDDLE AGED LADY WITH THE PARRISHES

Name: 3081-166546-0059.wav
Transcript: I SUPPOSE SHE HAS BEEN CAREFULLY QUESTIONED VERY I SHOULD SAY

Name: 3081-166546-0060.wav
Transcript: AND SHE SPEAKS OF NO WEAPON

Name: 3081-166546-0061.wav
Transcript: NOT TILL THE DOCTOR CAME HER DOCTOR WHO WAS HAPPILY IN HIS OFFICE IN THIS VERY BUILDING

Name: 3081-166546-0062.wav
Transcript: YES MISTER SLATER THE ASSISTANT MANAGER WHO WAS IN THE LOBBY AT THE TIME SAYS THAT TEN MINUTES AT LEAST MUST HAVE ELAPSED

Name: 3081-166546-0063.wav
Transcript: NO DOUBT

Name: 3081-166546-0064.wav
Transcript: SWEETWATER SOMEONE DREW THAT WEAPON OUT

Name: 3081-166546-0065.wav
Transcript: NOT ALTOGETHER BY ME

Name: 3081-166546-0066.wav
Transcript: WHEREVER SHE PLEASES ONLY I CAN'T WALK FAR

Name: 3081-166546-0067.wav
Transcript: IT HAS NOT BEEN RUNNING SINCE LAST NIGHT OR IT WOULD BE FULL OF CURIOUS PEOPLE ALL THE TIME HUSTLING TO GET A GLIMPSE OF THIS PLACE

Name: 3081-166546-0068.wav
Transcript: BUT THEY'LL PUT A MAN ON FOR YOU

Name: 3081-166546-0069.wav
Transcript: VERY GOOD MANAGE IT AS YOU WILL

Name: 3081-166546-0070.wav
Transcript: I'LL WAIT HERE TILL YOU'RE READY EXPLAIN YOURSELF TO THE LADY TELL HER I'M AN OLD AND RHEUMATIC INVALID WHO HAS BEEN USED TO ASKING HIS OWN QUESTIONS

Name: 3081-166546-0071.wav
Transcript: AS HER QUIET FIGURE APPEARED IN THE DOORWAY SWEETWATER STOLE A GLANCE AT MISTER GRYCE

Name: 3081-166546-0072.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO DOUBTING THEM IN THIS INSTANCE

Name: 3081-166546-0073.wav
Transcript: YES

Name: 3081-166546-0074.wav
Transcript: FOR SOME LITTLE TIME THAT IS IT SEEMED LONG THOUGH I BELIEVE IT WAS NOT MORE THAN A MINUTE BEFORE TWO MEN CAME RUNNING FROM THE MUSICIANS GALLERY

Name: 3081-166546-0075.wav
Transcript: YES MANY TIMES

Name: 3081-166546-0076.wav
Transcript: WHAT MADE THE DIFFERENCE

Name: 3081-166546-0077.wav
Transcript: MISS CLARKE STARTED AND HER SWEET FACE SHOWED A MOMENT'S PERPLEXITY DID I SHE QUERIED MUSINGLY

Name: 3081-166546-0078.wav
Transcript: NO A VERY NATURAL ONE I SHOULD SAY

Name: 3081-166546-0079.wav
Transcript: AND THE GLANCE SHE CAST HIM WHILE NOT MEETING HIS EYE SHOWED THAT SHE UNDERSTOOD THE IMPORTANCE OF THE ADMISSION

Name: 3081-166546-0080.wav
Transcript: I KNOW SHE SAID WHAT YOU ARE GOING TO ASK ME NOW

Name: 3081-166546-0081.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS NO PONIARD IN THE WOUND

Name: 3081-166546-0082.wav
Transcript: THE TIME IS NARROWED DOWN TO ONE AND IN THAT ONE MISS CLARKE WAS THE ONLY PERSON TO TOUCH HER

Name: 3081-166546-0083.wav
Transcript: I WILL TROUBLE YOU NO FURTHER

Name: 3081-166546-0084.wav
Transcript: SWEETWATER HELP ME OUT OF THIS

Name: 3081-166546-0085.wav
Transcript: BUT VIGOUR RETURNED TO HIM BEFORE HE HAD WELL REACHED THE DOOR AND HE SHOWED SOME OF HIS OLD SPIRIT AS HE THANKED MISS CLARKE AND TURNED TO TAKE THE ELEVATOR

Name: 3081-166546-0086.wav
Transcript: THE NEXT MINUTE SHE WAS IN THIS LADY'S ARMS

Name: 3081-166546-0087.wav
Transcript: NO WEAPON PROTRUDED FROM THE WOUND NOR WAS ANY FOUND ON OR NEAR HER IN THE MEZZANINE WHAT FOLLOWS

Name: 3081-166546-0088.wav
Transcript: SHE STRUCK THE BLOW HERSELF AND THE STRENGTH OF PURPOSE WHICH LED HER TO DO THIS GAVE HER THE ADDITIONAL FORCE TO PULL THE WEAPON OUT AND FLING IT FROM HER

Name: 3081-166546-0089.wav
Transcript: IT DID NOT FALL UPON THE FLOOR AROUND HER THEREFORE IT FLEW THROUGH ONE OF THOSE OPENINGS INTO THE LOBBY AND THERE IT EITHER WILL BE OR HAS BEEN FOUND

Name: 01-1462-170142-0000.wav
Transcript: THE LAST TWO DAYS OF THE VOYAGE BARTLEY FOUND ALMOST INTOLERABLE

Name: 01-1462-170142-0001.wav
Transcript: EMERGING AT EUSTON AT HALF PAST THREE O'CLOCK IN THE AFTERNOON ALEXANDER HAD HIS LUGGAGE SENT TO THE SAVOY AND DROVE AT ONCE TO BEDFORD SQUARE

Name: 01-1462-170142-0002.wav
Transcript: SHE BLUSHED AND SMILED AND FUMBLED HIS CARD IN HER CONFUSION BEFORE SHE RAN UPSTAIRS

Name: 01-1462-170142-0003.wav
Transcript: THE ROOM WAS EMPTY WHEN HE ENTERED

Name: 01-1462-170142-0004.wav
Transcript: A COAL FIRE WAS CRACKLING IN THE GRATE AND THE LAMPS WERE LIT FOR IT WAS ALREADY BEGINNING TO GROW DARK OUTSIDE

Name: 01-1462-170142-0005.wav
Transcript: SHE CALLED HIS NAME ON THE THRESHOLD BUT IN HER SWIFT FLIGHT ACROSS THE ROOM SHE FELT A CHANGE IN HIM AND CAUGHT HERSELF UP SO DEFTLY THAT HE COULD NOT TELL JUST WHEN SHE DID IT

Name: 01-1462-170142-0006.wav
Transcript: SHE MERELY BRUSHED HIS CHEEK WITH HER LIPS AND PUT A HAND LIGHTLY AND JOYOUSLY ON EITHER SHOULDER

Name: 01-1462-170142-0007.wav
Transcript: I NEVER DREAMED IT WOULD BE YOU BARTLEY

Name: 01-1462-170142-0008.wav
Transcript: WHEN DID YOU COME BARTLEY AND HOW DID IT HAPPEN YOU HAVEN'T SPOKEN A WORD

Name: 01-1462-170142-0009.wav
Transcript: SHE LOOKED AT HIS HEAVY SHOULDERS AND BIG DETERMINED HEAD THRUST FORWARD LIKE A CATAPULT IN LEASH

Name: 01-1462-170142-0010.wav
Transcript: I'LL DO ANYTHING YOU WISH ME TO BARTLEY SHE SAID TREMULOUSLY

Name: 01-1462-170142-0011.wav
Transcript: HE PULLED UP A WINDOW AS IF THE AIR WERE HEAVY

Name: 01-1462-170142-0012.wav
Transcript: HILDA WATCHED HIM FROM HER CORNER TREMBLING AND SCARCELY BREATHING DARK SHADOWS GROWING ABOUT HER EYES

Name: 01-1462-170142-0013.wav
Transcript: IT IT HASN'T ALWAYS MADE YOU MISERABLE HAS IT

Name: 01-1462-170142-0014.wav
Transcript: ALWAYS BUT IT'S WORSE NOW

Name: 01-1462-170142-0015.wav
Transcript: IT'S UNBEARABLE IT TORTURES ME EVERY MINUTE

Name: 01-1462-170142-0016.wav
Transcript: I AM NOT A MAN WHO CAN LIVE TWO LIVES HE WENT ON FEVERISHLY EACH LIFE SPOILS THE OTHER

Name: 01-1462-170142-0017.wav
Transcript: I GET NOTHING BUT MISERY OUT OF EITHER

Name: 01-1462-170142-0018.wav
Transcript: THERE IS THIS DECEPTION BETWEEN ME AND EVERYTHING

Name: 01-1462-170142-0019.wav
Transcript: AT THAT WORD DECEPTION SPOKEN WITH SUCH SELF CONTEMPT THE COLOR FLASHED BACK INTO HILDA'S FACE AS SUDDENLY AS IF SHE HAD BEEN STRUCK BY A WHIPLASH

Name: 01-1462-170142-0020.wav
Transcript: SHE BIT HER LIP AND LOOKED DOWN AT HER HANDS WHICH WERE CLASPED TIGHTLY IN FRONT OF HER

Name: 01-1462-170142-0021.wav
Transcript: COULD YOU COULD YOU SIT DOWN AND TALK ABOUT IT QUIETLY BARTLEY AS IF I WERE A FRIEND AND NOT SOME ONE WHO HAD TO BE DEFIED

Name: 01-1462-170142-0022.wav
Transcript: HE DROPPED BACK HEAVILY INTO HIS CHAIR BY THE FIRE

Name: 01-1462-170142-0023.wav
Transcript: I HAVE THOUGHT ABOUT IT UNTIL I AM WORN OUT

Name: 01-1462-170142-0024.wav
Transcript: AFTER THE VERY FIRST

Name: 01-1462-170142-0025.wav
Transcript: HILDA'S FACE QUIVERED BUT SHE WHISPERED YES I THINK IT MUST HAVE BEEN

Name: 01-1462-170142-0026.wav
Transcript: SHE PRESSED HIS HAND GENTLY IN GRATITUDE WEREN'T YOU HAPPY THEN AT ALL

Name: 01-1462-170142-0027.wav
Transcript: SOMETHING OF THEIR TROUBLING SWEETNESS CAME BACK TO ALEXANDER TOO

Name: 01-1462-170142-0028.wav
Transcript: PRESENTLY IT STOLE BACK TO HIS COAT SLEEVE

Name: 01-1462-170142-0029.wav
Transcript: YES HILDA I KNOW THAT HE SAID SIMPLY

Name: 01-1462-170142-0030.wav
Transcript: I UNDERSTAND BARTLEY I WAS WRONG

Name: 01-1462-170142-0031.wav
Transcript: SHE LISTENED INTENTLY BUT SHE HEARD NOTHING BUT THE CREAKING OF HIS CHAIR

Name: 01-1462-170142-0032.wav
Transcript: YOU WANT ME TO SAY IT SHE WHISPERED

Name: 01-1462-170142-0033.wav
Transcript: BARTLEY LEANED HIS HEAD IN HIS HANDS AND SPOKE THROUGH HIS TEETH

Name: 01-1462-170142-0034.wav
Transcript: IT'S GOT TO BE A CLEAN BREAK HILDA

Name: 01-1462-170142-0035.wav
Transcript: OH BARTLEY WHAT AM I TO DO

Name: 01-1462-170142-0036.wav
Transcript: YOU ASK ME TO STAY AWAY FROM YOU BECAUSE YOU WANT ME

Name: 01-1462-170142-0037.wav
Transcript: I WILL ASK THE LEAST IMAGINABLE BUT I MUST HAVE SOMETHING

Name: 01-1462-170142-0038.wav
Transcript: HILDA SAT ON THE ARM OF IT AND PUT HER HANDS LIGHTLY ON HIS SHOULDERS

Name: 01-1462-170142-0039.wav
Transcript: YOU SEE LOVING SOME ONE AS I LOVE YOU MAKES THE WHOLE WORLD DIFFERENT

Name: 01-1462-170142-0040.wav
Transcript: AND THEN YOU CAME BACK NOT CARING VERY MUCH BUT IT MADE NO DIFFERENCE

Name: 01-1462-170142-0041.wav
Transcript: SHE SLID TO THE FLOOR BESIDE HIM AS IF SHE WERE TOO TIRED TO SIT UP ANY LONGER

Name: 01-1462-170142-0042.wav
Transcript: DON'T CRY DON'T CRY HE WHISPERED

Transcript: THE LAST TWO DAYS OF THE VOYAGE BARTLEY FOUND ALMOST INTOLERABLE

Name: 04-1462-170142-0001.wav
Transcript: EMERGING AT EUSTON AT HALF PAST THREE O'CLOCK IN THE AFTERNOON ALEXANDER HAD HIS LUGGAGE SENT TO THE SAVOY AND DROVE AT ONCE TO BEDFORD SQUARE

Name: 04-1462-170142-0002.wav
Transcript: SHE BLUSHED AND SMILED AND FUMBLED HIS CARD IN HER CONFUSION BEFORE SHE RAN UPSTAIRS

Name: 04-1462-170142-0003.wav
Transcript: THE ROOM WAS EMPTY WHEN HE ENTERED

Name: 04-1462-170142-0004.wav
Transcript: A COAL FIRE WAS CRACKLING IN THE GRATE AND THE LAMPS WERE LIT FOR IT WAS ALREADY BEGINNING TO GROW DARK OUTSIDE

Name: 04-1462-170142-0005.wav
Transcript: SHE CALLED HIS NAME ON THE THRESHOLD BUT IN HER SWIFT FLIGHT ACROSS THE ROOM SHE FELT A CHANGE IN HIM AND CAUGHT HERSELF UP SO DEFTLY THAT HE COULD NOT TELL JUST WHEN SHE DID IT

Name: 04-1462-170142-0006.wav
Transcript: SHE MERELY BRUSHED HIS CHEEK WITH HER LIPS AND PUT A HAND LIGHTLY AND JOYOUSLY ON EITHER SHOULDER

Name: 04-1462-170142-0007.wav
Transcript: I NEVER DREAMED IT WOULD BE YOU BARTLEY

Name: 04-1462-170142-0008.wav
Transcript: WHEN DID YOU COME BARTLEY AND HOW DID IT HAPPEN YOU HAVEN'T SPOKEN A WORD

Name: 04-1462-170142-0009.wav
Transcript: SHE LOOKED AT HIS HEAVY SHOULDERS AND BIG DETERMINED HEAD THRUST FORWARD LIKE A CATAPULT IN LEASH

Name: 04-1462-170142-0010.wav
Transcript: I'LL DO ANYTHING YOU WISH ME TO BARTLEY SHE SAID TREMULOUSLY

Name: 04-1462-170142-0011.wav
Transcript: HE PULLED UP A WINDOW AS IF THE AIR WERE HEAVY

Name: 04-1462-170142-0012.wav
Transcript: HILDA WATCHED HIM FROM HER CORNER TREMBLING AND SCARCELY BREATHING DARK SHADOWS GROWING ABOUT HER EYES

Name: 04-1462-170142-0013.wav
Transcript: IT IT HASN'T ALWAYS MADE YOU MISERABLE HAS IT

Name: 04-1462-170142-0014.wav

Name: 04-1462-170142-0015.wav
Transcript: IT'S UNBEARABLE IT TORTURES ME EVERY MINUTE

Transcript: I AM NOT A MAN WHO CAN LIVE TWO LIVES HE WENT ON FEVERISHLY EACH LIFE SPOILS THE OTHER

Transcript: DON'T CRY DON'T CRY HE WHISPERED

Name: 08-1462-170142-0000.wav
Transcript: THE LAST TWO DAYS OF THE VOYAGE BARTLEY FOUND ALMOST INTOLERABLE

Name: 08-1462-170142-0001.wav
Transcript: EMERGING AT EUSTON AT HALF PAST THREE O'CLOCK IN THE AFTERNOON ALEXANDER HAD HIS LUGGAGE SENT TO THE SAVOY AND DROVE AT ONCE TO BEDFORD SQUARE

Name: 08-1462-170142-0002.wav
Transcript: SHE BLUSHED AND SMILED AND FUMBLED HIS CARD IN HER CONFUSION BEFORE SHE RAN UPSTAIRS

Name: 08-1462-170142-0003.wav
Transcript: THE ROOM WAS EMPTY WHEN HE ENTERED

Name: 08-1462-170142-0004.wav
Transcript: A COAL FIRE WAS CRACKLING IN THE GRATE AND THE LAMPS WERE LIT FOR IT WAS ALREADY BEGINNING TO GROW DARK OUTSIDE

Name: 08-1462-170142-0005.wav
Transcript: SHE CALLED HIS NAME ON THE THRESHOLD BUT IN HER SWIFT FLIGHT ACROSS THE ROOM SHE FELT A CHANGE IN HIM AND CAUGHT HERSELF UP SO DEFTLY THAT HE COULD NOT TELL JUST WHEN SHE DID IT

Name: 08-1462-170142-0006.wav
Transcript: SHE MERELY BRUSHED HIS CHEEK WITH HER LIPS AND PUT A HAND LIGHTLY AND JOYOUSLY ON EITHER SHOULDER

Name: 08-1462-170142-0007.wav
Transcript: I NEVER DREAMED IT WOULD BE YOU BARTLEY

Name: 08-1462-170142-0008.wav
Transcript: WHEN DID YOU COME BARTLEY AND HOW DID IT HAPPEN YOU HAVEN'T SPOKEN A WORD

Name: 08-1462-170142-0009.wav
Transcript: SHE LOOKED AT HIS HEAVY SHOULDERS AND BIG DETERMINED HEAD THRUST FORWARD LIKE A CATAPULT IN LEASH

Name: 08-1462-170142-0010.wav
Transcript: I'LL DO ANYTHING YOU WISH ME TO BARTLEY SHE SAID TREMULOUSLY

Name: 08-1462-170142-0011.wav
Transcript: HE PULLED UP A WINDOW AS IF THE AIR WERE HEAVY

Name: 08-1462-170142-0012.wav
Transcript: HILDA WATCHED HIM FROM HER CORNER TREMBLING AND SCARCELY BREATHING DARK SHADOWS GROWING ABOUT HER EYES

Name: 08-1462-170142-0013.wav
Transcript: IT IT HASN'T ALWAYS MADE YOU MISERABLE HAS IT

Name: 08-1462-170142-0014.wav
Transcript: ALWAYS BUT IT'S WORSE NOW

Name: 08-1462-170142-0015.wav
Transcript: IT'S UNBEARABLE IT TORTURES ME EVERY MINUTE

Name: 08-1462-170142-0016.wav
Transcript: I AM NOT A MAN WHO CAN LIVE TWO LIVES HE WENT ON FEVERISHLY EACH LIFE SPOILS THE OTHER

Name: 08-1462-170142-0017.wav
Transcript: I GET NOTHING BUT MISERY OUT OF EITHER

Name: 08-1462-170142-0018.wav
Transcript: THERE IS THIS DECEPTION BETWEEN ME AND EVERYTHING

Name: 08-1462-170142-0019.wav
Transcript: AT THAT WORD DECEPTION SPOKEN WITH SUCH SELF CONTEMPT THE COLOR FLASHED BACK INTO HILDA'S FACE AS SUDDENLY AS IF SHE HAD BEEN STRUCK BY A WHIPLASH

Name: 08-1462-170142-0020.wav
Transcript: SHE BIT HER LIP AND LOOKED DOWN AT HER HANDS WHICH WERE CLASPED TIGHTLY IN FRONT OF HER

Name: 08-1462-170142-0021.wav
Transcript: COULD YOU COULD YOU SIT DOWN AND TALK ABOUT IT QUIETLY BARTLEY AS IF I WERE A FRIEND AND NOT SOME ONE WHO HAD TO BE DEFIED

Name: 08-1462-170142-0022.wav
Transcript: HE DROPPED BACK HEAVILY INTO HIS CHAIR BY THE FIRE

Transcript: I HAVE THOUGHT ABOUT IT UNTIL I AM WORN OUT

Name: 08-1462-170142-0024.wav
Transcript: AFTER THE VERY FIRST

Transcript: SIR EDWARD NOT WHOLLY DISCOURAGED BY THE DENIAL WITH WHICH DORRIFORTH HAD WITH DELICACY ACQUAINTED HIM STILL HOPED FOR A KIND RECEPTION AND WAS SO OFTEN AT THE HOUSE OF MISSUS HORTON THAT LORD FREDERICK'S JEALOUSY WAS EXCITED AND THE TORTURES HE SUFFERED IN CONSEQUENCE CONVINCED HIM BEYOND A DOUBT OF THE SINCERITY OF HIS AFFECTION

Name: 01-3536-23268-0001.wav
Transcript: EVERY TIME HE BEHELD THE OBJECT OF HIS PASSION FOR HE STILL CONTINUED HIS VISITS THOUGH NOT SO FREQUENTLY AS HERETOFORE HE PLEADED HIS CAUSE WITH SUCH ARDOUR THAT MISS WOODLEY WHO WAS SOMETIMES PRESENT AND EVER COMPASSIONATE COULD NOT RESIST WISHING HIM SUCCESS

Name: 01-3536-23268-0002.wav
Transcript: YET DID THE WATCHFUL MISS WOODLEY OFTENTIMES HEAR A SIGH ESCAPE FROM HER UNKNOWN TO HERSELF TILL SHE WAS REMINDED OF IT AND THEN A SUDDEN BLUSH WOULD INSTANTLY OVERSPREAD HER FACE

Name: 01-3536-23268-0003.wav
Transcript: NIGHT AFTER NIGHT HIS SLEEP HAD BEEN DISTURBED BY FEARS FOR HER WHEN ABROAD MORNING AFTER MORNING IT HAD BEEN BROKEN BY THE CLAMOUR OF HER RETURN

Name: 01-3536-23268-0017.wav
Transcript: AT THE USUAL HOUR MISTER DORRIFORTH AND HIS WARD WERE SUMMONED TO TEA HE ENTERED WITH A COUNTENANCE WHICH EVINCED THE REMAINS OF ANGER HIS EYE GAVE TESTIMONY OF HIS ABSENT THOUGHTS AND THOUGH HE TOOK UP A PAMPHLET AFFECTING TO READ IT WAS PLAIN TO DISCERN THAT HE SCARCELY KNEW HE HELD IT IN HIS HAND

Name: 01-3536-23268-0020.wav
Transcript: MISS WOODLEY DID NOT RECOLLECT HERSELF SO BUT WAS SO IN REALITY IN HER PEACE AND CHARITY WERE INSTINCTIVE VIRTUES ACCIDENT COULD NOT INCREASE THEM

Name: 01-3536-23268-0021.wav
Transcript: HE COUGHED DRANK HIS TEA ENDEAVOURED TO TALK BUT FOUND IT DIFFICULT SOMETIMES READ AND IN THIS MANNER NEAR TWO HOURS WERE PASSED AWAY WHEN MISS MILNER CAME INTO THE ROOM NOT DRESSED FOR A BALL BUT AS SHE HAD RISEN FROM DINNER

Name: 01-3536-23268-0022.wav
Transcript: DORRIFORTH READ ON AND SEEMED AFRAID OF LOOKING UP LEST HE SHOULD SEE WHAT HE COULD NOT HAVE PARDONED

Name: 01-3536-23268-0023.wav
Transcript: AFTER A FEW MINUTES PAUSE AND SOME LITTLE EMBARRASSMENT ON THE PART OF MISSUS HORTON AT THE DISAPPOINTMENT SHE HAD TO ENCOUNTER FROM THIS UNEXPECTED DUTIFUL CONDUCT SHE ASKED MISS MILNER IF SHE WOULD NOW HAVE ANY TEA

Name: 01-3536-23268-0024.wav

Name: 01-8842-302196-0004.wav
Transcript: POETRY NOT BEING AN EXACT SCIENCE LITERALITY OF RENDERING IS ALTOGETHER SECONDARY TO THIS CHIEF LAW

Name: 01-8842-302196-0005.wav

Transcript: WHEN THE MUSTER BELL RANG AND THE GANG BROKE UP RUFUS DAWES ON HIS SILENT WAY TO HIS SEPARATE CELL OBSERVED A NOTABLE CHANGE OF CUSTOM IN THE DISPOSITION OF THE NEW CONVICT

Transcript: I'M NOT TO GO IN THERE SAYS THE EX BANK CLERK DRAWING BACK IN DISMAY FROM THE CLOUD OF FOUL FACES WHICH LOWERED UPON HIM

Transcript: WHAT IS HE MORE THAN ANYBODY ELSE SAID THE WRETCHED MAN TO HIMSELF AS HE HUGGED HIS MISERY CLOSE

Name: 01-3752-4943-0004.wav
Transcript: ABOUT DAWN THE NEXT MORNING MISTER NORTH WHO AMONGST OTHER VAGARIES NOT APPROVED OF BY HIS BISHOP HAD A HABIT OF PROWLING ABOUT THE PRISON AT UNOFFICIAL HOURS WAS ATTRACTED BY A DISPUTE AT THE DOOR OF THE DORMITORY

Name: 01-3752-4943-0005.wav
Transcript: A PRISONER REFRACTORY YOUR REVERENCE SAID THE WATCHMAN

Name: 01-3752-4943-0006.wav
Transcript: WANTS TO COME OUT MISTER NORTH

Name: 01-3752-4943-0007.wav
Transcript: KIRKLAND GHASTLY PALE BLEEDING WITH HIS WOOLLEN SHIRT TORN AND HIS BLUE EYES WIDE OPEN WITH TERROR WAS CLINGING TO THE BARS

Name: 01-3752-4943-0008.wav
Transcript: AND BEAT ON THE BARS WITH WHITE AND SWEATING HANDS

Name: 01-3752-4943-0009.wav
Transcript: I ORDER YOU SIR NORTH CRIED INDIGNANT

Name: 01-3752-4943-0010.wav
Transcript: VERY SORRY YOUR REVERENCE BUT YOUR REVERENCE KNOWS THAT I DAREN'T DO SUCH A THING

Name: 01-3752-4943-0011.wav
Transcript: OH YOU MINISTERS OF CHRIST WOLVES IN SHEEP'S CLOTHING YOU SHALL BE JUDGED FOR THIS

Name: 01-3752-4943-0012.wav
Transcript: LET HIM OUT CRIED NORTH AGAIN STAMPING HIS FOOT

Transcript: THERE'S MORE TROUBLE WITH YOU BLOODY ARISTOCRATS THAN ENOUGH LIE QUIET

Transcript: YOU CAN GUESS WHAT THAT UNHAPPY BOY HAS SUFFERED

Transcript: IMPERTINENT YOUNG BEGGAR SAID BURGESS

Transcript: DO HIM GOOD CURSE HIM

Transcript: IT'S HARD FOR SUCH YOUNG UNS

Transcript: HAVE YOU EVER BEEN IN THAT THAT PLACE I WAS IN LAST NIGHT ASKED KIRKLAND

Transcript: WHAT DOES HE CARE CARE

Name: 01-3752-4943-0020.wav
Transcript: IF YOU FALL WE MUST FALL OVER YOU AND THEN YOU'RE DONE FOR

Name: 01-3752-4943-0021.wav
Transcript: HE HAD HARDLY UTTERED THE WORDS WHEN THE BOY FLUNG HIMSELF BENEATH THE LOG

Name: 01-3752-4943-0022.wav
Transcript: HOLD ON TO ME MISS NANCY SAID THE GIANT I'M BIG ENOUGH TO CARRY DOUBLE

Name: 01-3752-4943-0023.wav
Transcript: BUT KIRKLAND KEPT STEADILY ON FOR THE RIVER

Name: 01-3752-4943-0024.wav
Transcript: JUST AS HE REACHED IT HOWEVER THE FIGURE OF MISTER NORTH ROSE FROM BEHIND A PILE OF STONES

Name: 01-3752-4943-0025.wav
Transcript: KIRKLAND JUMPED FOR THE JETTY MISSED HIS FOOTING AND FELL INTO THE ARMS OF THE CHAPLAIN

Name: 01-3752-4943-0026.wav
Transcript: OH MISTER NORTH SAYS KIRKLAND WHY DID YOU STOP ME

Name: 01-3752-4944-0000.wav
Transcript: CAPTAIN FRERE SAYS THAT THE SCENERY IS DELIGHTFUL

Name: 01-3752-4944-0001.wav
Transcript: ABANDONED INDEED BY GOD AND MAN ALMOST

Name: 01-3752-4944-0002.wav
Transcript: IN THE VALLEY OF THE SHADOW OF DEATH HE IS WITH US

Name: 01-3752-4944-0003.wav
Transcript: YOU HAVE NOT BEEN LONG IN THE COLONY MISTER MEEKIN

Name: 01-3752-4944-0004.wav
Transcript: IF YOU PLEASE SAID MEEKIN GRAVELY

Name: 01-3752-4944-0005.wav
Transcript: PRAY HELP YOURSELF TO WINE

Name: 01-3752-4944-0006.wav
Transcript: HAVE YOU MANY VISITORS CAPTAIN BURGESS VERY FEW

Name: 01-3752-4944-0007.wav
Transcript: I WAS QUARTERED WITH HIM AT SARAH ISLAND

Name: 01-3752-4944-0008.wav
Transcript: SO HE'S A FRIEND OF YOURS EH

Name: 01-3752-4944-0009.wav
Transcript: I HAD THE PLEASURE OF MEETING HIM IN SOCIETY

Name: 01-3752-4944-0010.wav
Transcript: HE IS JUST MARRIED YOU KNOW IS HE SAID BURGESS

Name: 01-3752-4944-0011.wav
Transcript: THE DEVIL HE IS I HEARD SOMETHING ABOUT IT TOO

Name: 01-3752-4944-0012.wav
Transcript: YES ONE OUGHTN'T TO LEAVE THE COLONY WITHOUT SEEING IT SAYS BURGESS IT'S WORTH SEEING

Name: 01-3752-4944-0013.wav
Transcript: IN FACT THE RINGLEADER JOHN REX GAVE ME HIS CONFESSION AND I SENT IT TO THE BISHOP

Name: 01-3752-4944-0014.wav
Transcript: A GREAT RASCAL PUT IN NORTH

Name: 01-3752-4944-0015.wav
Transcript: WELL NOW SAID MEEKIN WITH ASPERITY I DON'T AGREE WITH YOU

Name: 01-3752-4944-0016.wav
Transcript: HE SEEMS TO ME TO BE TRULY PENITENT FOR HIS OFFENCES A MISGUIDED BUT NOT A HYPOCRITICAL MAN IF MY KNOWLEDGE OF HUMAN NATURE GOES FOR ANYTHING I HOPE HE IS SAID NORTH

Name: 01-3752-4944-0017.wav
Transcript: THERE'S NO FEAR OF HIM SAID BURGESS CHEERILY IF HE GROWS UPROARIOUS WE'LL SOON GIVE HIM A TOUCH OF THE CAT

Name: 01-3752-4944-0018.wav
Transcript: I SUPPOSE SEVERITY IS NECESSARY RETURNED MEEKIN THOUGH TO MY EARS A FLOGGING SOUNDS A LITTLE DISTASTEFUL

Name: 01-3752-4944-0019.wav
Transcript: I HAVE THESE ATTACKS AT TIMES

Name: 01-3752-4944-0020.wav
Transcript: THE REVEREND MEEKIN EYED HIS CLERICAL BROTHER WITH HORROR THE REVEREND MEEKIN WAS NOT ACCUSTOMED TO CLERGYMEN WHO WORE BLACK NECKTIES SMOKED CLAY PIPES CHEWED TOBACCO AND DRANK NEAT BRANDY OUT OF TUMBLERS

Name: 01-3752-4944-0021.wav
Transcript: SO THEY WENT ON TO THE VERANDAH AND LOOKED DOWN UPON THE LIGHTS OF THE PRISON AND LISTENED TO THE SEA LAPPING THE SHORE

Name: 01-3752-4944-0022.wav
Transcript: BY AND BY A SHORT FIGURE SMOKING A CHEROOT CAME UP OUT OF THE DARK AND PROVED TO BE DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN WHO HAD BEEN PREVENTED FROM ATTENDING THE DINNER BY REASON OF AN ACCIDENT TO A CONSTABLE AT NORFOLK BAY WHICH HAD CLAIMED HIS PROFESSIONAL ATTENTION

Name: 01-3752-4944-0023.wav
Transcript: DEAD SAID DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN

Name: 01-3752-4944-0024.wav
Transcript: DELIGHTED TO SEE YOU MISTER MEEKIN

Name: 01-3752-4944-0025.wav
Transcript: BUT MACKLEWAIN WAS TIRED AND WANTED TO GET HOME

Name: 01-3752-4944-0026.wav
Transcript: OUR ROADS LIE TOGETHER DOCTOR

Name: 01-3752-4944-0027.wav
Transcript: BEFORE THE TWO CLERGYMEN HAD GOT HALF WAY DOWN THE STEEP PATH THAT LED FROM THE COMMANDANT'S HOUSE TO THE FLAT ON WHICH THE COTTAGES OF THE DOCTOR AND CHAPLAIN WERE BUILT MACKLEWAIN REJOINED THEM

Name: 01-3752-4944-0028.wav
Transcript: ANOTHER FLOGGING TO MORROW SAID HE GRUMBLINGLY

Name: 01-3752-4944-0029.wav
Transcript: WHOM IS HE GOING TO FLOG NOW

Name: 01-3752-4944-0030.wav
Transcript: YOU DON'T MEAN TO SAY HE'S GOING TO FLOG KIRKLAND

Name: 01-3752-4944-0031.wav
Transcript: PERHAPS YOU'LL HAVE THE GOODNESS TO ALLOW ME TO BE THE BEST JUDGE OF THAT RETURNED MACKLEWAIN DRAWING UP HIS LITTLE BODY TO ITS LEAST INSIGNIFICANT STATURE

Name: 01-3752-4944-0032.wav
Transcript: MISTER MEEKIN EXPRESSED SOME ALARM BUT DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN RE ASSURED HIM

Name: 01-3752-4944-0033.wav
Transcript: WE CAN'T DO ANYTHING WITHOUT EVIDENCE COMPLAIN

Name: 01-3752-4944-0034.wav
Transcript: I SHALL FIND MY PORTMANTEAU IN MY ROOM YOU SAID YES YES

Name: 01-3752-4944-0035.wav
Transcript: HE SLEEPS AT THE BACK AND NORTH HURRIED OFF

Name: 01-3752-4944-0036.wav
Transcript: AN IMPULSIVE GENTLEMAN SAID MEEKIN TO MACKLEWAIN AS THE SOUND OF MISTER NORTH'S FOOTSTEPS DIED AWAY IN THE DISTANCE

Name: 01-3752-4944-0037.wav
Transcript: MACKLEWAIN SHOOK HIS HEAD SERIOUSLY

Name: 01-3752-4944-0038.wav
Transcript: HE HAS THE STRANGEST FITS AT TIMES

Name: 01-3752-4944-0039.wav
Transcript: UNLESS IT'S A CANCER IN THE STOMACH I DON'T KNOW WHAT IT CAN BE CANCER IN THE STOMACH

Name: 01-3752-4944-0040.wav
Transcript: DOCTOR WE ALL HAVE OUR CROSSES HAVE WE NOT

Name: 01-3752-4944-0041.wav
Transcript: HOW DELIGHTFUL THE GRASS SMELLS

Name: 01-3752-4944-0042.wav
Transcript: GOOD NIGHT SIR I HOPE YOU WILL BE COMFORTABLE

Name: 01-3752-4944-0043.wav
Transcript: I'LL TEACH MY PRISONERS TO ATTEMPT SUICIDE

Name: 01-3752-4944-0044.wav
Transcript: THAT'S MACKLEWAIN'S BUSINESS

Name: 01-3752-4944-0045.wav
Transcript: THEN DON'T YOU INTERFERE WITH ME SIR

Name: 01-3752-4944-0046.wav
Transcript: I'VE GIVEN MY ORDERS SIR

Name: 01-3752-4944-0047.wav
Transcript: THEN CAPTAIN BURGESS CRIED NORTH HIS PALE FACE FLUSHING I TELL YOU THE BOY'S BLOOD WILL BE ON YOUR HEAD

Name: 01-3752-4944-0048.wav
Transcript: I AM A MINISTER OF GOD SIR AND I FORBID YOU TO COMMIT THIS CRIME

Name: 01-3752-4944-0049.wav
Transcript: DAMN YOUR IMPERTINENCE SIR BURST OUT BURGESS

Name: 01-3752-4944-0050.wav
Transcript: YOU'RE A DISMISSED OFFICER OF THE GOVERNMENT SIR

Name: 01-3752-4944-0051.wav
Transcript: THIS OF COURSE WAS MERE BRAVADO ON THE PART OF THE COMMANDANT

Name: 01-3752-4944-0052.wav
Transcript: NORTH KNEW WELL THAT HE WOULD NEVER DARE TO ATTEMPT ANY SUCH ACT OF VIOLENCE BUT THE INSULT STUNG HIM LIKE THE CUT OF A WHIP

Name: 01-3752-4944-0053.wav
Transcript: SHOW MISTER NORTH OUT HE SAID AND GO DOWN TO THE BARRACKS AND TELL TROKE THAT KIRKLAND IS TO HAVE A HUNDRED LASHES TO MORROW

Name: 01-3752-4944-0054.wav
Transcript: I'LL SHOW YOU WHO'S MASTER HERE MY GOOD SIR

Name: 01-3752-4944-0055.wav
Transcript: THIS IS MURDEROUS

Name: 01-3752-4944-0056.wav
Transcript: THE GOVERNMENT MAY GO TO AND YOU TOO ROARED BURGESS GET OUT

Name: 01-3752-4944-0057.wav
Transcript: THEY SHALL NOT FLOG THAT BOY HE SAID

Name: 01-3752-4944-0058.wav
Transcript: I'LL REPORT THIS TO THE GOVERNMENT

Name: 01-3752-4944-0059.wav
Transcript: I WISH I HADN'T TAKEN THAT BRANDY HE SAID FOOL THAT I AM

Name: 01-3752-4944-0060.wav
Transcript: OH GOD GIVE ME STRENGTH AID ME HELP ME

Name: 01-3752-4944-0061.wav
Transcript: O LORD LOOK DOWN UPON ME

Name: 01-3752-4944-0062.wav
Transcript: HE MIXED A TEASPOONFUL OF THIS IN A PANNIKIN OF WATER AND DRANK IT

Name: 01-3752-4944-0063.wav
Transcript: IT RELIEVED HIM FOR A WHILE

Name: 01-3752-4944-0064.wav
Transcript: IT WAS AS THOUGH HE HAD REACHED THE CRISIS OF A DISEASE WHICH HAD BEEN FOR DAYS GATHERING FORCE

Name: 01-3752-4944-0065.wav
Transcript: I MUST HAVE A TEASPOONFUL HE SAID TO ALLAY THE CRAVING

Name: 01-3752-4944-0066.wav
Transcript: TWICE HE PAUSED ON THE WAY TO THE SITTING ROOM AND TWICE WAS HE DRIVEN ON BY A POWER STRONGER THAN HIS WILL

Name: 01-3752-4944-0067.wav
Transcript: HE SMELT THE NUTTY AROMA OF THE SPIRIT

Name: 01-3752-4944-0068.wav
Transcript: THAT AT ALL TIMES DEBASING AT THIS PARTICULAR TIME IT WAS INFAMOUS THAT A VICE UNWORTHY OF ANY MAN WAS DOUBLY SINFUL IN A MAN OF EDUCATION AND A MINISTER OF GOD IN VAIN

Transcript: DOCTOR WE ALL HAVE OUR CROSSES HAVE WE NOT

Name: 02-3752-4944-0042.wav
Transcript: GOOD NIGHT SIR I HOPE YOU WILL BE COMFORTABLE

Transcript: I'LL TEACH MY PRISONERS TO ATTEMPT SUICIDE
