Transcript: THAT'S MACKLEWAIN'S BUSINESS

Name: 02-3752-4944-0045.wav
Transcript: THEN DON'T YOU INTERFERE WITH ME SIR

Name: 02-3752-4944-0046.wav
Transcript: I'VE GIVEN MY ORDERS SIR

Name: 02-3752-4944-0047.wav
Transcript: THEN CAPTAIN BURGESS CRIED NORTH HIS PALE FACE FLUSHING I TELL YOU THE BOY'S BLOOD WILL BE ON YOUR HEAD

Name: 02-3752-4944-0048.wav
Transcript: I AM A MINISTER OF GOD SIR AND I FORBID YOU TO COMMIT THIS CRIME

Name: 02-3752-4944-0049.wav
Transcript: DAMN YOUR IMPERTINENCE SIR BURST OUT BURGESS

Name: 02-3752-4944-0050.wav
Transcript: YOU'RE A DISMISSED OFFICER OF THE GOVERNMENT SIR

Name: 02-3752-4944-0051.wav
Transcript: THIS OF COURSE WAS MERE BRAVADO ON THE PART OF THE COMMANDANT

Name: 02-3752-4944-0052.wav
Transcript: NORTH KNEW WELL THAT HE WOULD NEVER DARE TO ATTEMPT ANY SUCH ACT OF VIOLENCE BUT THE INSULT STUNG HIM LIKE THE CUT OF A WHIP

Name: 02-3752-4944-0053.wav
Transcript: SHOW MISTER NORTH OUT HE SAID AND GO DOWN TO THE BARRACKS AND TELL TROKE THAT KIRKLAND IS TO HAVE A HUNDRED LASHES TO MORROW

Name: 02-3752-4944-0054.wav
Transcript: I'LL SHOW YOU WHO'S MASTER HERE MY GOOD SIR

Name: 02-3752-4944-0055.wav
Transcript: THIS IS MURDEROUS

Name: 02-3752-4944-0056.wav
Transcript: THE GOVERNMENT MAY GO TO AND YOU TOO ROARED BURGESS GET OUT

Name: 02-3752-4944-0057.wav
Transcript: THEY SHALL NOT FLOG THAT BOY HE SAID

Name: 02-3752-4944-0058.wav
Transcript: I'LL REPORT THIS TO THE GOVERNMENT

Name: 02-3752-4944-0059.wav
Transcript: I WISH I HADN'T TAKEN THAT BRANDY HE SAID FOOL THAT I AM

Name: 02-3752-4944-0060.wav
Transcript: OH GOD GIVE ME STRENGTH AID ME HELP ME

Name: 02-3752-4944-0061.wav
Transcript: O LORD LOOK DOWN UPON ME

Name: 02-3752-4944-0062.wav
Transcript: HE MIXED A TEASPOONFUL OF THIS IN A PANNIKIN OF WATER AND DRANK IT

Name: 02-3752-4944-0063.wav
Transcript: IT RELIEVED HIM FOR A WHILE

Name: 02-3752-4944-0064.wav
Transcript: IT WAS AS THOUGH HE HAD REACHED THE CRISIS OF A DISEASE WHICH HAD BEEN FOR DAYS GATHERING FORCE

Name: 02-3752-4944-0065.wav
Transcript: I MUST HAVE A TEASPOONFUL HE SAID TO ALLAY THE CRAVING

Name: 02-3752-4944-0066.wav
Transcript: TWICE HE PAUSED ON THE WAY TO THE SITTING ROOM AND TWICE WAS HE DRIVEN ON BY A POWER STRONGER THAN HIS WILL

Name: 02-3752-4944-0067.wav
Transcript: HE SMELT THE NUTTY AROMA OF THE SPIRIT

Name: 02-3752-4944-0068.wav
Transcript: THAT AT ALL TIMES DEBASING AT THIS PARTICULAR TIME IT WAS INFAMOUS THAT A VICE UNWORTHY OF ANY MAN WAS DOUBLY SINFUL IN A MAN OF EDUCATION AND A MINISTER OF GOD IN VAIN

Name: 02-3752-4944-0069.wav
Transcript: IN THE MIDST OF HIS ARGUMENTS HE FOUND HIMSELF AT THE CUPBOARD WITH THE BOTTLE AT HIS LIPS IN AN ATTITUDE THAT WAS AT ONCE LUDICROUS AND HORRIBLE

Name: 03-3752-4944-0000.wav
Transcript: CAPTAIN FRERE SAYS THAT THE SCENERY IS DELIGHTFUL

Name: 03-3752-4944-0001.wav
Transcript: ABANDONED INDEED BY GOD AND MAN ALMOST

Name: 03-3752-4944-0002.wav
Transcript: IN THE VALLEY OF THE SHADOW OF DEATH HE IS WITH US

Name: 03-3752-4944-0003.wav
Transcript: YOU HAVE NOT BEEN LONG IN THE COLONY MISTER MEEKIN

Name: 03-3752-4944-0004.wav
Transcript: IF YOU PLEASE SAID MEEKIN GRAVELY

Name: 03-3752-4944-0005.wav
Transcript: PRAY HELP YOURSELF TO WINE

Name: 03-3752-4944-0006.wav
Transcript: HAVE YOU MANY VISITORS CAPTAIN BURGESS VERY FEW

Name: 03-3752-4944-0007.wav
Transcript: I WAS QUARTERED WITH HIM AT SARAH ISLAND

Name: 03-3752-4944-0008.wav
Transcript: SO HE'S A FRIEND OF YOURS EH

Name: 03-3752-4944-0009.wav
Transcript: I HAD THE PLEASURE OF MEETING HIM IN SOCIETY

Name: 03-3752-4944-0010.wav
Transcript: HE IS JUST MARRIED YOU KNOW IS HE SAID BURGESS

Name: 03-3752-4944-0011.wav
Transcript: THE DEVIL HE IS I HEARD SOMETHING ABOUT IT TOO

Name: 03-3752-4944-0012.wav
Transcript: YES ONE OUGHTN'T TO LEAVE THE COLONY WITHOUT SEEING IT SAYS BURGESS IT'S WORTH SEEING

Name: 03-3752-4944-0013.wav
Transcript: IN FACT THE RINGLEADER JOHN REX GAVE ME HIS CONFESSION AND I SENT IT TO THE BISHOP

Name: 03-3752-4944-0014.wav
Transcript: A GREAT RASCAL PUT IN NORTH

Name: 03-3752-4944-0015.wav
Transcript: WELL NOW SAID MEEKIN WITH ASPERITY I DON'T AGREE WITH YOU

Name: 03-3752-4944-0016.wav
Transcript: HE SEEMS TO ME TO BE TRULY PENITENT FOR HIS OFFENCES A MISGUIDED BUT NOT A HYPOCRITICAL MAN IF MY KNOWLEDGE OF HUMAN NATURE GOES FOR ANYTHING I HOPE HE IS SAID NORTH

Name: 03-3752-4944-0017.wav
Transcript: THERE'S NO FEAR OF HIM SAID BURGESS CHEERILY IF HE GROWS UPROARIOUS WE'LL SOON GIVE HIM A TOUCH OF THE CAT

Name: 03-3752-4944-0018.wav
Transcript: I SUPPOSE SEVERITY IS NECESSARY RETURNED MEEKIN THOUGH TO MY EARS A FLOGGING SOUNDS A LITTLE DISTASTEFUL

Name: 03-3752-4944-0019.wav
Transcript: I HAVE THESE ATTACKS AT TIMES

Name: 03-3752-4944-0020.wav
Transcript: THE REVEREND MEEKIN EYED HIS CLERICAL BROTHER WITH HORROR THE REVEREND MEEKIN WAS NOT ACCUSTOMED TO CLERGYMEN WHO WORE BLACK NECKTIES SMOKED CLAY PIPES CHEWED TOBACCO AND DRANK NEAT BRANDY OUT OF TUMBLERS

Name: 03-3752-4944-0021.wav
Transcript: SO THEY WENT ON TO THE VERANDAH AND LOOKED DOWN UPON THE LIGHTS OF THE PRISON AND LISTENED TO THE SEA LAPPING THE SHORE

Name: 03-3752-4944-0022.wav
Transcript: BY AND BY A SHORT FIGURE SMOKING A CHEROOT CAME UP OUT OF THE DARK AND PROVED TO BE DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN WHO HAD BEEN PREVENTED FROM ATTENDING THE DINNER BY REASON OF AN ACCIDENT TO A CONSTABLE AT NORFOLK BAY WHICH HAD CLAIMED HIS PROFESSIONAL ATTENTION

Name: 03-3752-4944-0023.wav
Transcript: DEAD SAID DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN

Name: 03-3752-4944-0024.wav
Transcript: DELIGHTED TO SEE YOU MISTER MEEKIN

Name: 03-3752-4944-0025.wav
Transcript: BUT MACKLEWAIN WAS TIRED AND WANTED TO GET HOME

Name: 03-3752-4944-0026.wav
Transcript: OUR ROADS LIE TOGETHER DOCTOR

Name: 03-3752-4944-0027.wav
Transcript: BEFORE THE TWO CLERGYMEN HAD GOT HALF WAY DOWN THE STEEP PATH THAT LED FROM THE COMMANDANT'S HOUSE TO THE FLAT ON WHICH THE COTTAGES OF THE DOCTOR AND CHAPLAIN WERE BUILT MACKLEWAIN REJOINED THEM

Transcript: SO HE'S A FRIEND OF YOURS EH

Transcript: I HAD THE PLEASURE OF MEETING HIM IN SOCIETY

Name: 05-3752-4944-0010.wav
Transcript: HE IS JUST MARRIED YOU KNOW IS HE SAID BURGESS

Name: 05-3752-4944-0011.wav
Transcript: THE DEVIL HE IS I HEARD SOMETHING ABOUT IT TOO

Name: 05-3752-4944-0012.wav
Transcript: YES ONE OUGHTN'T TO LEAVE THE COLONY WITHOUT SEEING IT SAYS BURGESS IT'S WORTH SEEING

Name: 05-3752-4944-0013.wav
Transcript: IN FACT THE RINGLEADER JOHN REX GAVE ME HIS CONFESSION AND I SENT IT TO THE BISHOP

Name: 05-3752-4944-0014.wav
Transcript: A GREAT RASCAL PUT IN NORTH

Name: 05-3752-4944-0015.wav
Transcript: WELL NOW SAID MEEKIN WITH ASPERITY I DON'T AGREE WITH YOU

Name: 05-3752-4944-0016.wav
Transcript: HE SEEMS TO ME TO BE TRULY PENITENT FOR HIS OFFENCES A MISGUIDED BUT NOT A HYPOCRITICAL MAN IF MY KNOWLEDGE OF HUMAN NATURE GOES FOR ANYTHING I HOPE HE IS SAID NORTH

Name: 05-3752-4944-0017.wav
Transcript: THERE'S NO FEAR OF HIM SAID BURGESS CHEERILY IF HE GROWS UPROARIOUS WE'LL SOON GIVE HIM A TOUCH OF THE CAT

Name: 05-3752-4944-0018.wav
Transcript: I SUPPOSE SEVERITY IS NECESSARY RETURNED MEEKIN THOUGH TO MY EARS A FLOGGING SOUNDS A LITTLE DISTASTEFUL

Name: 05-3752-4944-0019.wav
Transcript: I HAVE THESE ATTACKS AT TIMES

Name: 05-3752-4944-0020.wav
Transcript: THE REVEREND MEEKIN EYED HIS CLERICAL BROTHER WITH HORROR THE REVEREND MEEKIN WAS NOT ACCUSTOMED TO CLERGYMEN WHO WORE BLACK NECKTIES SMOKED CLAY PIPES CHEWED TOBACCO AND DRANK NEAT BRANDY OUT OF TUMBLERS

Name: 05-3752-4944-0021.wav
Transcript: SO THEY WENT ON TO THE VERANDAH AND LOOKED DOWN UPON THE LIGHTS OF THE PRISON AND LISTENED TO THE SEA LAPPING THE SHORE

Name: 05-3752-4944-0022.wav
Transcript: BY AND BY A SHORT FIGURE SMOKING A CHEROOT CAME UP OUT OF THE DARK AND PROVED TO BE DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN WHO HAD BEEN PREVENTED FROM ATTENDING THE DINNER BY REASON OF AN ACCIDENT TO A CONSTABLE AT NORFOLK BAY WHICH HAD CLAIMED HIS PROFESSIONAL ATTENTION

Name: 05-3752-4944-0023.wav
Transcript: DEAD SAID DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN

Name: 05-3752-4944-0024.wav
Transcript: DELIGHTED TO SEE YOU MISTER MEEKIN

Name: 05-3752-4944-0025.wav
Transcript: BUT MACKLEWAIN WAS TIRED AND WANTED TO GET HOME

Name: 05-3752-4944-0026.wav
Transcript: OUR ROADS LIE TOGETHER DOCTOR

Name: 05-3752-4944-0027.wav
Transcript: BEFORE THE TWO CLERGYMEN HAD GOT HALF WAY DOWN THE STEEP PATH THAT LED FROM THE COMMANDANT'S HOUSE TO THE FLAT ON WHICH THE COTTAGES OF THE DOCTOR AND CHAPLAIN WERE BUILT MACKLEWAIN REJOINED THEM

Name: 05-3752-4944-0028.wav
Transcript: ANOTHER FLOGGING TO MORROW SAID HE GRUMBLINGLY

Name: 05-3752-4944-0029.wav
Transcript: WHOM IS HE GOING TO FLOG NOW

Name: 05-3752-4944-0030.wav
Transcript: YOU DON'T MEAN TO SAY HE'S GOING TO FLOG KIRKLAND

Name: 05-3752-4944-0031.wav
Transcript: PERHAPS YOU'LL HAVE THE GOODNESS TO ALLOW ME TO BE THE BEST JUDGE OF THAT RETURNED MACKLEWAIN DRAWING UP HIS LITTLE BODY TO ITS LEAST INSIGNIFICANT STATURE

Name: 05-3752-4944-0032.wav
Transcript: MISTER MEEKIN EXPRESSED SOME ALARM BUT DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN RE ASSURED HIM

Name: 05-3752-4944-0033.wav
Transcript: WE CAN'T DO ANYTHING WITHOUT EVIDENCE COMPLAIN

Name: 05-3752-4944-0034.wav
Transcript: I SHALL FIND MY PORTMANTEAU IN MY ROOM YOU SAID YES YES

Name: 05-3752-4944-0035.wav
Transcript: HE SLEEPS AT THE BACK AND NORTH HURRIED OFF

Name: 05-3752-4944-0036.wav
Transcript: AN IMPULSIVE GENTLEMAN SAID MEEKIN TO MACKLEWAIN AS THE SOUND OF MISTER NORTH'S FOOTSTEPS DIED AWAY IN THE DISTANCE

Name: 05-3752-4944-0037.wav
Transcript: MACKLEWAIN SHOOK HIS HEAD SERIOUSLY

Name: 05-3752-4944-0038.wav
Transcript: HE HAS THE STRANGEST FITS AT TIMES

Name: 05-3752-4944-0039.wav
Transcript: UNLESS IT'S A CANCER IN THE STOMACH I DON'T KNOW WHAT IT CAN BE CANCER IN THE STOMACH

Name: 05-3752-4944-0040.wav
Transcript: DOCTOR WE ALL HAVE OUR CROSSES HAVE WE NOT

Name: 05-3752-4944-0041.wav
Transcript: HOW DELIGHTFUL THE GRASS SMELLS

Name: 05-3752-4944-0042.wav
Transcript: GOOD NIGHT SIR I HOPE YOU WILL BE COMFORTABLE

Name: 05-3752-4944-0043.wav
Transcript: I'LL TEACH MY PRISONERS TO ATTEMPT SUICIDE

Name: 05-3752-4944-0044.wav
Transcript: THAT'S MACKLEWAIN'S BUSINESS

Name: 05-3752-4944-0045.wav
Transcript: THEN DON'T YOU INTERFERE WITH ME SIR

Name: 05-3752-4944-0046.wav
Transcript: I'VE GIVEN MY ORDERS SIR

Name: 05-3752-4944-0047.wav
Transcript: THEN CAPTAIN BURGESS CRIED NORTH HIS PALE FACE FLUSHING I TELL YOU THE BOY'S BLOOD WILL BE ON YOUR HEAD

Name: 05-3752-4944-0048.wav
Transcript: I AM A MINISTER OF GOD SIR AND I FORBID YOU TO COMMIT THIS CRIME

Name: 05-3752-4944-0049.wav
Transcript: DAMN YOUR IMPERTINENCE SIR BURST OUT BURGESS

Name: 05-3752-4944-0050.wav
Transcript: YOU'RE A DISMISSED OFFICER OF THE GOVERNMENT SIR

Name: 05-3752-4944-0051.wav
Transcript: THIS OF COURSE WAS MERE BRAVADO ON THE PART OF THE COMMANDANT

Name: 05-3752-4944-0052.wav
Transcript: NORTH KNEW WELL THAT HE WOULD NEVER DARE TO ATTEMPT ANY SUCH ACT OF VIOLENCE BUT THE INSULT STUNG HIM LIKE THE CUT OF A WHIP

Name: 05-3752-4944-0053.wav
Transcript: SHOW MISTER NORTH OUT HE SAID AND GO DOWN TO THE BARRACKS AND TELL TROKE THAT KIRKLAND IS TO HAVE A HUNDRED LASHES TO MORROW

Name: 05-3752-4944-0054.wav
Transcript: I'LL SHOW YOU WHO'S MASTER HERE MY GOOD SIR

Name: 05-3752-4944-0055.wav
Transcript: THIS IS MURDEROUS

Name: 05-3752-4944-0056.wav
Transcript: THE GOVERNMENT MAY GO TO AND YOU TOO ROARED BURGESS GET OUT

Name: 05-3752-4944-0057.wav
Transcript: THEY SHALL NOT FLOG THAT BOY HE SAID

Name: 05-3752-4944-0058.wav
Transcript: I'LL REPORT THIS TO THE GOVERNMENT

Name: 05-3752-4944-0059.wav
Transcript: I WISH I HADN'T TAKEN THAT BRANDY HE SAID FOOL THAT I AM

Name: 05-3752-4944-0060.wav
Transcript: OH GOD GIVE ME STRENGTH AID ME HELP ME

Name: 05-3752-4944-0061.wav
Transcript: O LORD LOOK DOWN UPON ME

Name: 05-3752-4944-0062.wav
Transcript: HE MIXED A TEASPOONFUL OF THIS IN A PANNIKIN OF WATER AND DRANK IT

Name: 05-3752-4944-0063.wav
Transcript: IT RELIEVED HIM FOR A WHILE

Name: 05-3752-4944-0064.wav
Transcript: IT WAS AS THOUGH HE HAD REACHED THE CRISIS OF A DISEASE WHICH HAD BEEN FOR DAYS GATHERING FORCE

Name: 05-3752-4944-0065.wav
Transcript: I MUST HAVE A TEASPOONFUL HE SAID TO ALLAY THE CRAVING

Name: 05-3752-4944-0066.wav
Transcript: TWICE HE PAUSED ON THE WAY TO THE SITTING ROOM AND TWICE WAS HE DRIVEN ON BY A POWER STRONGER THAN HIS WILL

Name: 05-3752-4944-0067.wav
Transcript: HE SMELT THE NUTTY AROMA OF THE SPIRIT

Name: 05-3752-4944-0068.wav
Transcript: THAT AT ALL TIMES DEBASING AT THIS PARTICULAR TIME IT WAS INFAMOUS THAT A VICE UNWORTHY OF ANY MAN WAS DOUBLY SINFUL IN A MAN OF EDUCATION AND A MINISTER OF GOD IN VAIN

Transcript: I AM A MINISTER OF GOD SIR AND I FORBID YOU TO COMMIT THIS CRIME

Name: 07-3752-4944-0049.wav
Transcript: DAMN YOUR IMPERTINENCE SIR BURST OUT BURGESS

Name: 07-3752-4944-0050.wav
Transcript: YOU'RE A DISMISSED OFFICER OF THE GOVERNMENT SIR

Name: 07-3752-4944-0051.wav
Transcript: THIS OF COURSE WAS MERE BRAVADO ON THE PART OF THE COMMANDANT

Name: 07-3752-4944-0052.wav
Transcript: NORTH KNEW WELL THAT HE WOULD NEVER DARE TO ATTEMPT ANY SUCH ACT OF VIOLENCE BUT THE INSULT STUNG HIM LIKE THE CUT OF A WHIP

Name: 07-3752-4944-0053.wav
Transcript: SHOW MISTER NORTH OUT HE SAID AND GO DOWN TO THE BARRACKS AND TELL TROKE THAT KIRKLAND IS TO HAVE A HUNDRED LASHES TO MORROW

Name: 07-3752-4944-0054.wav
Transcript: I'LL SHOW YOU WHO'S MASTER HERE MY GOOD SIR

Name: 07-3752-4944-0055.wav
Transcript: THIS IS MURDEROUS

Name: 07-3752-4944-0056.wav
Transcript: THE GOVERNMENT MAY GO TO AND YOU TOO ROARED BURGESS GET OUT

Name: 07-3752-4944-0057.wav
Transcript: THEY SHALL NOT FLOG THAT BOY HE SAID

Name: 07-3752-4944-0058.wav
Transcript: I'LL REPORT THIS TO THE GOVERNMENT

Name: 07-3752-4944-0059.wav
Transcript: I WISH I HADN'T TAKEN THAT BRANDY HE SAID FOOL THAT I AM

Name: 07-3752-4944-0060.wav
Transcript: OH GOD GIVE ME STRENGTH AID ME HELP ME

Name: 07-3752-4944-0061.wav
Transcript: O LORD LOOK DOWN UPON ME

Name: 07-3752-4944-0062.wav
Transcript: HE MIXED A TEASPOONFUL OF THIS IN A PANNIKIN OF WATER AND DRANK IT

Name: 07-3752-4944-0063.wav
Transcript: IT RELIEVED HIM FOR A WHILE

Name: 07-3752-4944-0064.wav
Transcript: IT WAS AS THOUGH HE HAD REACHED THE CRISIS OF A DISEASE WHICH HAD BEEN FOR DAYS GATHERING FORCE

Name: 07-3752-4944-0065.wav
Transcript: I MUST HAVE A TEASPOONFUL HE SAID TO ALLAY THE CRAVING

Name: 07-3752-4944-0066.wav
Transcript: TWICE HE PAUSED ON THE WAY TO THE SITTING ROOM AND TWICE WAS HE DRIVEN ON BY A POWER STRONGER THAN HIS WILL

Name: 07-3752-4944-0067.wav
Transcript: HE SMELT THE NUTTY AROMA OF THE SPIRIT

Name: 07-3752-4944-0068.wav
Transcript: THAT AT ALL TIMES DEBASING AT THIS PARTICULAR TIME IT WAS INFAMOUS THAT A VICE UNWORTHY OF ANY MAN WAS DOUBLY SINFUL IN A MAN OF EDUCATION AND A MINISTER OF GOD IN VAIN

Name: 07-3752-4944-0069.wav
Transcript: IN THE MIDST OF HIS ARGUMENTS HE FOUND HIMSELF AT THE CUPBOARD WITH THE BOTTLE AT HIS LIPS IN AN ATTITUDE THAT WAS AT ONCE LUDICROUS AND HORRIBLE

Name: 08-3752-4944-0000.wav
Transcript: CAPTAIN FRERE SAYS THAT THE SCENERY IS DELIGHTFUL

Name: 08-3752-4944-0001.wav
Transcript: ABANDONED INDEED BY GOD AND MAN ALMOST

Name: 08-3752-4944-0002.wav
Transcript: IN THE VALLEY OF THE SHADOW OF DEATH HE IS WITH US

Name: 08-3752-4944-0003.wav
Transcript: YOU HAVE NOT BEEN LONG IN THE COLONY MISTER MEEKIN

Name: 08-3752-4944-0004.wav
Transcript: IF YOU PLEASE SAID MEEKIN GRAVELY

Name: 08-3752-4944-0005.wav
Transcript: PRAY HELP YOURSELF TO WINE

Name: 08-3752-4944-0006.wav
Transcript: HAVE YOU MANY VISITORS CAPTAIN BURGESS VERY FEW

Name: 08-3752-4944-0007.wav
Transcript: I WAS QUARTERED WITH HIM AT SARAH ISLAND

Name: 08-3752-4944-0008.wav
Transcript: SO HE'S A FRIEND OF YOURS EH

Name: 08-3752-4944-0009.wav
Transcript: I HAD THE PLEASURE OF MEETING HIM IN SOCIETY

Name: 08-3752-4944-0010.wav
Transcript: HE IS JUST MARRIED YOU KNOW IS HE SAID BURGESS

Name: 08-3752-4944-0011.wav
Transcript: THE DEVIL HE IS I HEARD SOMETHING ABOUT IT TOO

Name: 08-3752-4944-0012.wav
Transcript: YES ONE OUGHTN'T TO LEAVE THE COLONY WITHOUT SEEING IT SAYS BURGESS IT'S WORTH SEEING

Name: 08-3752-4944-0013.wav
Transcript: IN FACT THE RINGLEADER JOHN REX GAVE ME HIS CONFESSION AND I SENT IT TO THE BISHOP

Name: 08-3752-4944-0014.wav
Transcript: A GREAT RASCAL PUT IN NORTH

Name: 08-3752-4944-0015.wav
Transcript: WELL NOW SAID MEEKIN WITH ASPERITY I DON'T AGREE WITH YOU

Name: 08-3752-4944-0016.wav
Transcript: HE SEEMS TO ME TO BE TRULY PENITENT FOR HIS OFFENCES A MISGUIDED BUT NOT A HYPOCRITICAL MAN IF MY KNOWLEDGE OF HUMAN NATURE GOES FOR ANYTHING I HOPE HE IS SAID NORTH

Name: 08-3752-4944-0017.wav
Transcript: THERE'S NO FEAR OF HIM SAID BURGESS CHEERILY IF HE GROWS UPROARIOUS WE'LL SOON GIVE HIM A TOUCH OF THE CAT

Name: 08-3752-4944-0018.wav
Transcript: I SUPPOSE SEVERITY IS NECESSARY RETURNED MEEKIN THOUGH TO MY EARS A FLOGGING SOUNDS A LITTLE DISTASTEFUL

Name: 08-3752-4944-0019.wav
Transcript: I HAVE THESE ATTACKS AT TIMES

Name: 08-3752-4944-0020.wav
Transcript: THE REVEREND MEEKIN EYED HIS CLERICAL BROTHER WITH HORROR THE REVEREND MEEKIN WAS NOT ACCUSTOMED TO CLERGYMEN WHO WORE BLACK NECKTIES SMOKED CLAY PIPES CHEWED TOBACCO AND DRANK NEAT BRANDY OUT OF TUMBLERS

Name: 08-3752-4944-0021.wav
Transcript: SO THEY WENT ON TO THE VERANDAH AND LOOKED DOWN UPON THE LIGHTS OF THE PRISON AND LISTENED TO THE SEA LAPPING THE SHORE

Name: 08-3752-4944-0022.wav
Transcript: BY AND BY A SHORT FIGURE SMOKING A CHEROOT CAME UP OUT OF THE DARK AND PROVED TO BE DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN WHO HAD BEEN PREVENTED FROM ATTENDING THE DINNER BY REASON OF AN ACCIDENT TO A CONSTABLE AT NORFOLK BAY WHICH HAD CLAIMED HIS PROFESSIONAL ATTENTION

Name: 08-3752-4944-0023.wav
Transcript: DEAD SAID DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN

Name: 08-3752-4944-0024.wav
Transcript: DELIGHTED TO SEE YOU MISTER MEEKIN

Name: 08-3752-4944-0025.wav
Transcript: BUT MACKLEWAIN WAS TIRED AND WANTED TO GET HOME

Name: 08-3752-4944-0026.wav
Transcript: OUR ROADS LIE TOGETHER DOCTOR

Name: 08-3752-4944-0027.wav
Transcript: BEFORE THE TWO CLERGYMEN HAD GOT HALF WAY DOWN THE STEEP PATH THAT LED FROM THE COMMANDANT'S HOUSE TO THE FLAT ON WHICH THE COTTAGES OF THE DOCTOR AND CHAPLAIN WERE BUILT MACKLEWAIN REJOINED THEM

Name: 08-3752-4944-0028.wav
Transcript: ANOTHER FLOGGING TO MORROW SAID HE GRUMBLINGLY

Name: 08-3752-4944-0029.wav
Transcript: WHOM IS HE GOING TO FLOG NOW

Name: 08-3752-4944-0030.wav
Transcript: YOU DON'T MEAN TO SAY HE'S GOING TO FLOG KIRKLAND

Name: 08-3752-4944-0031.wav
Transcript: PERHAPS YOU'LL HAVE THE GOODNESS TO ALLOW ME TO BE THE BEST JUDGE OF THAT RETURNED MACKLEWAIN DRAWING UP HIS LITTLE BODY TO ITS LEAST INSIGNIFICANT STATURE

Name: 08-3752-4944-0032.wav
Transcript: MISTER MEEKIN EXPRESSED SOME ALARM BUT DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN RE ASSURED HIM

Transcript: WE CAN'T DO ANYTHING WITHOUT EVIDENCE COMPLAIN

Transcript: I SHALL FIND MY PORTMANTEAU IN MY ROOM YOU SAID YES YES

Transcript: HE SLEEPS AT THE BACK AND NORTH HURRIED OFF

Transcript: AN IMPULSIVE GENTLEMAN SAID MEEKIN TO MACKLEWAIN AS THE SOUND OF MISTER NORTH'S FOOTSTEPS DIED AWAY IN THE DISTANCE

Transcript: THE REVEREND MEEKIN EYED HIS CLERICAL BROTHER WITH HORROR THE REVEREND MEEKIN WAS NOT ACCUSTOMED TO CLERGYMEN WHO WORE BLACK NECKTIES SMOKED CLAY PIPES CHEWED TOBACCO AND DRANK NEAT BRANDY OUT OF TUMBLERS

Name: 10-3752-4944-0021.wav
Transcript: SO THEY WENT ON TO THE VERANDAH AND LOOKED DOWN UPON THE LIGHTS OF THE PRISON AND LISTENED TO THE SEA LAPPING THE SHORE

Name: 10-3752-4944-0022.wav
Transcript: BY AND BY A SHORT FIGURE SMOKING A CHEROOT CAME UP OUT OF THE DARK AND PROVED TO BE DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN WHO HAD BEEN PREVENTED FROM ATTENDING THE DINNER BY REASON OF AN ACCIDENT TO A CONSTABLE AT NORFOLK BAY WHICH HAD CLAIMED HIS PROFESSIONAL ATTENTION

Name: 10-3752-4944-0023.wav
Transcript: DEAD SAID DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN

Name: 10-3752-4944-0024.wav
Transcript: DELIGHTED TO SEE YOU MISTER MEEKIN

Name: 10-3752-4944-0025.wav
Transcript: BUT MACKLEWAIN WAS TIRED AND WANTED TO GET HOME

Name: 10-3752-4944-0026.wav
Transcript: OUR ROADS LIE TOGETHER DOCTOR

Name: 10-3752-4944-0027.wav
Transcript: BEFORE THE TWO CLERGYMEN HAD GOT HALF WAY DOWN THE STEEP PATH THAT LED FROM THE COMMANDANT'S HOUSE TO THE FLAT ON WHICH THE COTTAGES OF THE DOCTOR AND CHAPLAIN WERE BUILT MACKLEWAIN REJOINED THEM

Name: 10-3752-4944-0028.wav
Transcript: ANOTHER FLOGGING TO MORROW SAID HE GRUMBLINGLY

Name: 10-3752-4944-0029.wav
Transcript: WHOM IS HE GOING TO FLOG NOW

Name: 10-3752-4944-0030.wav
Transcript: YOU DON'T MEAN TO SAY HE'S GOING TO FLOG KIRKLAND

Name: 10-3752-4944-0031.wav
Transcript: PERHAPS YOU'LL HAVE THE GOODNESS TO ALLOW ME TO BE THE BEST JUDGE OF THAT RETURNED MACKLEWAIN DRAWING UP HIS LITTLE BODY TO ITS LEAST INSIGNIFICANT STATURE

Name: 10-3752-4944-0032.wav
Transcript: MISTER MEEKIN EXPRESSED SOME ALARM BUT DOCTOR MACKLEWAIN RE ASSURED HIM

Name: 10-3752-4944-0033.wav
Transcript: WE CAN'T DO ANYTHING WITHOUT EVIDENCE COMPLAIN

Name: 10-3752-4944-0034.wav
Transcript: I SHALL FIND MY PORTMANTEAU IN MY ROOM YOU SAID YES YES

Name: 10-3752-4944-0035.wav
Transcript: HE SLEEPS AT THE BACK AND NORTH HURRIED OFF

Name: 10-3752-4944-0036.wav
Transcript: AN IMPULSIVE GENTLEMAN SAID MEEKIN TO MACKLEWAIN AS THE SOUND OF MISTER NORTH'S FOOTSTEPS DIED AWAY IN THE DISTANCE

Name: 10-3752-4944-0037.wav
Transcript: MACKLEWAIN SHOOK HIS HEAD SERIOUSLY

Name: 10-3752-4944-0038.wav
Transcript: HE HAS THE STRANGEST FITS AT TIMES

Name: 10-3752-4944-0039.wav
Transcript: UNLESS IT'S A CANCER IN THE STOMACH I DON'T KNOW WHAT IT CAN BE CANCER IN THE STOMACH

Name: 10-3752-4944-0040.wav
Transcript: DOCTOR WE ALL HAVE OUR CROSSES HAVE WE NOT

Name: 10-3752-4944-0041.wav
Transcript: HOW DELIGHTFUL THE GRASS SMELLS

Name: 10-3752-4944-0042.wav
Transcript: GOOD NIGHT SIR I HOPE YOU WILL BE COMFORTABLE

Name: 10-3752-4944-0043.wav
Transcript: I'LL TEACH MY PRISONERS TO ATTEMPT SUICIDE

Name: 10-3752-4944-0044.wav
Transcript: THAT'S MACKLEWAIN'S BUSINESS

Name: 10-3752-4944-0045.wav
Transcript: THEN DON'T YOU INTERFERE WITH ME SIR

Name: 10-3752-4944-0046.wav
Transcript: I'VE GIVEN MY ORDERS SIR

Name: 10-3752-4944-0047.wav
Transcript: THEN CAPTAIN BURGESS CRIED NORTH HIS PALE FACE FLUSHING I TELL YOU THE BOY'S BLOOD WILL BE ON YOUR HEAD

Name: 10-3752-4944-0048.wav
Transcript: I AM A MINISTER OF GOD SIR AND I FORBID YOU TO COMMIT THIS CRIME

Name: 10-3752-4944-0049.wav
Transcript: DAMN YOUR IMPERTINENCE SIR BURST OUT BURGESS

Name: 10-3752-4944-0050.wav
Transcript: YOU'RE A DISMISSED OFFICER OF THE GOVERNMENT SIR

Name: 10-3752-4944-0051.wav
Transcript: THIS OF COURSE WAS MERE BRAVADO ON THE PART OF THE COMMANDANT

Name: 10-3752-4944-0052.wav
Transcript: NORTH KNEW WELL THAT HE WOULD NEVER DARE TO ATTEMPT ANY SUCH ACT OF VIOLENCE BUT THE INSULT STUNG HIM LIKE THE CUT OF A WHIP

Name: 10-3752-4944-0053.wav
Transcript: SHOW MISTER NORTH OUT HE SAID AND GO DOWN TO THE BARRACKS AND TELL TROKE THAT KIRKLAND IS TO HAVE A HUNDRED LASHES TO MORROW

Name: 10-3752-4944-0054.wav
Transcript: I'LL SHOW YOU WHO'S MASTER HERE MY GOOD SIR

Name: 10-3752-4944-0055.wav
Transcript: THIS IS MURDEROUS

Name: 10-3752-4944-0056.wav
Transcript: THE GOVERNMENT MAY GO TO AND YOU TOO ROARED BURGESS GET OUT

Name: 10-3752-4944-0057.wav
Transcript: THEY SHALL NOT FLOG THAT BOY HE SAID

Name: 10-3752-4944-0058.wav
Transcript: I'LL REPORT THIS TO THE GOVERNMENT

Name: 10-3752-4944-0059.wav
Transcript: I WISH I HADN'T TAKEN THAT BRANDY HE SAID FOOL THAT I AM

Name: 10-3752-4944-0060.wav
Transcript: OH GOD GIVE ME STRENGTH AID ME HELP ME

Name: 10-3752-4944-0061.wav
Transcript: O LORD LOOK DOWN UPON ME

Name: 10-3752-4944-0062.wav
Transcript: HE MIXED A TEASPOONFUL OF THIS IN A PANNIKIN OF WATER AND DRANK IT

Name: 10-3752-4944-0063.wav
Transcript: IT RELIEVED HIM FOR A WHILE

Name: 10-3752-4944-0064.wav
Transcript: IT WAS AS THOUGH HE HAD REACHED THE CRISIS OF A DISEASE WHICH HAD BEEN FOR DAYS GATHERING FORCE

Name: 10-3752-4944-0065.wav
Transcript: I MUST HAVE A TEASPOONFUL HE SAID TO ALLAY THE CRAVING

Name: 10-3752-4944-0066.wav
Transcript: TWICE HE PAUSED ON THE WAY TO THE SITTING ROOM AND TWICE WAS HE DRIVEN ON BY A POWER STRONGER THAN HIS WILL

Name: 10-3752-4944-0067.wav
Transcript: HE SMELT THE NUTTY AROMA OF THE SPIRIT

Name: 10-3752-4944-0068.wav
Transcript: THAT AT ALL TIMES DEBASING AT THIS PARTICULAR TIME IT WAS INFAMOUS THAT A VICE UNWORTHY OF ANY MAN WAS DOUBLY SINFUL IN A MAN OF EDUCATION AND A MINISTER OF GOD IN VAIN

Name: 10-3752-4944-0069.wav
Transcript: IN THE MIDST OF HIS ARGUMENTS HE FOUND HIMSELF AT THE CUPBOARD WITH THE BOTTLE AT HIS LIPS IN AN ATTITUDE THAT WAS AT ONCE LUDICROUS AND HORRIBLE

Name: 3752-4944-0000.wav
Transcript: CAPTAIN FRERE SAYS THAT THE SCENERY IS DELIGHTFUL

Name: 3752-4944-0001.wav
Transcript: ABANDONED INDEED BY GOD AND MAN ALMOST

Name: 3752-4944-0002.wav
Transcript: IN THE VALLEY OF THE SHADOW OF DEATH HE IS WITH US

Name: 3752-4944-0003.wav
Transcript: YOU HAVE NOT BEEN LONG IN THE COLONY MISTER MEEKIN

Name: 3752-4944-0004.wav
Transcript: IF YOU PLEASE SAID MEEKIN GRAVELY

Name: 3752-4944-0005.wav
Transcript: PRAY HELP YOURSELF TO WINE

Name: 3752-4944-0006.wav
Transcript: HAVE YOU MANY VISITORS CAPTAIN BURGESS VERY FEW

Name: 3752-4944-0007.wav
Transcript: I WAS QUARTERED WITH HIM AT SARAH ISLAND

Name: 3752-4944-0008.wav
Transcript: SO HE'S A FRIEND OF YOURS EH

Name: 3752-4944-0009.wav
Transcript: I HAD THE PLEASURE OF MEETING HIM IN SOCIETY

Name: 3752-4944-0010.wav
Transcript: HE IS JUST MARRIED YOU KNOW IS HE SAID BURGESS

Name: 3752-4944-0011.wav
Transcript: THE DEVIL HE IS I HEARD SOMETHING ABOUT IT TOO

Name: 3752-4944-0012.wav
Transcript: YES ONE OUGHTN'T TO LEAVE THE COLONY WITHOUT SEEING IT SAYS BURGESS IT'S WORTH SEEING

Name: 3752-4944-0013.wav
Transcript: IN FACT THE RINGLEADER JOHN REX GAVE ME HIS CONFESSION AND I SENT IT TO THE BISHOP

Name: 3752-4944-0014.wav
Transcript: A GREAT RASCAL PUT IN NORTH

Name: 3752-4944-0015.wav
Transcript: WELL NOW SAID MEEKIN WITH ASPERITY I DON'T AGREE WITH YOU

Name: 3752-4944-0016.wav
Transcript: HE SEEMS TO ME TO BE TRULY PENITENT FOR HIS OFFENCES A MISGUIDED BUT NOT A HYPOCRITICAL MAN IF MY KNOWLEDGE OF HUMAN NATURE GOES FOR ANYTHING I HOPE HE IS SAID NORTH

Name: 3752-4944-0017.wav
Transcript: THERE'S NO FEAR OF HIM SAID BURGESS CHEERILY IF HE GROWS UPROARIOUS WE'LL SOON GIVE HIM A TOUCH OF THE CAT

Name: 3752-4944-0018.wav
Transcript: I SUPPOSE SEVERITY IS NECESSARY RETURNED MEEKIN THOUGH TO MY EARS A FLOGGING SOUNDS A LITTLE DISTASTEFUL

Name: 3752-4944-0019.wav
Transcript: I HAVE THESE ATTACKS AT TIMES

Name: 3752-4944-0069.wav
Transcript: IN THE MIDST OF HIS ARGUMENTS HE FOUND HIMSELF AT THE CUPBOARD WITH THE BOTTLE AT HIS LIPS IN AN ATTITUDE THAT WAS AT ONCE LUDICROUS AND HORRIBLE

Name: 01-6241-61943-0000.wav
Transcript: ON THE SECOND OF THE MONTH AT TWO IN THE MORNING OUR PRECIOUS CARGO OF LUGGAGE WAS TAKEN ON BOARD THE GOOD SHIP VALKYRIE

Name: 01-6241-61943-0001.wav
Transcript: BUT IN THE CAUSE OF SCIENCE MEN ARE EXPECTED TO SUFFER

Name: 01-6241-61943-0002.wav
Transcript: WELL AND HAVE WE A FAIR WIND

Name: 01-6241-61943-0003.wav
Transcript: MY UNCLE WAS DELIGHTED FOR MYSELF MOODY AND DISSATISFIED I APPEARED ALMOST TO EXPECT A GLIMPSE OF THE GHOST OF HAMLET

Name: 01-6241-61943-0004.wav
Transcript: BUT NO GHOST OR ANYTHING ELSE APPEARED UPON THE ANCIENT WALLS

Name: 01-6241-61943-0005.wav
Transcript: THE FACT IS THE CASTLE IS MUCH LATER THAN THE TIME OF THE HEROIC PRINCE OF DENMARK

Name: 01-6241-61943-0006.wav
Transcript: NO MISTER HARDWIGG SAID THE CAPTAIN NO FEAR OF THAT

Name: 01-6241-61943-0007.wav
Transcript: AT ALL EVENTS WE SHALL GET THERE SOME DAY

Name: 01-6241-61943-0008.wav
Transcript: ON THE ELEVENTH DAY WE SIGHTED CAPE PORTLAND OVER WHICH TOWERED MOUNT MYRDALS YOKUL WHICH THE WEATHER BEING CLEAR WE MADE OUT VERY READILY

Name: 01-6241-61943-0009.wav
Transcript: THE VALKYRIE KEPT OFF THE COAST STEERING TO THE WESTWARD

Name: 01-6241-61943-0010.wav
Transcript: ON ALL SIDES WERE TO BE SEEN WHOLE SCHOOLS OF WHALES AND SHARKS

Name: 01-6241-61943-0011.wav
Transcript: NEARLY THE WHOLE POPULATION OF THE TOWN WAS ON FOOT TO SEE US LAND

Name: 01-6241-61943-0012.wav
Transcript: THE FACT WAS THAT SCARCELY ANY ONE OF THEM BUT EXPECTED SOME GOODS BY THE PERIODICAL VESSEL

Name: 01-6241-61943-0013.wav
Transcript: THEN WITHOUT FURTHER REMARK HE PUT HIS FINGER TO HIS LIPS FROWNED DARKLY AND DESCENDED INTO THE SMALL BOAT WHICH AWAITED US

Name: 01-6241-61943-0014.wav
Transcript: HE WAS HOWEVER BUT A CIVIL SERVANT A MAGISTRATE THE GOVERNOR OF THE ISLAND BARON TRAMPE

Name: 01-6241-61943-0015.wav
Transcript: THE PROFESSOR KNEW WHOM HE HAD TO DEAL WITH

Name: 01-6241-61943-0016.wav
Transcript: THIS MODEST SCHOLAR SPOKE NO LANGUAGES SAVE ICELANDIC AND LATIN

Name: 01-6241-61943-0017.wav
Transcript: WHEN THEREFORE HE ADDRESSED HIMSELF TO ME IN THE LANGUAGE OF HORACE WE AT ONCE CAME TO UNDERSTAND ONE ANOTHER

Name: 01-6241-61943-0018.wav
Transcript: NOW HARRY SAID MY UNCLE RUBBING HIS HANDS AN GOES WELL THE WORSE DIFFICULTY IS NOW OVER

Name: 01-6241-61943-0019.wav
Transcript: IN THE MEANTIME THERE IS NOT AN HOUR TO LOSE

Name: 01-6241-61943-0020.wav
Transcript: VERY LIKELY I MAY FIND THERE SOME MANUSCRIPTS FROM THE HAND OF SAKNUSSEMM

Name: 01-6241-61943-0021.wav
Transcript: I SHALL BE GLAD TO CONSULT THEM

Name: 01-6241-61943-0022.wav
Transcript: THEY WERE NOW HOWEVER ABSENT ON DUTY

Name: 01-6241-61943-0023.wav
Transcript: THOUGH NOT VERY LARGE IT APPEARED NOT LIKELY TO BE FILLED FOR CENTURIES

Name: 01-6241-61943-0024.wav
Transcript: I HAVE NOT THE SLIGHTEST DOUBT THAT IN HIGH WINDS ITS RED TILES WERE BLOWN OUT TO THE GREAT ANNOYANCE OF THE PASTOR AND CONGREGATION

Name: 01-6241-61943-0025.wav
Transcript: THANKS TO THE HEAT OF THESE RESIDENCES GRASS GROWS ON THE ROOF WHICH GRASS IS CAREFULLY CUT FOR HAY

Name: 01-6241-61943-0026.wav
Transcript: I SAW BUT FEW INHABITANTS DURING MY EXCURSION BUT I MET A CROWD ON THE BEACH DRYING SALTING AND LOADING CODFISH THE PRINCIPAL ARTICLE OF EXPORTATION

Name: 01-6241-61943-0027.wav
Transcript: THE MEN APPEARED ROBUST BUT HEAVY FAIR HAIRED LIKE GERMANS BUT OF PENSIVE MIEN EXILES OF A HIGHER SCALE IN THE LADDER OF HUMANITY THAN THE ESKIMOS BUT I THOUGHT MUCH MORE UNHAPPY SINCE WITH SUPERIOR PERCEPTIONS THEY ARE COMPELLED TO LIVE WITHIN THE LIMITS OF THE POLAR CIRCLE

Name: 03-6241-61943-0001.wav
Transcript: BUT IN THE CAUSE OF SCIENCE MEN ARE EXPECTED TO SUFFER

Name: 03-6241-61943-0002.wav
Transcript: WELL AND HAVE WE A FAIR WIND

Name: 03-6241-61943-0003.wav
Transcript: MY UNCLE WAS DELIGHTED FOR MYSELF MOODY AND DISSATISFIED I APPEARED ALMOST TO EXPECT A GLIMPSE OF THE GHOST OF HAMLET

Name: 03-6241-61943-0004.wav
Transcript: BUT NO GHOST OR ANYTHING ELSE APPEARED UPON THE ANCIENT WALLS

Name: 03-6241-61943-0005.wav
Transcript: THE FACT IS THE CASTLE IS MUCH LATER THAN THE TIME OF THE HEROIC PRINCE OF DENMARK

Name: 03-6241-61943-0006.wav
Transcript: NO MISTER HARDWIGG SAID THE CAPTAIN NO FEAR OF THAT

Name: 03-6241-61943-0007.wav
Transcript: AT ALL EVENTS WE SHALL GET THERE SOME DAY

Name: 03-6241-61943-0008.wav
Transcript: ON THE ELEVENTH DAY WE SIGHTED CAPE PORTLAND OVER WHICH TOWERED MOUNT MYRDALS YOKUL WHICH THE WEATHER BEING CLEAR WE MADE OUT VERY READILY

Name: 03-6241-61943-0009.wav
Transcript: THE VALKYRIE KEPT OFF THE COAST STEERING TO THE WESTWARD

Name: 03-6241-61943-0010.wav
Transcript: ON ALL SIDES WERE TO BE SEEN WHOLE SCHOOLS OF WHALES AND SHARKS

Name: 03-6241-61943-0011.wav
Transcript: NEARLY THE WHOLE POPULATION OF THE TOWN WAS ON FOOT TO SEE US LAND

Name: 03-6241-61943-0012.wav
Transcript: THE FACT WAS THAT SCARCELY ANY ONE OF THEM BUT EXPECTED SOME GOODS BY THE PERIODICAL VESSEL

Name: 03-6241-61943-0013.wav
Transcript: THEN WITHOUT FURTHER REMARK HE PUT HIS FINGER TO HIS LIPS FROWNED DARKLY AND DESCENDED INTO THE SMALL BOAT WHICH AWAITED US

Name: 03-6241-61943-0014.wav
Transcript: HE WAS HOWEVER BUT A CIVIL SERVANT A MAGISTRATE THE GOVERNOR OF THE ISLAND BARON TRAMPE

Name: 03-6241-61943-0015.wav
Transcript: THE PROFESSOR KNEW WHOM HE HAD TO DEAL WITH

Name: 03-6241-61943-0016.wav
Transcript: THIS MODEST SCHOLAR SPOKE NO LANGUAGES SAVE ICELANDIC AND LATIN

Name: 03-6241-61943-0017.wav
Transcript: WHEN THEREFORE HE ADDRESSED HIMSELF TO ME IN THE LANGUAGE OF HORACE WE AT ONCE CAME TO UNDERSTAND ONE ANOTHER

Name: 03-6241-61943-0018.wav
Transcript: NOW HARRY SAID MY UNCLE RUBBING HIS HANDS AN GOES WELL THE WORSE DIFFICULTY IS NOW OVER

Name: 03-6241-61943-0019.wav
Transcript: IN THE MEANTIME THERE IS NOT AN HOUR TO LOSE

Name: 03-6241-61943-0020.wav
Transcript: VERY LIKELY I MAY FIND THERE SOME MANUSCRIPTS FROM THE HAND OF SAKNUSSEMM

Name: 03-6241-61943-0021.wav
Transcript: I SHALL BE GLAD TO CONSULT THEM

Name: 03-6241-61943-0022.wav
Transcript: THEY WERE NOW HOWEVER ABSENT ON DUTY

Name: 03-6241-61943-0023.wav
Transcript: THOUGH NOT VERY LARGE IT APPEARED NOT LIKELY TO BE FILLED FOR CENTURIES

Name: 03-6241-61943-0024.wav
Transcript: I HAVE NOT THE SLIGHTEST DOUBT THAT IN HIGH WINDS ITS RED TILES WERE BLOWN OUT TO THE GREAT ANNOYANCE OF THE PASTOR AND CONGREGATION

Name: 03-6241-61943-0025.wav
Transcript: THANKS TO THE HEAT OF THESE RESIDENCES GRASS GROWS ON THE ROOF WHICH GRASS IS CAREFULLY CUT FOR HAY

Name: 03-6241-61943-0026.wav
Transcript: I SAW BUT FEW INHABITANTS DURING MY EXCURSION BUT I MET A CROWD ON THE BEACH DRYING SALTING AND LOADING CODFISH THE PRINCIPAL ARTICLE OF EXPORTATION

Name: 03-6241-61943-0027.wav
Transcript: THE MEN APPEARED ROBUST BUT HEAVY FAIR HAIRED LIKE GERMANS BUT OF PENSIVE MIEN EXILES OF A HIGHER SCALE IN THE LADDER OF HUMANITY THAN THE ESKIMOS BUT I THOUGHT MUCH MORE UNHAPPY SINCE WITH SUPERIOR PERCEPTIONS THEY ARE COMPELLED TO LIVE WITHIN THE LIMITS OF THE POLAR CIRCLE

Transcript: THANKS TO THE HEAT OF THESE RESIDENCES GRASS GROWS ON THE ROOF WHICH GRASS IS CAREFULLY CUT FOR HAY

Name: 08-6241-61943-0026.wav
Transcript: I SAW BUT FEW INHABITANTS DURING MY EXCURSION BUT I MET A CROWD ON THE BEACH DRYING SALTING AND LOADING CODFISH THE PRINCIPAL ARTICLE OF EXPORTATION

Name: 08-6241-61943-0027.wav
Transcript: THE MEN APPEARED ROBUST BUT HEAVY FAIR HAIRED LIKE GERMANS BUT OF PENSIVE MIEN EXILES OF A HIGHER SCALE IN THE LADDER OF HUMANITY THAN THE ESKIMOS BUT I THOUGHT MUCH MORE UNHAPPY SINCE WITH SUPERIOR PERCEPTIONS THEY ARE COMPELLED TO LIVE WITHIN THE LIMITS OF THE POLAR CIRCLE

Name: 09-6241-61943-0000.wav
Transcript: ON THE SECOND OF THE MONTH AT TWO IN THE MORNING OUR PRECIOUS CARGO OF LUGGAGE WAS TAKEN ON BOARD THE GOOD SHIP VALKYRIE

Name: 09-6241-61943-0001.wav
Transcript: BUT IN THE CAUSE OF SCIENCE MEN ARE EXPECTED TO SUFFER

Name: 09-6241-61943-0002.wav
Transcript: WELL AND HAVE WE A FAIR WIND

Name: 09-6241-61943-0003.wav
Transcript: MY UNCLE WAS DELIGHTED FOR MYSELF MOODY AND DISSATISFIED I APPEARED ALMOST TO EXPECT A GLIMPSE OF THE GHOST OF HAMLET

Name: 09-6241-61943-0004.wav
Transcript: BUT NO GHOST OR ANYTHING ELSE APPEARED UPON THE ANCIENT WALLS

Name: 09-6241-61943-0005.wav
Transcript: THE FACT IS THE CASTLE IS MUCH LATER THAN THE TIME OF THE HEROIC PRINCE OF DENMARK

Name: 09-6241-61943-0006.wav
Transcript: NO MISTER HARDWIGG SAID THE CAPTAIN NO FEAR OF THAT

Name: 09-6241-61943-0007.wav
Transcript: AT ALL EVENTS WE SHALL GET THERE SOME DAY

Name: 09-6241-61943-0008.wav
Transcript: ON THE ELEVENTH DAY WE SIGHTED CAPE PORTLAND OVER WHICH TOWERED MOUNT MYRDALS YOKUL WHICH THE WEATHER BEING CLEAR WE MADE OUT VERY READILY

Name: 09-6241-61943-0009.wav
Transcript: THE VALKYRIE KEPT OFF THE COAST STEERING TO THE WESTWARD

Name: 09-6241-61943-0010.wav
Transcript: ON ALL SIDES WERE TO BE SEEN WHOLE SCHOOLS OF WHALES AND SHARKS

Name: 09-6241-61943-0011.wav
Transcript: NEARLY THE WHOLE POPULATION OF THE TOWN WAS ON FOOT TO SEE US LAND

Name: 09-6241-61943-0012.wav
Transcript: THE FACT WAS THAT SCARCELY ANY ONE OF THEM BUT EXPECTED SOME GOODS BY THE PERIODICAL VESSEL

Name: 09-6241-61943-0013.wav
Transcript: THEN WITHOUT FURTHER REMARK HE PUT HIS FINGER TO HIS LIPS FROWNED DARKLY AND DESCENDED INTO THE SMALL BOAT WHICH AWAITED US

Name: 09-6241-61943-0014.wav
Transcript: HE WAS HOWEVER BUT A CIVIL SERVANT A MAGISTRATE THE GOVERNOR OF THE ISLAND BARON TRAMPE

Name: 09-6241-61943-0015.wav
Transcript: THE PROFESSOR KNEW WHOM HE HAD TO DEAL WITH

Name: 09-6241-61943-0016.wav
Transcript: THIS MODEST SCHOLAR SPOKE NO LANGUAGES SAVE ICELANDIC AND LATIN

Name: 09-6241-61943-0017.wav
Transcript: WHEN THEREFORE HE ADDRESSED HIMSELF TO ME IN THE LANGUAGE OF HORACE WE AT ONCE CAME TO UNDERSTAND ONE ANOTHER

Name: 09-6241-61943-0018.wav
Transcript: NOW HARRY SAID MY UNCLE RUBBING HIS HANDS AN GOES WELL THE WORSE DIFFICULTY IS NOW OVER

Name: 09-6241-61943-0019.wav
Transcript: IN THE MEANTIME THERE IS NOT AN HOUR TO LOSE

Name: 09-6241-61943-0020.wav
Transcript: VERY LIKELY I MAY FIND THERE SOME MANUSCRIPTS FROM THE HAND OF SAKNUSSEMM

Name: 09-6241-61943-0021.wav
Transcript: I SHALL BE GLAD TO CONSULT THEM

Name: 09-6241-61943-0022.wav
Transcript: THEY WERE NOW HOWEVER ABSENT ON DUTY

Name: 09-6241-61943-0023.wav
Transcript: THOUGH NOT VERY LARGE IT APPEARED NOT LIKELY TO BE FILLED FOR CENTURIES

Name: 09-6241-61943-0024.wav
Transcript: I HAVE NOT THE SLIGHTEST DOUBT THAT IN HIGH WINDS ITS RED TILES WERE BLOWN OUT TO THE GREAT ANNOYANCE OF THE PASTOR AND CONGREGATION

Name: 6241-61943-0027.wav
Transcript: THE MEN APPEARED ROBUST BUT HEAVY FAIR HAIRED LIKE GERMANS BUT OF PENSIVE MIEN EXILES OF A HIGHER SCALE IN THE LADDER OF HUMANITY THAN THE ESKIMOS BUT I THOUGHT MUCH MORE UNHAPPY SINCE WITH SUPERIOR PERCEPTIONS THEY ARE COMPELLED TO LIVE WITHIN THE LIMITS OF THE POLAR CIRCLE

Name: 01-6241-61946-0000.wav
Transcript: I BEGAN TO ENJOY THE EXHILARATING DELIGHT OF TRAVELING A LIFE OF DESIRE GRATIFICATION AND LIBERTY

Name: 01-6241-61946-0001.wav
Transcript: HANS OUR EXTRAORDINARY GUIDE WENT FIRST WALKING WITH A STEADY RAPID UNVARYING STEP

Name: 01-6241-61946-0002.wav
Transcript: OUR TWO HORSES WITH THE LUGGAGE FOLLOWED OF THEIR OWN ACCORD WITHOUT REQUIRING WHIP OR SPUR

Name: 01-6241-61946-0003.wav
Transcript: GEOGRAPHERS HAVE DIVIDED IT INTO FOUR PARTS AND WE HAD TO CROSS THE SOUTHWEST QUARTER WHICH IN THE VERNACULAR IS CALLED SUDVESTR FJORDUNGR

Name: 01-6241-61946-0004.wav
Transcript: WE TOOK OUR WAY THROUGH POOR AND SPARSE MEADOWS WHICH MADE A DESPERATE EFFORT EVERY YEAR TO SHOW A LITTLE GREEN

Name: 01-6241-61946-0005.wav
Transcript: THEY VERY RARELY SUCCEED IN A GOOD SHOW OF YELLOW

Name: 01-6241-61946-0006.wav
Transcript: I COULD NOT HELP SMILING TO SEE HIM LOOK SO BIG ON HIS LITTLE HORSE HIS LONG LEGS NOW AND THEN TOUCHING THE GROUND MADE HIM LOOK LIKE A SIX FOOTED CENTAUR

Name: 01-6241-61946-0007.wav
Transcript: SNOW TEMPEST IMPRACTICABLE ROADS ROCKS ICEBERGS NOTHING STOPS HIM

Name: 01-6241-61946-0008.wav
Transcript: WE MAY DO SO WAS MY REPLY BUT WHAT ABOUT OUR WORTHY GUIDE

Name: 01-6241-61946-0009.wav
Transcript: I SHOULD HAVE A VIOLENT ATTACK OF THE CRAMP IF I WERE NOT TO HAVE SOME SORT OF EXERCISE

Name: 01-6241-61946-0010.wav
Transcript: MY ARMS ARE RIGHT BUT MY LEGS ARE GETTING A LITTLE STIFF

Name: 01-6241-61946-0011.wav
Transcript: HERE AND THERE COULD BE SEEN AN ISOLATED FARM SOME SOLITARY BUR OR ICELANDIC HOUSE BUILT OF WOOD EARTH FRAGMENTS OF LAVA LOOKING LIKE BEGGARS ON THE HIGHWAY OF LIFE

Name: 01-6241-61946-0012.wav
Transcript: A FEW STRAY COWS AND SHEEP WERE ONLY SEEN OCCASIONALLY

Name: 01-6241-61946-0013.wav
Transcript: LITTLE DID I EXPECT HOWEVER THE SPECTACLE WHICH AWAITED US WHEN WE REACHED THE PENINSULA OF SNEFFELS WHERE AGGLOMERATIONS OF NATURE'S RUINS FORM A KIND OF TERRIBLE CHAOS

Name: 01-6241-61946-0014.wav
Transcript: IT CONSISTS SIMPLY OF A FEW HOUSES NOT WHAT IN ENGLAND OR GERMANY WE SHOULD CALL A HAMLET

Name: 01-6241-61946-0015.wav
Transcript: I TOOK OCCASION TO CONSULT THE MAP TO SEE WHERE GARDAR WAS TO BE FOUND

Name: 01-6241-61946-0016.wav
Transcript: THESE SACRED EDIFICES ARE HOWEVER VERY MUCH LIKE THESE PEOPLE WHO DO WITHOUT WATCHES AND NEVER MISS THEM

Name: 01-6241-61946-0017.wav
Transcript: TO RIDE OVER SALT WATER UPON THE BACK OF A LITTLE HORSE SEEMED TO ME ABSURD

Name: 01-6241-61946-0018.wav
Transcript: IN ANY CASE I SHALL TRUST RATHER TO MY OWN INTELLIGENCE THAN THEIRS

Name: 01-6241-61946-0019.wav
Transcript: BUT MY UNCLE WAS IN NO HUMOR TO WAIT

Name: 01-6241-61946-0020.wav
Transcript: AT LENGTH THE STURDY LITTLE PONY SPREADING OUT HIS LEGS IN A STIFF AND LUDICROUS ATTITUDE GOT FROM UNDER THE PROFESSOR'S LEGS AND LEFT HIM STANDING WITH BOTH FEET ON A SEPARATE STONE LIKE THE COLOSSUS OF RHODES

Name: 01-6241-61946-0021.wav
Transcript: HE SAYS TIDE REPLIED MY UNCLE TRANSLATING THE DANISH WORD FOR MY INFORMATION

Name: 01-6241-61946-0022.wav
Transcript: I THOROUGHLY UNDERSTOOD AND APPRECIATED THE NECESSITY FOR WAITING BEFORE CROSSING THE FJORD FOR THAT MOMENT WHEN THE SEA AT ITS HIGHEST POINT IS IN A STATE OF SLACK WATER

Name: 01-6241-61946-0023.wav
Transcript: ACCUSTOMED AS I HAD BEEN TO THE STEAM FERRY BOATS OF THE ELBE I FOUND THE LONG OARS OF THE BOATMEN BUT SORRY MEANS OF LOCOMOTION

Transcript: I THOROUGHLY UNDERSTOOD AND APPRECIATED THE NECESSITY FOR WAITING BEFORE CROSSING THE FJORD FOR THAT MOMENT WHEN THE SEA AT ITS HIGHEST POINT IS IN A STATE OF SLACK WATER

Name: 09-6241-61946-0023.wav
Transcript: ACCUSTOMED AS I HAD BEEN TO THE STEAM FERRY BOATS OF THE ELBE I FOUND THE LONG OARS OF THE BOATMEN BUT SORRY MEANS OF LOCOMOTION

Name: 10-6241-61946-0000.wav
Transcript: I BEGAN TO ENJOY THE EXHILARATING DELIGHT OF TRAVELING A LIFE OF DESIRE GRATIFICATION AND LIBERTY

Name: 10-6241-61946-0001.wav
Transcript: HANS OUR EXTRAORDINARY GUIDE WENT FIRST WALKING WITH A STEADY RAPID UNVARYING STEP

Name: 10-6241-61946-0002.wav
Transcript: OUR TWO HORSES WITH THE LUGGAGE FOLLOWED OF THEIR OWN ACCORD WITHOUT REQUIRING WHIP OR SPUR

Name: 10-6241-61946-0003.wav
Transcript: GEOGRAPHERS HAVE DIVIDED IT INTO FOUR PARTS AND WE HAD TO CROSS THE SOUTHWEST QUARTER WHICH IN THE VERNACULAR IS CALLED SUDVESTR FJORDUNGR

Name: 10-6241-61946-0004.wav
Transcript: WE TOOK OUR WAY THROUGH POOR AND SPARSE MEADOWS WHICH MADE A DESPERATE EFFORT EVERY YEAR TO SHOW A LITTLE GREEN

Name: 10-6241-61946-0005.wav
Transcript: THEY VERY RARELY SUCCEED IN A GOOD SHOW OF YELLOW

Name: 10-6241-61946-0006.wav
Transcript: I COULD NOT HELP SMILING TO SEE HIM LOOK SO BIG ON HIS LITTLE HORSE HIS LONG LEGS NOW AND THEN TOUCHING THE GROUND MADE HIM LOOK LIKE A SIX FOOTED CENTAUR

Name: 10-6241-61946-0007.wav
Transcript: SNOW TEMPEST IMPRACTICABLE ROADS ROCKS ICEBERGS NOTHING STOPS HIM

Name: 10-6241-61946-0008.wav
Transcript: WE MAY DO SO WAS MY REPLY BUT WHAT ABOUT OUR WORTHY GUIDE

Name: 10-6241-61946-0009.wav
Transcript: I SHOULD HAVE A VIOLENT ATTACK OF THE CRAMP IF I WERE NOT TO HAVE SOME SORT OF EXERCISE

Name: 10-6241-61946-0010.wav
Transcript: MY ARMS ARE RIGHT BUT MY LEGS ARE GETTING A LITTLE STIFF

Name: 10-6241-61946-0011.wav
Transcript: HERE AND THERE COULD BE SEEN AN ISOLATED FARM SOME SOLITARY BUR OR ICELANDIC HOUSE BUILT OF WOOD EARTH FRAGMENTS OF LAVA LOOKING LIKE BEGGARS ON THE HIGHWAY OF LIFE

Name: 10-6241-61946-0012.wav
Transcript: A FEW STRAY COWS AND SHEEP WERE ONLY SEEN OCCASIONALLY

Name: 10-6241-61946-0013.wav
Transcript: LITTLE DID I EXPECT HOWEVER THE SPECTACLE WHICH AWAITED US WHEN WE REACHED THE PENINSULA OF SNEFFELS WHERE AGGLOMERATIONS OF NATURE'S RUINS FORM A KIND OF TERRIBLE CHAOS

Name: 10-6241-61946-0014.wav
Transcript: IT CONSISTS SIMPLY OF A FEW HOUSES NOT WHAT IN ENGLAND OR GERMANY WE SHOULD CALL A HAMLET

Name: 10-6241-61946-0015.wav
Transcript: I TOOK OCCASION TO CONSULT THE MAP TO SEE WHERE GARDAR WAS TO BE FOUND

Name: 10-6241-61946-0016.wav
Transcript: THESE SACRED EDIFICES ARE HOWEVER VERY MUCH LIKE THESE PEOPLE WHO DO WITHOUT WATCHES AND NEVER MISS THEM

Name: 10-6241-61946-0017.wav
Transcript: TO RIDE OVER SALT WATER UPON THE BACK OF A LITTLE HORSE SEEMED TO ME ABSURD

Name: 10-6241-61946-0018.wav
Transcript: IN ANY CASE I SHALL TRUST RATHER TO MY OWN INTELLIGENCE THAN THEIRS

Name: 10-6241-61946-0019.wav
Transcript: BUT MY UNCLE WAS IN NO HUMOR TO WAIT

Name: 10-6241-61946-0020.wav
Transcript: AT LENGTH THE STURDY LITTLE PONY SPREADING OUT HIS LEGS IN A STIFF AND LUDICROUS ATTITUDE GOT FROM UNDER THE PROFESSOR'S LEGS AND LEFT HIM STANDING WITH BOTH FEET ON A SEPARATE STONE LIKE THE COLOSSUS OF RHODES

Name: 6241-61946-0023.wav
Transcript: ACCUSTOMED AS I HAD BEEN TO THE STEAM FERRY BOATS OF THE ELBE I FOUND THE LONG OARS OF THE BOATMEN BUT SORRY MEANS OF LOCOMOTION

Name: 01-6241-66616-0000.wav
Transcript: BUT THIS POWER OF DISCERNMENT WAS DENIED THEM AND ONLY IN AFTER YEARS WITH THE LOVED ONES OF THEIR OWN FIRESIDES CLOSE ABOUT THEM WAS THE WHOLE PICTURE REVEALED

Name: 01-6241-66616-0001.wav
Transcript: ONE DARK NIGHT AT THE HEAD OF A SCORE OF HIS TRIBE HE FELL UPON WABIGOON'S CAMP HIS OBJECT BEING THE ABDUCTION OF THE PRINCESS

Name: 01-6241-66616-0002.wav
Transcript: WHILE THE ATTACK WAS SUCCESSFUL IN A WAY ITS MAIN PURPOSE FAILED

Name: 01-6241-66616-0003.wav
Transcript: A COUNTER ATTACK WAS MADE UPON WOONGA AND HE WAS DRIVEN DEEP INTO THE WILDERNESS WITH GREAT LOSS

Name: 01-6241-66616-0004.wav
Transcript: THREE DAYS LATER MINNETAKI BECAME NEWSOME'S WIFE AT THE HUDSON BAY POST

Name: 01-6241-66616-0005.wav
Transcript: FROM THAT HOUR DATED ONE OF THE MOST SANGUINARY FEUDS IN THE HISTORY OF THE GREAT TRADING COMPANY A FEUD WHICH AS WE SHALL SEE WAS DESTINED TO LIVE EVEN UNTO THE SECOND GENERATION

Name: 01-6241-66616-0006.wav
Transcript: MEANWHILE TWO CHILDREN CAME TO BLESS THE HAPPY UNION OF NEWSOME AND HIS LOVELY INDIAN WIFE

Name: 01-6241-66616-0007.wav
Transcript: THE OTHER WAS A GIRL THREE YEARS YOUNGER AND NEWSOME INSISTED THAT SHE BE CALLED MINNETAKI

Name: 01-6241-66616-0008.wav
Transcript: CURIOUSLY ENOUGH THE BLOOD OF WABI RAN ALMOST PURE TO HIS INDIAN FOREFATHERS WHILE MINNETAKI AS SHE BECAME OLDER DEVELOPED LESS OF THE WILD BEAUTY OF HER MOTHER AND MORE OF THE SOFTER LOVELINESS OF THE WHITE RACE HER WEALTH OF SOFT JET BLACK HAIR AND HER GREAT DARK EYES CONTRASTING WITH THE LIGHTER SKIN OF HER FATHER'S BLOOD

Name: 01-6241-66616-0009.wav
Transcript: WABI ON THE OTHER HAND WAS AN INDIAN IN APPEARANCE FROM HIS MOCCASINS TO THE CROWN OF HIS HEAD SWARTHY SINEWY AS AGILE AS A LYNX AND WITH EVERY INSTINCT IN HIM CRYING FOR THE LIFE OF THE WILD

Name: 01-6241-66616-0010.wav
Transcript: ONE OF NEWSOME'S CHIEF PLEASURES IN LIFE HAD BEEN THE EDUCATING OF HIS WOODLAND BRIDE AND IT WAS THE AMBITION OF BOTH THAT THE LITTLE MINNETAKI AND HER BROTHER BE REARED IN THE WAYS OF WHITE CHILDREN

Name: 01-6241-66616-0011.wav
Transcript: CONSEQUENTLY BOTH MOTHER AND FATHER BEGAN THEIR EDUCATION AT THE POST THEY WERE SENT TO THE FACTOR'S SCHOOL AND TWO WINTERS WERE PASSED IN PORT ARTHUR THAT THEY MIGHT HAVE THE ADVANTAGE OF THOROUGHLY EQUIPPED SCHOOLS

Name: 01-6241-66616-0012.wav
Transcript: THE CHILDREN PROVED THEMSELVES UNUSUALLY BRIGHT PUPILS AND BY THE TIME WABI WAS SIXTEEN AND MINNETAKI TWELVE ONE WOULD NOT HAVE KNOWN FROM THEIR MANNER OF SPEECH THAT INDIAN BLOOD RAN IN THEIR VEINS

Name: 01-6241-66616-0013.wav
Transcript: IT WAS AT ABOUT THIS TIME IN THEIR LIVES THAT THE WOONGAS BECAME ESPECIALLY DARING IN THEIR DEPREDATIONS

Name: 01-6241-66616-0014.wav
Transcript: AT LAST SO DARING DID HE BECOME THAT THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT PLACED A PRICE UPON HIS HEAD AND UPON THOSE OF A NUMBER OF HIS MOST NOTORIOUS FOLLOWERS

Name: 01-6241-66616-0015.wav
Transcript: BUT EACH WEEK ADDED TO HIS LONELINESS AND HIS LONGINGS FOR MINNETAKI AND HIS FORESTS

Name: 01-6241-66616-0016.wav
Transcript: NECESSITY HAD BECOME HIS GRIM MASTER AND THE FOLLOWING WEEK HE WAS GOING TO WORK

Name: 01-6241-66616-0017.wav
Transcript: A THOUSAND PLANS WERE MADE A THOUSAND ADVENTURES PICTURED AND THE MOTHER WOULD SMILE AND LAUGH AND PLAN WITH THEM

Name: 01-6241-66616-0018.wav
Transcript: BUT IN TIME THE END OF IT ALL CAME AND WABI WENT BACK TO THE PRINCESS MOTHER TO MINNETAKI AND TO HIS FORESTS

Name: 01-6241-66616-0019.wav
Transcript: THERE WERE TEARS IN THE BOYS EYES WHEN THEY PARTED AND THE MOTHER CRIED FOR THE INDIAN BOY WHO WAS RETURNING TO HIS PEOPLE

Name: 01-6241-66616-0020.wav
Transcript: SPRING CAME AND PASSED AND THEN SUMMER

Name: 01-6241-66616-0021.wav
Transcript: WE SHALL MAKE MORE MONEY UP HERE THIS WINTER THAN YOU COULD EARN IN DETROIT IN THREE YEARS

Name: 01-6241-66616-0022.wav
Transcript: WE WILL HUNT WOLVES THE COUNTRY IS ALIVE WITH THEM AND THE GOVERNMENT GIVES A BOUNTY OF FIFTEEN DOLLARS FOR EVERY SCALP TAKEN

Name: 01-6241-66616-0023.wav
Transcript: THREE WEEKS LATER CAME WABIGOON'S REPLY

Name: 01-6241-66616-0024.wav
Transcript: ON THE TENTH OF OCTOBER HE WOULD MEET ROD AT SPRUCEWOOD ON THE BLACK STURGEON RIVER

Name: 01-6241-66616-0025.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS LITTLE TIME TO LOSE IN MAKING PREPARATIONS AND THE FOURTH DAY FOLLOWING THE RECEIPT OF WABI'S LETTER FOUND ROD AND HIS MOTHER WAITING FOR THE TRAIN WHICH WAS TO WHIRL THE BOY INTO HIS NEW LIFE

Name: 02-6241-66616-0000.wav
Transcript: BUT THIS POWER OF DISCERNMENT WAS DENIED THEM AND ONLY IN AFTER YEARS WITH THE LOVED ONES OF THEIR OWN FIRESIDES CLOSE ABOUT THEM WAS THE WHOLE PICTURE REVEALED

Name: 04-6241-66616-0006.wav
Transcript: MEANWHILE TWO CHILDREN CAME TO BLESS THE HAPPY UNION OF NEWSOME AND HIS LOVELY INDIAN WIFE

Name: 04-6241-66616-0007.wav
Transcript: THE OTHER WAS A GIRL THREE YEARS YOUNGER AND NEWSOME INSISTED THAT SHE BE CALLED MINNETAKI

Name: 04-6241-66616-0008.wav
Transcript: CURIOUSLY ENOUGH THE BLOOD OF WABI RAN ALMOST PURE TO HIS INDIAN FOREFATHERS WHILE MINNETAKI AS SHE BECAME OLDER DEVELOPED LESS OF THE WILD BEAUTY OF HER MOTHER AND MORE OF THE SOFTER LOVELINESS OF THE WHITE RACE HER WEALTH OF SOFT JET BLACK HAIR AND HER GREAT DARK EYES CONTRASTING WITH THE LIGHTER SKIN OF HER FATHER'S BLOOD

Name: 04-6241-66616-0009.wav
Transcript: WABI ON THE OTHER HAND WAS AN INDIAN IN APPEARANCE FROM HIS MOCCASINS TO THE CROWN OF HIS HEAD SWARTHY SINEWY AS AGILE AS A LYNX AND WITH EVERY INSTINCT IN HIM CRYING FOR THE LIFE OF THE WILD

Name: 04-6241-66616-0010.wav
Transcript: ONE OF NEWSOME'S CHIEF PLEASURES IN LIFE HAD BEEN THE EDUCATING OF HIS WOODLAND BRIDE AND IT WAS THE AMBITION OF BOTH THAT THE LITTLE MINNETAKI AND HER BROTHER BE REARED IN THE WAYS OF WHITE CHILDREN

Name: 04-6241-66616-0011.wav
Transcript: CONSEQUENTLY BOTH MOTHER AND FATHER BEGAN THEIR EDUCATION AT THE POST THEY WERE SENT TO THE FACTOR'S SCHOOL AND TWO WINTERS WERE PASSED IN PORT ARTHUR THAT THEY MIGHT HAVE THE ADVANTAGE OF THOROUGHLY EQUIPPED SCHOOLS

Name: 04-6241-66616-0012.wav
Transcript: THE CHILDREN PROVED THEMSELVES UNUSUALLY BRIGHT PUPILS AND BY THE TIME WABI WAS SIXTEEN AND MINNETAKI TWELVE ONE WOULD NOT HAVE KNOWN FROM THEIR MANNER OF SPEECH THAT INDIAN BLOOD RAN IN THEIR VEINS

Name: 04-6241-66616-0013.wav
Transcript: IT WAS AT ABOUT THIS TIME IN THEIR LIVES THAT THE WOONGAS BECAME ESPECIALLY DARING IN THEIR DEPREDATIONS

Name: 04-6241-66616-0014.wav
Transcript: AT LAST SO DARING DID HE BECOME THAT THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT PLACED A PRICE UPON HIS HEAD AND UPON THOSE OF A NUMBER OF HIS MOST NOTORIOUS FOLLOWERS

Name: 04-6241-66616-0015.wav
Transcript: BUT EACH WEEK ADDED TO HIS LONELINESS AND HIS LONGINGS FOR MINNETAKI AND HIS FORESTS

Name: 04-6241-66616-0016.wav
Transcript: NECESSITY HAD BECOME HIS GRIM MASTER AND THE FOLLOWING WEEK HE WAS GOING TO WORK

Name: 04-6241-66616-0017.wav
Transcript: A THOUSAND PLANS WERE MADE A THOUSAND ADVENTURES PICTURED AND THE MOTHER WOULD SMILE AND LAUGH AND PLAN WITH THEM

Name: 04-6241-66616-0018.wav
Transcript: BUT IN TIME THE END OF IT ALL CAME AND WABI WENT BACK TO THE PRINCESS MOTHER TO MINNETAKI AND TO HIS FORESTS

Name: 04-6241-66616-0019.wav
Transcript: THERE WERE TEARS IN THE BOYS EYES WHEN THEY PARTED AND THE MOTHER CRIED FOR THE INDIAN BOY WHO WAS RETURNING TO HIS PEOPLE

Name: 04-6241-66616-0020.wav
Transcript: SPRING CAME AND PASSED AND THEN SUMMER

Name: 04-6241-66616-0021.wav
Transcript: WE SHALL MAKE MORE MONEY UP HERE THIS WINTER THAN YOU COULD EARN IN DETROIT IN THREE YEARS

Name: 04-6241-66616-0022.wav
Transcript: WE WILL HUNT WOLVES THE COUNTRY IS ALIVE WITH THEM AND THE GOVERNMENT GIVES A BOUNTY OF FIFTEEN DOLLARS FOR EVERY SCALP TAKEN

Name: 04-6241-66616-0023.wav
Transcript: THREE WEEKS LATER CAME WABIGOON'S REPLY

Name: 04-6241-66616-0024.wav
Transcript: ON THE TENTH OF OCTOBER HE WOULD MEET ROD AT SPRUCEWOOD ON THE BLACK STURGEON RIVER

Name: 04-6241-66616-0025.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS LITTLE TIME TO LOSE IN MAKING PREPARATIONS AND THE FOURTH DAY FOLLOWING THE RECEIPT OF WABI'S LETTER FOUND ROD AND HIS MOTHER WAITING FOR THE TRAIN WHICH WAS TO WHIRL THE BOY INTO HIS NEW LIFE

Name: 05-6241-66616-0000.wav
Transcript: BUT THIS POWER OF DISCERNMENT WAS DENIED THEM AND ONLY IN AFTER YEARS WITH THE LOVED ONES OF THEIR OWN FIRESIDES CLOSE ABOUT THEM WAS THE WHOLE PICTURE REVEALED

Name: 05-6241-66616-0001.wav
Transcript: ONE DARK NIGHT AT THE HEAD OF A SCORE OF HIS TRIBE HE FELL UPON WABIGOON'S CAMP HIS OBJECT BEING THE ABDUCTION OF THE PRINCESS

Name: 05-6241-66616-0002.wav
Transcript: WHILE THE ATTACK WAS SUCCESSFUL IN A WAY ITS MAIN PURPOSE FAILED

Name: 05-6241-66616-0003.wav
Transcript: A COUNTER ATTACK WAS MADE UPON WOONGA AND HE WAS DRIVEN DEEP INTO THE WILDERNESS WITH GREAT LOSS

Name: 05-6241-66616-0004.wav
Transcript: THREE DAYS LATER MINNETAKI BECAME NEWSOME'S WIFE AT THE HUDSON BAY POST

Transcript: BUT THIS POWER OF DISCERNMENT WAS DENIED THEM AND ONLY IN AFTER YEARS WITH THE LOVED ONES OF THEIR OWN FIRESIDES CLOSE ABOUT THEM WAS THE WHOLE PICTURE REVEALED

Name: 09-6241-66616-0001.wav
Transcript: ONE DARK NIGHT AT THE HEAD OF A SCORE OF HIS TRIBE HE FELL UPON WABIGOON'S CAMP HIS OBJECT BEING THE ABDUCTION OF THE PRINCESS

Name: 09-6241-66616-0002.wav
Transcript: WHILE THE ATTACK WAS SUCCESSFUL IN A WAY ITS MAIN PURPOSE FAILED

Name: 09-6241-66616-0003.wav
Transcript: A COUNTER ATTACK WAS MADE UPON WOONGA AND HE WAS DRIVEN DEEP INTO THE WILDERNESS WITH GREAT LOSS

Name: 09-6241-66616-0004.wav
Transcript: THREE DAYS LATER MINNETAKI BECAME NEWSOME'S WIFE AT THE HUDSON BAY POST

Name: 09-6241-66616-0005.wav
Transcript: FROM THAT HOUR DATED ONE OF THE MOST SANGUINARY FEUDS IN THE HISTORY OF THE GREAT TRADING COMPANY A FEUD WHICH AS WE SHALL SEE WAS DESTINED TO LIVE EVEN UNTO THE SECOND GENERATION

Name: 09-6241-66616-0006.wav
Transcript: MEANWHILE TWO CHILDREN CAME TO BLESS THE HAPPY UNION OF NEWSOME AND HIS LOVELY INDIAN WIFE

Name: 09-6241-66616-0007.wav
Transcript: THE OTHER WAS A GIRL THREE YEARS YOUNGER AND NEWSOME INSISTED THAT SHE BE CALLED MINNETAKI

Name: 09-6241-66616-0008.wav
Transcript: CURIOUSLY ENOUGH THE BLOOD OF WABI RAN ALMOST PURE TO HIS INDIAN FOREFATHERS WHILE MINNETAKI AS SHE BECAME OLDER DEVELOPED LESS OF THE WILD BEAUTY OF HER MOTHER AND MORE OF THE SOFTER LOVELINESS OF THE WHITE RACE HER WEALTH OF SOFT JET BLACK HAIR AND HER GREAT DARK EYES CONTRASTING WITH THE LIGHTER SKIN OF HER FATHER'S BLOOD

Name: 09-6241-66616-0009.wav
Transcript: WABI ON THE OTHER HAND WAS AN INDIAN IN APPEARANCE FROM HIS MOCCASINS TO THE CROWN OF HIS HEAD SWARTHY SINEWY AS AGILE AS A LYNX AND WITH EVERY INSTINCT IN HIM CRYING FOR THE LIFE OF THE WILD

Name: 09-6241-66616-0010.wav
Transcript: ONE OF NEWSOME'S CHIEF PLEASURES IN LIFE HAD BEEN THE EDUCATING OF HIS WOODLAND BRIDE AND IT WAS THE AMBITION OF BOTH THAT THE LITTLE MINNETAKI AND HER BROTHER BE REARED IN THE WAYS OF WHITE CHILDREN

Name: 09-6241-66616-0011.wav
Transcript: CONSEQUENTLY BOTH MOTHER AND FATHER BEGAN THEIR EDUCATION AT THE POST THEY WERE SENT TO THE FACTOR'S SCHOOL AND TWO WINTERS WERE PASSED IN PORT ARTHUR THAT THEY MIGHT HAVE THE ADVANTAGE OF THOROUGHLY EQUIPPED SCHOOLS

Name: 09-6241-66616-0012.wav
Transcript: THE CHILDREN PROVED THEMSELVES UNUSUALLY BRIGHT PUPILS AND BY THE TIME WABI WAS SIXTEEN AND MINNETAKI TWELVE ONE WOULD NOT HAVE KNOWN FROM THEIR MANNER OF SPEECH THAT INDIAN BLOOD RAN IN THEIR VEINS

Name: 09-6241-66616-0013.wav
Transcript: IT WAS AT ABOUT THIS TIME IN THEIR LIVES THAT THE WOONGAS BECAME ESPECIALLY DARING IN THEIR DEPREDATIONS

Name: 09-6241-66616-0014.wav
Transcript: AT LAST SO DARING DID HE BECOME THAT THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT PLACED A PRICE UPON HIS HEAD AND UPON THOSE OF A NUMBER OF HIS MOST NOTORIOUS FOLLOWERS

Name: 09-6241-66616-0015.wav
Transcript: BUT EACH WEEK ADDED TO HIS LONELINESS AND HIS LONGINGS FOR MINNETAKI AND HIS FORESTS

Name: 09-6241-66616-0016.wav
Transcript: NECESSITY HAD BECOME HIS GRIM MASTER AND THE FOLLOWING WEEK HE WAS GOING TO WORK

Name: 09-6241-66616-0017.wav
Transcript: A THOUSAND PLANS WERE MADE A THOUSAND ADVENTURES PICTURED AND THE MOTHER WOULD SMILE AND LAUGH AND PLAN WITH THEM

Name: 09-6241-66616-0018.wav
Transcript: BUT IN TIME THE END OF IT ALL CAME AND WABI WENT BACK TO THE PRINCESS MOTHER TO MINNETAKI AND TO HIS FORESTS

Name: 09-6241-66616-0019.wav
Transcript: THERE WERE TEARS IN THE BOYS EYES WHEN THEY PARTED AND THE MOTHER CRIED FOR THE INDIAN BOY WHO WAS RETURNING TO HIS PEOPLE

Name: 09-6241-66616-0020.wav
Transcript: SPRING CAME AND PASSED AND THEN SUMMER

Name: 09-6241-66616-0021.wav
Transcript: WE SHALL MAKE MORE MONEY UP HERE THIS WINTER THAN YOU COULD EARN IN DETROIT IN THREE YEARS

Name: 09-6241-66616-0022.wav
Transcript: WE WILL HUNT WOLVES THE COUNTRY IS ALIVE WITH THEM AND THE GOVERNMENT GIVES A BOUNTY OF FIFTEEN DOLLARS FOR EVERY SCALP TAKEN

Name: 09-6241-66616-0023.wav
Transcript: THREE WEEKS LATER CAME WABIGOON'S REPLY

Name: 09-6241-66616-0024.wav
Transcript: ON THE TENTH OF OCTOBER HE WOULD MEET ROD AT SPRUCEWOOD ON THE BLACK STURGEON RIVER

Name: 09-6241-66616-0025.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS LITTLE TIME TO LOSE IN MAKING PREPARATIONS AND THE FOURTH DAY FOLLOWING THE RECEIPT OF WABI'S LETTER FOUND ROD AND HIS MOTHER WAITING FOR THE TRAIN WHICH WAS TO WHIRL THE BOY INTO HIS NEW LIFE

Name: 6241-66616-0025.wav
Transcript: THERE WAS LITTLE TIME TO LOSE IN MAKING PREPARATIONS AND THE FOURTH DAY FOLLOWING THE RECEIPT OF WABI'S LETTER FOUND ROD AND HIS MOTHER WAITING FOR THE TRAIN WHICH WAS TO WHIRL THE BOY INTO HIS NEW LIFE

Name: 01-3536-8226-0000.wav
Transcript: IN THE LAST COMMUNICATION WHICH HE HAD RECEIVED FROM LADY MILBOROUGH SHE HAD SCOLDED HIM IN TERMS THAT WERE FOR HER SEVERE BECAUSE HE HAD NOT RETURNED TO HIS WIFE AND TAKEN HER OFF WITH HIM TO NAPLES

Name: 01-3536-8226-0001.wav
Transcript: AND NOW IT HAD COME TO PASS THAT HIS SOLE REMAINING ALLY MISTER SAMUEL BOZZLE THE EX POLICEMAN WAS BECOMING WEARY OF HIS SERVICE

Name: 01-3536-8226-0002.wav
Transcript: AT LAST HE SENT WORD TO SAY THAT HE HIMSELF WOULD BE IN ENGLAND BEFORE THE END OF MARCH AND WOULD SEE THAT THE MAJESTY OF THE LAW SHOULD BE VINDICATED IN HIS FAVOUR

Name: 01-3536-8226-0003.wav
Transcript: IN MAKING THIS HE HAD EXPECTED NO SUCCESS THOUGH FROM THE ENERGETIC NATURE OF HIS DISPOSITION HE HAD MADE THE ATTEMPT WITH SOME ZEAL

Name: 01-3536-8226-0004.wav
Transcript: MISSUS BOZZLE WAS DISPOSED TO THINK THAT LADIES OF QUALITY AMONG WHOM MADAME T WAS ENTITLED IN HER ESTIMATION TO TAKE RANK WERE SELDOM BETTER THAN THEY OUGHT TO BE AND SHE WAS QUITE WILLING THAT HER HUSBAND SHOULD EARN HIS BREAD BY WATCHING THE LADY OR THE LADY'S LOVER

Name: 01-3536-8226-0005.wav
Transcript: AND HAD THE CASE BEEN BROUGHT BEFORE THE JUDGE ORDINARY BY MEANS OF HER HUSBAND'S EXERTIONS SHE WOULD HAVE TAKEN PLEASURE IN READING EVERY WORD OF THE EVIDENCE EVEN THOUGH HER HUSBAND SHOULD HAVE BEEN EVER SO ROUGHLY HANDLED BY THE LAWYERS

Name: 01-3536-8226-0006.wav
Transcript: A DISTINCT PROMISE OF A HUNDRED POUNDS WAS MADE TO HIM IF HE WOULD HAVE THE CHILD READY TO HAND OVER TO TREVELYAN ON TREVELYAN'S ARRIVAL IN ENGLAND

Name: 01-3536-8226-0007.wav
Transcript: OF COURSE IT AIN'T SAID MISSUS BOZZLE

Name: 01-3536-8226-0008.wav
Transcript: THE PATERNAL PARENT HAS A RIGHT TO HIS INFANTS NO DOUBT THAT WAS BOZZLE'S LAW

Name: 01-3536-8226-0009.wav
Transcript: HE CAN'T SUCKLE EM CAN HE

Name: 01-3536-8226-0010.wav
Transcript: WHEN A MARRIED WOMAN HAS FOLLOWERS AND THE HUSBAND DON'T GO THE WRONG SIDE OF THE POST TOO OR IT AIN'T PROVED AGAIN HIM THAT HE DO THEY'LL NEVER LET HER HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH THE CHILDREN

Name: 01-3536-8226-0011.wav
Transcript: I'LL TELL YOU WHAT IT IS B EXCLAIMED MISSUS BOZZLE IT'S MY BELIEF AS HE AIN'T QUITE RIGHT UP HERE AND MISSUS BOZZLE TOUCHED HER FOREHEAD

Name: 01-3536-8226-0012.wav
Transcript: DRAT EM ALL WHAT IS IT THEY WANTS THEY DON'T KNOW WHAT THEY WANTS

Name: 01-3536-8226-0013.wav
Transcript: IT'S THAT AS MAKES EM I WON'T SAY WHAT

Name: 01-3536-8226-0014.wav
Transcript: BUT AS FOR THIS HERE CHILD B

Name: 01-3536-8226-0015.wav
Transcript: TREVELYAN HAD FOLLOWED HIS LETTER QUICKER THAN HE HAD INTENDED WHEN IT WAS WRITTEN AND WAS NOW WITH HIS PRIME MINISTER BEFORE HIS PRIME MINISTER HAD BEEN ABLE TO TAKE ANY ACTION ON THE LAST INSTRUCTION RECEIVED

Name: 01-3536-8226-0016.wav
Transcript: DOES ONE MISTER SAMUEL BOZZLE LIVE HERE ASKED TREVELYAN

Name: 01-3536-8226-0017.wav
Transcript: THEN BOZZLE CAME FORWARD AND INTRODUCED HIS WIFE

Name: 01-3536-8226-0018.wav
Transcript: BUT TREVELYAN WAS OF A DIFFERENT OPINION AND HE WAS DISGUSTED AND REVOLTED MOST UNREASONABLY BY THE APPEARANCE OF HIS MINISTER'S DOMESTIC ARRANGEMENTS

Name: 01-3536-8226-0019.wav
Transcript: BOZZLE HAD ALWAYS WAITED UPON HIM WITH A DECENT COAT AND A WELL BRUSHED HAT AND CLEAN SHOES

Name: 01-3536-8226-0020.wav
Transcript: IT IS VERY MUCH EASIER FOR SUCH MEN AS MISTER BOZZLE TO CARRY DECENCY OF APPEARANCE ABOUT WITH THEM THAN TO KEEP IT AT HOME

Name: 01-3536-8226-0021.wav
Transcript: PERHAPS YOU COULD PUT ON YOUR COAT AND WALK OUT WITH ME FOR A FEW MINUTES SAID TREVELYAN

Name: 01-3536-8226-0022.wav
Transcript: MISSUS BOZZLE WHO WELL UNDERSTOOD THAT BUSINESS WAS BUSINESS AND THAT WIVES WERE NOT BUSINESS FELT NO ANGER AT THIS AND HANDED HER HUSBAND HIS BEST COAT

Name: 01-3536-8226-0023.wav
Transcript: BOZZLE AWAY FROM HIS OWN HOME OUT ON BUSINESS WITH HIS COAT BUTTONED OVER HIS BREAST AND HIS BEST HAT IN HIS HAND WAS AWARE THAT HE COMMANDED RESPECT AND HE COULD CARRY HIMSELF ACCORDINGLY

Name: 01-3536-8226-0024.wav
Transcript: I DO NOT SUPPOSE THAT ANYBODY WILL QUESTION MY RIGHT TO HAVE THE CARE OF MY OWN CHILD SAID TREVELYAN

Name: 01-3536-8226-0025.wav
Transcript: IF YOU WOULD HAVE GONE TO MISTER SKINT SIR SUGGESTED BOZZLE

Name: 01-3536-8226-0026.wav
Transcript: AS HE WENT ABOUT HIS EYES WERE EVER CAST DOWNWARDS AND HE WALKED WITH A QUICK SHUFFLING GAIT AND HE SUSPECTED OTHERS FEELING THAT HE HIMSELF WAS SUSPECTED

Name: 01-3536-8226-0027.wav
Transcript: AND ALL WORK HAD CEASED WITH HIM

Name: 01-3536-8226-0028.wav
Transcript: HE'S UP IN TOWN SIR A MINDING OF HIS PARLIAMENTARY DUTIES

Name: 01-3536-8226-0029.wav
Transcript: I'VE WATCHED AS SHARP AS WATCHING CAN GO PRETTY NEAR

Name: 01-3536-8226-0030.wav
Transcript: BUT IF YOU ASK ME MY OPINION WHY IN COURSE THEY'VE BEEN TOGETHER SOMEWHERE

Name: 01-3536-8226-0031.wav
Transcript: AND BOZZLE AS HE SAID THIS SMILED ALMOST ALOUD

Name: 01-3536-8226-0032.wav
Transcript: AND HE DID GO AWAY LEAVING BOZZLE STANDING IN THE MIDDLE OF STONY WALK

Name: 02-3536-8226-0000.wav
Transcript: IN THE LAST COMMUNICATION WHICH HE HAD RECEIVED FROM LADY MILBOROUGH SHE HAD SCOLDED HIM IN TERMS THAT WERE FOR HER SEVERE BECAUSE HE HAD NOT RETURNED TO HIS WIFE AND TAKEN HER OFF WITH HIM TO NAPLES

Name: 03-3536-8226-0001.wav
Transcript: AND NOW IT HAD COME TO PASS THAT HIS SOLE REMAINING ALLY MISTER SAMUEL BOZZLE THE EX POLICEMAN WAS BECOMING WEARY OF HIS SERVICE

Name: 03-3536-8226-0002.wav
Transcript: AT LAST HE SENT WORD TO SAY THAT HE HIMSELF WOULD BE IN ENGLAND BEFORE THE END OF MARCH AND WOULD SEE THAT THE MAJESTY OF THE LAW SHOULD BE VINDICATED IN HIS FAVOUR

Name: 03-3536-8226-0003.wav
Transcript: IN MAKING THIS HE HAD EXPECTED NO SUCCESS THOUGH FROM THE ENERGETIC NATURE OF HIS DISPOSITION HE HAD MADE THE ATTEMPT WITH SOME ZEAL

Name: 03-3536-8226-0004.wav
Transcript: MISSUS BOZZLE WAS DISPOSED TO THINK THAT LADIES OF QUALITY AMONG WHOM MADAME T WAS ENTITLED IN HER ESTIMATION TO TAKE RANK WERE SELDOM BETTER THAN THEY OUGHT TO BE AND SHE WAS QUITE WILLING THAT HER HUSBAND SHOULD EARN HIS BREAD BY WATCHING THE LADY OR THE LADY'S LOVER

Name: 03-3536-8226-0005.wav
Transcript: AND HAD THE CASE BEEN BROUGHT BEFORE THE JUDGE ORDINARY BY MEANS OF HER HUSBAND'S EXERTIONS SHE WOULD HAVE TAKEN PLEASURE IN READING EVERY WORD OF THE EVIDENCE EVEN THOUGH HER HUSBAND SHOULD HAVE BEEN EVER SO ROUGHLY HANDLED BY THE LAWYERS

Transcript: A DISTINCT PROMISE OF A HUNDRED POUNDS WAS MADE TO HIM IF HE WOULD HAVE THE CHILD READY TO HAND OVER TO TREVELYAN ON TREVELYAN'S ARRIVAL IN ENGLAND

Name: 07-3536-8226-0000.wav
Transcript: IN THE LAST COMMUNICATION WHICH HE HAD RECEIVED FROM LADY MILBOROUGH SHE HAD SCOLDED HIM IN TERMS THAT WERE FOR HER SEVERE BECAUSE HE HAD NOT RETURNED TO HIS WIFE AND TAKEN HER OFF WITH HIM TO NAPLES

Name: 07-3536-8226-0001.wav
Transcript: AND NOW IT HAD COME TO PASS THAT HIS SOLE REMAINING ALLY MISTER SAMUEL BOZZLE THE EX POLICEMAN WAS BECOMING WEARY OF HIS SERVICE

Name: 07-3536-8226-0002.wav
Transcript: AT LAST HE SENT WORD TO SAY THAT HE HIMSELF WOULD BE IN ENGLAND BEFORE THE END OF MARCH AND WOULD SEE THAT THE MAJESTY OF THE LAW SHOULD BE VINDICATED IN HIS FAVOUR

Name: 07-3536-8226-0003.wav
Transcript: IN MAKING THIS HE HAD EXPECTED NO SUCCESS THOUGH FROM THE ENERGETIC NATURE OF HIS DISPOSITION HE HAD MADE THE ATTEMPT WITH SOME ZEAL

Name: 07-3536-8226-0004.wav
Transcript: MISSUS BOZZLE WAS DISPOSED TO THINK THAT LADIES OF QUALITY AMONG WHOM MADAME T WAS ENTITLED IN HER ESTIMATION TO TAKE RANK WERE SELDOM BETTER THAN THEY OUGHT TO BE AND SHE WAS QUITE WILLING THAT HER HUSBAND SHOULD EARN HIS BREAD BY WATCHING THE LADY OR THE LADY'S LOVER

Name: 07-3536-8226-0005.wav
Transcript: AND HAD THE CASE BEEN BROUGHT BEFORE THE JUDGE ORDINARY BY MEANS OF HER HUSBAND'S EXERTIONS SHE WOULD HAVE TAKEN PLEASURE IN READING EVERY WORD OF THE EVIDENCE EVEN THOUGH HER HUSBAND SHOULD HAVE BEEN EVER SO ROUGHLY HANDLED BY THE LAWYERS

Name: 07-3536-8226-0006.wav
Transcript: A DISTINCT PROMISE OF A HUNDRED POUNDS WAS MADE TO HIM IF HE WOULD HAVE THE CHILD READY TO HAND OVER TO TREVELYAN ON TREVELYAN'S ARRIVAL IN ENGLAND

Name: 07-3536-8226-0007.wav
Transcript: OF COURSE IT AIN'T SAID MISSUS BOZZLE

Name: 07-3536-8226-0008.wav
Transcript: THE PATERNAL PARENT HAS A RIGHT TO HIS INFANTS NO DOUBT THAT WAS BOZZLE'S LAW

Name: 07-3536-8226-0009.wav
Transcript: HE CAN'T SUCKLE EM CAN HE

Transcript: WHEN A MARRIED WOMAN HAS FOLLOWERS AND THE HUSBAND DON'T GO THE WRONG SIDE OF THE POST TOO OR IT AIN'T PROVED AGAIN HIM THAT HE DO THEY'LL NEVER LET HER HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH THE CHILDREN
